column4: >So let’s say you wake up late and leave home realising your phone is only 40% charged? You know it wont be enough for the day, so what do you do? You PANIC, because you can’t be without your phone!
column5: >If you have ever found yourself at a lost for power, get a Petite Portable Power with up to 8 more hours of talk time. Designed for your needs.
column6: >Wait until you get your hands on the new, revolutionised portable charger. Experience it and you’ll have a better sense of why some people feel so strongly about how it can impact their lives. Once you have a little boost, you can’t stop. The safe reliable power you expect.
column9: >Petite Portable Power is a mini disposable portable charger that aims to revolutionise the portable charging industry. No bigger than the size of your thumb, our lightweight and convenient product is made out of cardboard and other biodegradable materials which does not pollute the environment upon disposal. Petite Portable Power allows easy and efficient charging on the go, without the daily hassle of carrying around a bulky charger.
column11: >These days people tend to be stuck in situations where their iPhone runs out of battery due to the large amount of time spent on it, the ease of having a handy disposable battery would be extremely beneficial to a large proportion of society in cases of travelling, exercising or on a night out when one’s phone runs out of battery. The Petite Portable Power stands out from the rest of the available portable chargers in the market in terms of its size.
column14: >Our brand story goes back a long way, when we got our first smartphones. Everywhere we went, whoever we met, we seem to always find one mutual problem we have with a problem with our smartphones, it’s battery life. We found that it is an ever-growing problem as we get more and more dependent to our phones. Today, with the help of our phones we are able to transport ourselves around (e.g Uber, Maps), make payment for things (e.g Apple Pay) and our camera to capture moments that will last forever. The product idea came about when four people discussed about how we can put a stop to how inefficient the industry is in providing products that allow users to charge their devices wherever they wanted. Being on the go all the time, a short battery life which last for about 3-4hours got us thinking that there must be a solution.
column15: >With Petite Portable Power (PPP), we hope to deliver a new, revolutionised portable charger. As it is important to practice good corporate social responsibility, we decided to come up with a portable charger case which is produced by biodegradable materials unlike any ordinary charger. Being the first petite, disposable and eco-friendly portable charger, we hope to change the lifestyles of the community.
column17: >
column19: >The Petite Portable Power keeps your device fully charged at all times without the hassle of messy and tangled wires and eradicates the need to lug around a bulky charger throughout the day. Allowing you to charge your phone efficiently when you’re on the go!

column1: <li>Gives you the ability to charge your phone whenever &amp
• Capable of charging other Apple devices (e.g. iPad)

column4: >Simply head down to your nearest convenience store to grab one of our Petite Portable Power batteries, plug it in and you’re good to go!
column5: >Simply break off a battery from a perforated sheet and pop it into your phone for a quick charge!
column6: >You could even  potentially buy them in bulk and use them when traveling or doing your daily activities.
column10: >What to do when your charger finally goes out of battery? Don’t just leave it in the trash, we will be recycling your used PPP for you when you get a new one. You can also search online for the nearest electronics recycling centre. They can recycle our product for you.
column11: >We will be providing incentives for customers who value the concept of recycling used product. Rewards such as vouchers will be given in designated stores which you bought the product, allowing you to purchase PPP at a discounted rate.
column12: >In addition, a free PPP will be offered to users who collects a significant amount of PPP to recycle after usage. Reuse of non-biodegradable parts can reduce the costs of making a new product.
column13: >However, if this is too much of a hassle, don't worry! Our PPP uses lithium batteries which are considered safe for disposal since they do not contain toxic metals!
column14: >
column15:
>Our product is designed for everywhere use
  • In the club

Use PPP to keep your phone up and running all night long to continue snapping those memories.

  • In the airport

Struggling to find a power outlet to charge your device? PPP’s got you covered while you wait for your flight

  • At a café

Waiting for someone and your phone dies? Use PPP to charge your phone while waiting

  • In the park

Out for a run and your phone happens to die? Grab a PPP to charge it on the go!
column18: >In this technological day and age, everyone is dependent on their mobile devices to be fully functioning throughout the day. This results in portable chargers being extremely vital in our daily lives. Many companies have brought out their own version of portable chargers, however, the PPP stands out in terms of its compact design and its convenience.
column19: >No bigger than your thumb and disposable after use, the PPP is designed to suit the needs of busy individuals who are reluctant to carry around a bulky portable charger through the day!
column20:
>SPECIFICATIONS:

Dimension labels in figures are in shown in cm.
column21:

","So let’s say you wake up late and leave home realising your phone is only 40% charged? You know it wont be enough for the day, so what do you do? You PANIC, because you can’t be without your phone! If you have ever found yourself at a lost for power, get a Petite Portable Power with up to 8 more hours of talk time. Designed for your needs. Wait until you get your hands on the new, revolutionised portable charger. Experience it and you’ll have a better sense of why some people feel so strongly about how it can impact their lives. Once you have a little boost, you can’t stop. The safe reliable power you expect. Petite Portable Power is a mini disposable portable charger that aims to revolutionise the portable charging industry. No bigger than the size of your thumb, our lightweight and convenient product is made out of cardboard and other biodegradable materials which does not pollute the environment upon disposal. Petite Portable Power allows easy and efficient charging on the go, without the daily hassle of carrying around a bulky charger.These days people tend to be stuck in situations where their iPhone runs out of battery due to the large amount of time spent on it, the ease of having a handy disposable battery would be extremely beneficial to a large proportion of society in cases of travelling, exercising or on a night out when one’s phone runs out of battery. The Petite Portable Power stands out from the rest of the available portable chargers in the market in terms of its size. WHO ARE WE? Our brand story goes back a long way, when we got our first smartphones. Everywhere we went, whoever we met, we seem to always find one mutual problem we have with a problem with our smartphones, it’s battery life. We found that it is an ever-growing problem as we get more and more dependent to our phones. Today, with the help of our phones we are able to transport ourselves around (e.g Uber, Maps), make payment for things (e.g Apple Pay) and our camera to capture moments that will last forever. The product idea came about when four people discussed about how we can put a stop to how inefficient the industry is in providing products that allow users to charge their devices wherever they wanted. Being on the go all the time, a short battery life which last for about 3-4hours got us thinking that there must be a solution. With Petite Portable Power (PPP), we hope to deliver a new, revolutionised portable charger. As it is important to practice good corporate social responsibility, we decided to come up with a portable charger case which is produced by biodegradable materials unlike any ordinary charger. Being the first petite, disposable and eco-friendly portable charger, we hope to change the lifestyles of the community.   The Petite Portable Power keeps your device fully charged at all times without the hassle of messy and tangled wires and eradicates the need to lug around a bulky charger throughout the day. Allowing you to charge your phone efficiently when you’re on the go!Available in 3 different voltages

column1: No more unnecessary wires and cables
Gives you the ability to charge your phone whenever & wherever
Capable of charging other Apple devices (e.g. iPad)

HOW IT WORKS:Simply head down to your nearest convenience store to grab one of our Petite Portable Power batteries, plug it in and you’re good to go!Simply break off a battery from a perforated sheet and pop it into your phone for a quick charge!You could even  potentially buy them in bulk and use them when traveling or doing your daily activities.WHAT HAPPENS NEXT? What to do when your charger finally goes out of battery? Don’t just leave it in the trash, we will be recycling your used PPP for you when you get a new one. You can also search online for the nearest electronics recycling centre. They can recycle our product for you.We will be providing incentives for customers who value the concept of recycling used product. Rewards such as vouchers will be given in designated stores which you bought the product, allowing you to purchase PPP at a discounted rate.In addition, a free PPP will be offered to users who collects a significant amount of PPP to recycle after usage. Reuse of non-biodegradable parts can reduce the costs of making a new product.However, if this is too much of a hassle, don't worry! Our PPP uses lithium batteries which are considered safe for disposal since they do not contain toxic metals!Our product is designed for everywhere useIn the clubUse PPP to keep your phone up and running all night long to continue snapping those memories.In the airportStruggling to find a power outlet to charge your device? PPP’s got you covered while you wait for your flightAt a caféWaiting for someone and your phone dies? Use PPP to charge your phone while waitingIn the parkOut for a run and your phone happens to die? Grab a PPP to charge it on the go!  In this technological day and age, everyone is dependent on their mobile devices to be fully functioning throughout the day. This results in portable chargers being extremely vital in our daily lives. Many companies have brought out their own version of portable chargers, however, the PPP stands out in terms of its compact design and its convenience.No bigger than your thumb and disposable after use, the PPP is designed to suit the needs of busy individuals who are reluctant to carry around a bulky portable charger through the day! SPECIFICATIONS:Dimension labels in figures are in shown in cm.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign

GOAL: To build out our software development and accelerate National and International licensing of our cloud based platform.  The platform allows clients to build a broad based, highly customizable, internet loyalty mall and program that would normally take them many months and hundreds of thousands of dollars -  in less that 30 minutes for as little as $900.

Shop WebTV is developing (Beta site) a broad based software Platform known as Loyalty Superstore which offer a multitude of unique ancillary features aimed at assisting our clients to grow their business and customer bases. PRIVATE BRANDED and CUSTOMIZED. An additional unique feature is the ability to add of interactive video shopping.

The platform will be pre-populated with over 1000 participating National Merchants from which the licensee can choose and customize with a click of a mouse. Consumers will then receive up to 30% in rebates and 60%in discounts by simply shopping through the Private Branded Portal. Additionally, the corporation, merchant, non-profit or individual who has licensed a platform will receive a revenue share of all purchase made through their portal.

We private brand these platforms for corporations,  non-profits, schools, membership clubs and merchants. Their Customers/Shoppers earn cash rebates in addition to any rebates they receive on the credit cards.

We offer an unprecedented and heretofore unavailable, customizable robust platform utilized by big and small businesses alike. All the elements stand alone or can be combined for dynamic results. There is literally no customizable program in the world that compares to the Shop WebTV Loyalty Superstore - and the cost is unbelievably affordable.www.shopwebtv.com

It is also designed to help local business compete with their large competitors by offer them a multi million dollar loyalty program that gives their customers rebates from over 1000 National Merchants - and the rewards are 100% funded by those merchants. www.loyaltysuperstore.com

Loyalty Superstore features a Merchant Funded web based mall that ties you into  over 1000 famous national brands. We brand and customize the platform for our  small business and club clients…giving them an unbelievable cash back loyalty  program for their customers and members.
Local  Merchant Listing. Cloud Loyalty brings Main Street to the web by giving  local merchants and clubs marketing exposure to millions of potential  customers…as part of the overall platform.
New  Passive Income Source. Our clients receive income every time customers shop  at the 1000+ participating merchants in their private branded Loyalty  Superstore…even while they are sleeping.
Customer/Member  Communications. A branded email and texting program tailor made to bring  special offers and information to your customers to stimulate participation and  action.
Know Your  Customer. A methodology to collect customer data so that you may target and  promote your company on an ongoing basis.
Customer  Surveys. Learn what your customers think about you and how to enhance your  customer appreciation and loyalty
Customized  Payment Solutions. Card present and card not present programs that offer the best pricing and  features…even for high risk clients.
Reloadable Cards. Unique technology to load rewards on our reloadable card or the clients.

Challenges and Tasks

Eaazy Squeezy is not a big perfect company. We are just like any other start up who need a mere kickstart to get our project going. Once Eaazy Squeezy is going it will roll and form a all new earphone type! My only worry are that creating websites, finishing designs, and shipping them out will take longer. column1: This idea came to me naturally working with Mods and magnets and naturally drop down the phone. I don't have any experience about running campaign but I do like to learn new things and I love industrial design.
You will not be afraid to drop the phone again because it will not reach the ground. Spring load increase force gradually and slow down the drop.

You don't necessarily need this product. It is nice to have. Not every phone will break if it falls down and it becomes more personal with few dents. Like a custom series, like something special. Don't let me down will keep your phone always with you.

Funds will go to cover tooling cost for high volume production insert molding for black piece on the bottom which carry magnet. Tooling is expensive for low volume production and to be able to have low cost on end product volume has to be high. In general, 1000 users can fund this campaign.  In case of not reach entire goal, you did let me down, but that is OK. No money will be taken.

If you are the worker and do other thinks while talking on the phone this will help you not to drop the phone. Phone will not drop from your pocket while you sitting. If somebody else take your phone you will feel that. Just in case that you did pay to replace display it will not happen again.

Risks always exist. Total risk is equal to times of all risks. Software engineers like to write less code. This is zero code. Hardware engineers like to use less components. This is zero component assembly. Mechanically this is very simple device, simple as it can be. I have made first model and first mold from melted plastic, as on picture above.
If you know somebody that doesn't like to drop the phone use the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you!

VivoCam is the everyday wearable HD camera for you to capture all those special moments As You Go Through Life. Small and lightweight design. The perfect all in one hands-free social camera solution. Simply Clip it on or mount it anywhere and begin to shoot and share your experiences.

The app is simple to use, it works as a viewer and remote control for the camera. You can Live stream, store or instantly share your videos and pictures via your favorite social networks. Professional grade 1080p and 8mp with a built in LED flash and microphone with multiple modes for time lapse, slow motion and live broadcasting video. 

 

Complete all in one wearable camera. VivoCam was designed for everyone. Simple to use, just clip on and begin to capture and share using the cloud.

The small and powerful camera has unique features such as its built in flash for night and day use. Use the app to control the camera, and choose between the different recording formats and get creative!

VivoCam can be used while charging and a full charge gives you up to 1.5 hours of recording in 1080p and with 32GB Micro SD slot you can accommodate up to 10 hours of HD video or up to 5k pictures.
• Easy to Clip on or mount onto selfie-sticks, tripods, etc…
• App to store and instantly share your content in social media
• Live Stream – Time Lapse – Slow Motion Video formats

We realized that the market is flooded with action cameras that are bulky, heavy and expensive. That’s when VivoCam was born, with the mission to provide an affordable and complete social camera that doesn’t limit your options. 

VivoCam is the first and only wearable camera with a built in flash. 

Most available cameras don’t have instant sharing or live stream. With VivoCam’s easy to use app you can capture, store and share on the go without having to first save the content to in the phones memory. 

 

We are a Chinese company with a branch office in the US. Our company specializes in the design and manufacturing of the best wearable and mountable cameras. 

 

 

Like in any other new endeavor, there are risks and challenges and VivoCam is not the exception. We know the business and we accept the challenge! Some might see us as the “New Players” in the wearable camera category, yet we are a group with more than 20 years of combined knowledge in the consumer electronics industry. We have an experienced and highly motivated team with offices in China and the United States.

Vivo is committed to deliver users the most reliable, high quality and stylish wearable devices in the market today. For the past year our researchers, designers and head of manufacturing have been working relentlessly with one goal in mind, the development of VivoCam. We are now ready! Each phase of every aspect of production is ready to start once we reach our funding.

• Why VivoCam on Kickstarter?

  With your help VivoCam is about to become a reality and start mass production! That's the reason why we are launching this project on Kickstarter. We want this campaign to be the starting point for VivoCam as well as to become the seed of our ""Community"". 

YES! A Community... a group of supporters with a voice... with bright and new ideas... 

• Whom will be part of VivoCam! How can I get a VivoCam? 

 You can reserve your VivoCam during the forty five (45) days of the Kickstarter campaign at a lower price in comparison to the full retail price. Once the campaign is over and production starts in full, we will start pre-selling our camera through our VivoCam website (www.vivo.camera)

• What is going to happen after Kickstarter campaign ends?

  Immediately after we finish our campaign we will start production of our Flagship model... VivoCam! The most advanced wearable camera in the market today. 

• VivoCam is going to use Invitation system?

  No, we are NOT going to use an INVITATION SYSTEM... Our aim is to create a community that is open to everyone who likes to be at the cutting edge of technology. 

• How much will shipping cost, and how long will it take?

There is only one shipping option via Kickstarter, however terms and ETA’s will very depending on each State. Also we are starting the delivery in Backers order. After Kickstarter campaign and pre-sales ends you will be able to choose the alternative that better suits your delivery needs.

• What are the size dimensions and weight?

Dimensions: 1.8 x 2.16 x 0.74 Weight: Weight: 50gr

The Pitch Most people struggle frequently with tangled earbud cords – an ongoing annoyance we would love to fix with a simple, compact technology. Elroy is exactly this. More than just another bluetooth connection to your phone, Elroy is a wearable speaker phone, a tangle-free set of earbuds, and a touch control for your mobile device.
Elroy is a whole new way to interface with your array of personal digital devices. Use Elroy as a simple wearable speaker phone. You don’t have to use the earbuds
column2: you can take calls with a simple tap or send calls to voicemail with a swipe of your finger.

column1: Use Elroy for nearly all your phone functions with intuitive touch gestures. Take calls, terminate calls, conference two calls, and more.
Elroy's unique magnetic earbud docks make answering a call as simple as possible. Just remove an earbud and talk. To hang up, replace the earbud on its dock.

Use Elroy as the controller for your external speakers. Adjust volume, advance tracks, pause, and play with easy-to-remember gestures. Elroy can be customized to reflect who you are.When you have an incoming call, don’t dash across the house to get to your phone – just tap to answer the call from where you are.
The front face plate is changeable, so you can switch colors to suit your mood or wardrobe. By the time Elroy gets to market, we will have hundreds of designs, patterns, and images to choose from.

Elroy is the brainchild of mass customization guru, Rob Honeycutt, the founder of the messenger bag company Timbuk2. Rob founded Timbuk2 in 1989 and created what is still a unique offering in the bag market with products that can be customized from millions of possible combinations, and then produced and shipped within 24 hours. It's a production system no other bag company has ever been able to replicate.
Rob ran manufacturing at Timbuk2 for 13 years and has over 20 years experience in many aspects of manufacturing, including injection molding, sourcing, cut&
column2: sew, transportation, packaging, labeling systems, weaving and converting, and factory level production and process flow.

column1: Elroy is the start of my next exploration into unknown entrepreneurial realms.
Just to be perfectly clear, the piece in the teaser video above is a non-functioning mock-up.  This project is currently in the product concept phase.

To bring this product to market I'm partnering with Whizz Systems, an established electronics design and manufacturing contractor (EMC) with a solid, proven track record of bringing quality products to market. Whizz Systems brings 23 years of high tech experience to the table, consistently delivering the goods to some of the industry's biggest names.

Phase 1: We've laid out the expected functionality and performance of the product. On first pass, Whizz System's engineers say everything is achievable. Phase 1 of Elroy will be a thorough project planning with the Whizz engineers. This fundraising goal gets me through phase 1 of the project which will take only about 4-6 weeks. At that point we will have a complete set of functioning prototypes that will allow us to launch a phase 2 project to propel us through a product launch.
First, we're doing something that's quite different than what's been attempted before.  We're combining bluetooth with touch pad technology, and then adding mass customization.
• Single touch commands for answering or muting calls, pausing or starting music tracks, and other actions.
• Slide commands that will send incoming calls to voicemail, adjust music volume,  and other actions.

column2: hold commands to access Siri or other voice related actions.

column1: • Other multi-touch gestures will hold an unlimited potential for additional commands.
• Use without earbuds so Elroy can function as a speaker phone.
There are a tremendous number of functions Elroy will eventually be able to perform.  I will be building a team of inside developers to explore what all we can make this thing do.
Why is this the first ""truly wearable"" bluetooth device?
On-the-ear and in-the-ear bluetooth devices are cumbersome. No matter how beautifully designed they are, most of us don't want hunks of plastic stuck in our ear all day.

A few bluetooth devices to clip on your clothing have appeared on the market too. We've tested them. We don't think they rise to level of something to wear, like a piece of jewelry. They look like little remote control units - functional, but lacking any style or personal identity.

Elroy is a device that you will wear all day long. It's a simple form that will perform more functions than any other similar device. It's a concept that can adapt to your personality. We don't want you to wear Elroy because it says something about us. We want you to wear Elroy because it says something about you. That's what makes Elroy ""truly wearable.""

One of the best parts of Timbuk2 was the mass customization system I built.  What I loved about it, and what endures today, is how personal people's Timbuk2 bags become when they create them themselves.  I want to bring an element of that magic to Elroy by adding customization.  I want this to be more than just another little clicky device.  I want Elroy to be something you love.
With your help I can bring this new and unique device to market.  I hope you will find the idea as complelling as I do.
If you just want to help me along a little bit with this new product development please consider getting an Elroy t-shirt.  They'll be available in S, M, L, XL and XXL.
You can even help out for free merely by Tweeting this project or sharing it on Facebook.

If you want to come hang out, at this very moment the Elroy Command and Control Facility is parked at a non-metered spot near the Berkeley Marina, where our Elroy Executives are engaged in a rigorous retinue of team-building exercises including ""Group Loitering,"" ""3-Way Lurking,"" ""Pretend Paper Reading,"" and Full Contact Frisbee Golf. On tomorrow's agenda: ""When Finished, Hang Up: A Practical Guide to Leaving Effective Voice Mails.""

column7: >my name is Claudio Lira, I'm a control engineer by formation but designing games and toys is the aim of my life. Animodula is an animal making bracelet: one Animodula package with 22 pieces,
column10: >the Triceratops, is able to represent all the figures obtained in the picture below
column13: > (the ""bestiary"", 130 animals) and many others. Animodula lets you build creatures of your imagination and gives you little 3D puzzle to solve: both this things contribute in the development of your
column16: target=""_blank"">life skills
column19: >, it doesn't matter what your age is
column28:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Story

At the beginning my objective was the making of a polymer clay bracelet that could become an animal once took off, but afterwads I have developed the beads in modules to let them combine in a high number of animals. 

After an intermediate wooden prototype I shifted to a 3D printed one, perfectly working both as a toy and a bracelet: the final product is ready to be realized in plastic through injection molding. In addition to this version there is also another one, in steel, 3D printed.

Animodula has been designed to produce many significant combinations in correlation to the number of pieces, as the space on the wrist is limited.

Animodula

I will describe now plastic and steel Animodula. There are 5 shapes of piece. Trapezoids, Triangles and three extremities: Drop, Horn and Nose cone. The trapezoid module's base, in the plastic version, is 26 mm length (~1""), a bit less considering the bevel, while the steel version's one is 20 mm length (0.79""). The hole for the wire has a 2mm diameter. The plastic modules appear as a couple of shells closed on the magnets, while the steel version is a single hollow piece with external magnets.

There are 3 packages: Kitten, Turtle and Triceratops, and they have respectively 8, 14, and 22 pieces. The triceratops is obtained from the Kitten's pieces added to the Turtle's ones.

The plastic version is available in 6 plain colors and 6 fantasy materials inspired to the natural elements.

Plain colors: Ivory, Lime, Sapphire, Purple, Coral, Orange
column30: >Fantasy colors: Lava, Water, Night, Forest, Clouds, Daylight
column31:
all this 12 pictures are renderings

Example of the packaging that I would like to print for the Fantasy colors if the campaign will significantly exceed the strict goal
column33: >
column35:
>In the steel version there are 3 available finishes, natural (the production process leaves a light bronze color), nickel plated and black.

Considering that the jewel is obtained by 3D printing several customizations are also available (see Perks paragraph)
column36:
>This photo shows the modules on 1cm-anty-paper.

[WARNING! The ingestion of one or more magnets is extremely dangerous. Does not matter how old a kid is, if he swallows  things avoid Animodula]

[WARNING! Have you got nickel allergy? Avoid Nickel finishing on the jewel]

Animodula is mainly thought to have a plesant looking when it is transported in bracelet configuration and to represent animals and organic shapes when in toy configuration. The high number of relevant shapes that can be made is given by the presence of magnetic joints on every face, and by the union of 60, 120 and 90° angles, that can tile a plane. The 60 and 120° angles are pretty common in nature, for example in the beehive's cells and in the monocotyledons. The magnetic joints are adjustable so the finished creatures keep an high mobility, and are employable as action figures in other games.

The presence of magnets allows Animodula to cling to metallic walls, such as the computer case or as the fridge. In addition it can interact with small objects such coins, keys, hair claps or paper clips. In this way Animodula can become the source of endless games.
column47:
>Neotenia Project

Animodula is part of a greater project, Neotenia, which includes another dozen subprojects. For the description of some of them I refer you to the
column48:
lang=eng"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Neotenia website. The aim of Neotenia is to empower life skills and promote creativty, love for the research and opposition to the conditioning, through media for young people, toys and games.

My toys and games focus on modularity
column49:
in addition to other brand new features of Animodula there are other 4 toys and lots of videogames planned, based on this concept. A good modular system entails a great freedom for the user, which means a great freedom to create. If for some reason a module breaks is sufficient to replace the damaged part, and not the whole system. In consequence of that the lifetime of the product is potentially extremely long. Usually the market is interested in the opposite of that, i.e. to plan the obsolescence of its products, prearranging the breaking in a given period or persuading the customers that a product is old and inadequate. 

Even the traditional building sets give their best so as their modules, virtually indistructibles, have a short lifetime, otherwise the company can't sell more of them. To obtain this result they work in two ways: creating pieces even more dedicated and with less potentiality, suitable for few usages, and linking themselves to videogames and movies in style in a limited period.

The media of Neotenia have their focus on the valorization of the individuality and the introspection, on the building of valuable relationships and not on the formation of a numerous group. In addition generally Neotenia's media are not based on contrast and clash. I criticise the media for kids and children that use excessive simplification and stereotypes, cheaper and easier to be handled than complex ideas, but generally under the real range of their recipients: the result is a lack of real contribution to their mental growth.

column1:
Animodula idea has been judged suitable for business angel or venture capitalist consideration, but for these some changes are required to the original plan, and the effectiveness of the project would be compromised. For this reason I preferred to study a crowdfunding campaign.

In order to make Animodula 40 KUSD are strictly required  to make the molds, start the production and buy the raw material. Additional funds will be required then to bring Animodula to the traditional market, opening an e-commerce or maybe even to bring it in the physical shops. At the same time with other resources it will be possible to develop other similar products of the Neotenia project.
column9:
>

The main suggested perk is the triceratops, that include all the pieces required to build the whole bestiary. For plastic Animodula combined shipping is not available because the shipping cost depends directly on the weight
column10:
however the tracking always costs 1$ for any number of Animodula packages, and in addition there are sales for groups of 4 and 6 triceratops (Noah's Ark and Alchemy perks). Write me for information about combined shipping for Animodula jewel.

column1: ","Hello,my name is Claudio Lira, I'm a control engineer by formation but designing games and toys is the aim of my life. Animodula is an animal making bracelet: one Animodula package with 22 pieces, the Triceratops, is able to represent all the figures obtained in the picture below (the ""bestiary"", 130 animals) and many others. Animodula lets you build creatures of your imagination and gives you little 3D puzzle to solve: both this things contribute in the development of your life skills, it doesn't matter what your age is.Animal making demo:StoryAt the beginning my objective was the making of a polymer clay bracelet that could become an animal once took off, but afterwads I have developed the beads in modules to let them combine in a high number of animals. After an intermediate wooden prototype I shifted to a 3D printed one, perfectly working both as a toy and a bracelet: the final product is ready to be realized in plastic through injection molding. In addition to this version there is also another one, in steel, 3D printed.Animodula has been designed to produce many significant combinations in correlation to the number of pieces, as the space on the wrist is limited.AnimodulaI will describe now plastic and steel Animodula. There are 5 shapes of piece. Trapezoids, Triangles and three extremities: Drop, Horn and Nose cone. The trapezoid module's base, in the plastic version, is 26 mm length (~1""), a bit less considering the bevel, while the steel version's one is 20 mm length (0.79""). The hole for the wire has a 2mm diameter. The plastic modules appear as a couple of shells closed on the magnets, while the steel version is a single hollow piece with external magnets.There are 3 packages: Kitten, Turtle and Triceratops, and they have respectively 8, 14, and 22 pieces. The triceratops is obtained from the Kitten's pieces added to the Turtle's ones.The plastic version is available in 6 plain colors and 6 fantasy materials inspired to the natural elements.Plain colors: Ivory, Lime, Sapphire, Purple, Coral, Orange
column2: Fantasy colors: Lava, Water, Night, Forest, Clouds, Daylight
column3: all this 12 pictures are renderingsExample of the packaging that I would like to print for the Fantasy colors if the campaign will significantly exceed the strict goalIn the steel version there are 3 available finishes, natural (the production process leaves a light bronze color), nickel plated and black.Considering that the jewel is obtained by 3D printing several customizations are also available (see Perks paragraph)This photo shows the modules on 1cm-anty-paper.[WARNING! The ingestion of one or more magnets is extremely dangerous. Does not matter how old a kid is, if he swallows  things avoid Animodula][WARNING! Have you got nickel allergy? Avoid Nickel finishing on the jewel]Animodula is mainly thought to have a plesant looking when it is transported in bracelet configuration and to represent animals and organic shapes when in toy configuration. The high number of relevant shapes that can be made is given by the presence of magnetic joints on every face, and by the union of 60, 120 and 90° angles, that can tile a plane. The 60 and 120° angles are pretty common in nature, for example in the beehive's cells and in the monocotyledons. The magnetic joints are adjustable so the finished creatures keep an high mobility, and are employable as action figures in other games.The presence of magnets allows Animodula to cling to metallic walls, such as the computer case or as the fridge. In addition it can interact with small objects such coins, keys, hair claps or paper clips. In this way Animodula can become the source of endless games.Neotenia ProjectAnimodula is part of a greater project, Neotenia, which includes another dozen subprojects. For the description of some of them I refer you to the Neotenia website. The aim of Neotenia is to empower life skills and promote creativty, love for the research and opposition to the conditioning, through media for young people, toys and games.My toys and games focus on modularity
column4: in addition to other brand new features of Animodula there are other 4 toys and lots of videogames planned, based on this concept. A good modular system entails a great freedom for the user, which means a great freedom to create. If for some reason a module breaks is sufficient to replace the damaged part, and not the whole system. In consequence of that the lifetime of the product is potentially extremely long. Usually the market is interested in the opposite of that, i.e. to plan the obsolescence of its products, prearranging the breaking in a given period or persuading the customers that a product is old and inadequate. Even the traditional building sets give their best so as their modules, virtually indistructibles, have a short lifetime, otherwise the company can't sell more of them. To obtain this result they work in two ways: creating pieces even more dedicated and with less potentiality, suitable for few usages, and linking themselves to videogames and movies in style in a limited period.The media of Neotenia have their focus on the valorization of the individuality and the introspection, on the building of valuable relationships and not on the formation of a numerous group. In addition generally Neotenia's media are not based on contrast and clash. I criticise the media for kids and children that use excessive simplification and stereotypes, cheaper and easier to be handled than complex ideas, but generally under the real range of their recipients: the result is a lack of real contribution to their mental growth.

column1: Animodula idea has been judged suitable for business angel or venture capitalist consideration, but for these some changes are required to the original plan, and the effectiveness of the project would be compromised. For this reason I preferred to study a crowdfunding campaign.In order to make Animodula 40 KUSD are strictly required  to make the molds, start the production and buy the raw material. Additional funds will be required then to bring Animodula to the traditional market, opening an e-commerce or maybe even to bring it in the physical shops. At the same time with other resources it will be possible to develop other similar products of the Neotenia project. PerksThe main suggested perk is the triceratops, that include all the pieces required to build the whole bestiary. For plastic Animodula combined shipping is not available because the shipping cost depends directly on the weight
column2: however the tracking always costs 1$ for any number of Animodula packages, and in addition there are sales for groups of 4 and 6 triceratops (Noah's Ark and Alchemy perks). Write me for information about combined shipping for Animodula jewel. Video TutorialKitten, Turtle, TriceratopsNoah's Ark, Fruit Salad, AlchemyKitten, Turtle, Triceratops JewelAnimodula's philosophy is adverse to specialization, but where it is possible Neotenia supports the customization. In particular, a jewel can be a celebrative and very personal object, and as it is obtained through 3D printing we can provide some personalization.Custom extremity, Octuopus, Zebra 45$ Custom Extremity- Introduce a customized shape based on your drawing (complex shapes or engraves

column1: are not allowed) that will replace one or more extremity of a jewel. I'm looking
forward to see your drawings!12$ Octopus - Get one additional extremity
column2: thought to apply the customization to new

column1: extremities without replacing the extisting ones. However you can also desire a
weird 2-tailed cat, as my nephew do.20$ Zebra - Color change of an arbitrary number of beads in the same jewel package. Ideal to
reproduce animal with special coloration, if for example your partner is
attached to a black and white pet or is obsessed with raccoons. (the available
color still are natural, nickel plated and black)How can I help?
If you like Animodula or Neotenia you can also like Animodula on Facebook :)
Tell with a comment what animal of the bestiary do you prefer and what important animals are missing
Share your favorite animal via Pinterest
Tweet how much do you like Animodula!
Share a video of the Animodula playlist on YouTube

If you have an Android device you can download the app ARnimodula, print the pdf tag file, and show to your friends a simulation of Animodula. ARnimodula is a kind of game, to obtain the Triceratops you should play with the tags of kitten and turtle :)

We are pleased to introduce MagTarget™ a wireless charging system for your smartphone and tablets. It securely holds your device with no clips and no clamps. It wirelessly charges your devices without plugging the phone into anything. No wires on your phone or tablet!
column2: >We have been working for two years and gone through hundreds of prototypes to achieve the development of our patent pending technology that allows you to simply attach a Target Ring to your device (with or without cases), and touch to charge.

column1: A clever magnet arrangement allows the device to find the dock without any careful alignment needed. Our mounts have an amazingly strong magnetic pull for a secure hold, yet easy to remove (your phone or tablet) with a simple twist. Your device will be in the perfect viewing position, with 360 degree rotation you can change from portrait to landscape while charging. MagTarget™ uses a direct electrical connection to give you the maximum charging speed. Your device will have the added benefit of longer battery life, the battery type used in most modern electronics (Lithium-ion) actually benefit from frequent recharge. MagTarget™ keeps your smart devices charged throughout the day with a simple touch of the dock. No wires to plug-in every time.

How does it affect battery life?
Your battery life improves! Don't listen to those stuck in the Ni-Cad batteries era (where full charge/discharge cycles where beneficial). The battery type used in most modern electronics (Lithium-ion) actually benefit from frequent recharge. For example, assuming you use 100% of your phone battery charge per day, recharging it twice a day vs. just at the end of the day will give your battery approximately 250 additional days of life.
(sources: Electropaedia, Battery University)

Why not use induction wireless charging technology?
As cool as induction wireless charging technology is, it comes with some drawbacks. First, it takes longer to charge. Second, it doesn't provide USB connectivity to sync your device to your computer or car. Third and perhaps most importantly, the heat it generates can actually reduce battery life. (source: Battery University)

Don't the strong magnets affect the phone functions in any way?
Unlike most magnetic mounts our proprietary magnetic arrangement doesn't bleed its magnetic field into the device it holds. This took many prototypes to achieve and we are quite proud of the result!

How do you attach the Target Ring to the back of a smartphone or tablet?

The Target Ring attaches to the back of the phone via double-sided 3M VHB tape. The same kind of tape used on GoPro cameras. The top portion of the ring is the one taped to the phone case. The bottom portion is removable for easy access to the phone connector.

column1: In our modern society, thanks to social networking, we have become more digitally connected than ever before, but at a cost. We have become more disconnected in an offline sense. Instead of spending time with those we love we tend to burry our heads into our mobile devices and ignore the people around us.

We didn't think the solution to this technological isolation was trying to get people to throw out their mobile devices. Rather, we thought that creating a device that could take singular experiences, and make them communal, would be the optimal solution.

With the Project Wedge we hope to solve this problem by creating a mobile projector that allows people to share the content from their devices in frictionless way. We wanted to make a device to allowed people to enjoy all the offerings of their mobile devices with the people around them.

Robb is our projection expert. He built SDE – our patented technology – from the ground up and understands it fully. He leads his 16th start-up at the age of 22 as self-taught Lead Engineer and CEO on Project Wedge.

Keith spearheaded our patenting process, helps manage day to day operates, and finds a way to complete any task thrown at him. He has been instrumental in market research, product design, and all others function at Project Wedge.

Mark leads every step of the design process and has fabricated our prototypes, patent drawings, and even conceptual artwork for future models. Mark's also brings his business acumen and relentless optimism to our team.

Instead of spending time with those we love we tend to burry our heads into our mobile devices and ignore the people around us.

We didn't think the solution to this technological isolation was trying to get people to throw out their mobile devices. Rather, we thought that creating a device that could take singular experiences, and make them communal, would be the optimal solution.

With the Project Wedge we hope to solve this problem by creating a mobile projector that allows people to share the content from their devices in frictionless way. We wanted to make a device to allowed people to enjoy all the offerings of their mobile devices with the people around them.

successful transition in producing Project Wedge in large quantities.

have three different manufacturers we’ve established relationships to tentatively work with. We
will use this production run to fulfill all Indiegogo Perks.

The WifiDuino is the chip-sized Arduino + Wi-Fi + 128x64 OLED at low price that is easy to use.

WHAT IS IT?

WifiDuino is an open-source Arduino-compatible, wifi-enabled board. It
allows users to use Arduino IDE
(Integrated Development Environment) interface to write programs
directly, and with Wi-Fi function. WifiDuino is user friendly, get started in
no time. What’s different from Arduino Wi-Fi shield is that WifiDuino is a lot smaller
in size, cheaper and easier to use.
is an open source project, which means you are welcome to develop and improve
the project if you want. It is also ideal for beginners too. WifiDuino and Arduino
are used the same chip. You can quickly learn how to make things with WifiDuino
with its rich library resources from the Arduino database.
designed WifiDuino based on our belief in the future of the Internet of Things
when everything is connected to the internet. We will be living in a world when
every object can communicate with each other using Wi-Fi. You will be using
your cell phone to control any objects at home with Wi-Fi, which means your
home base objects will be smarter than they are now. WifiDuino is the future
hardware. We are excited to invite you to join our project to make WifiDuino a

reality. We need your support.


Small
size is perfect for wearable design and IOT project. It increases scalability

and usability for any projects. (25.6mm x 38.8mm x 11.0mm)


Easy set up Wi-Fi function

With
WifiDuino, you no longer need to worry about getting a Wi-Fi shield to
implement Wi-Fi function. WifiDuino has done the hard part for you. It’s great
for people who are tired of buying Wi-Fi shields every time you want the board
to be internet connected. All you need to do is get yourself a WifiDuino, a
Wi-Fi connected simple and easy-to-use electronic board to build everything

you’ve ever wanted to build.

WifiDuino set up process

1
Connect the WifiDuino board to your computer.
Install the Arduino IDE and start writing your code for WifiDuino
Set your smartphone or computer to the same LAN connection that your WifiDuino
Enjoy the fun of building things
believe that we’re entering the future where everything is connected to the
internet. We know the coming age of Internet of Things has the potential to
change the world and that’s why we created WifiDuino. In the near future, you
can easily control things at home with your internet-connected mobile devices
remotely. Our goal is to make better electronic boards to make our daily lives
more convenient in the world of IOT. WifiDuino is an open-source project that
welcomes everyone to share the research and development behind this great
following pictures are some of our WifiDuino projects and sensor test projects.
Our team enjoys getting the surrounded things connected to WifiDuino and enjoys
great experience of putting everything in the cloud. It’s great for people who
like to control devices remotely. WifiDuino, the next generation product, can
give you most exciting living experience in the world of Internet of Things.

We believe that the emerging technologies will come out from open source projects. That’s why we want WifiDuino to be open-sourced too. It is a fantastic way to develop and improve the current functions with the help of professional players and a great way to let beginners to join the conversation and start developing their own projects. Our research and development team would be happy to hear your ideas on this project too. We will be putting your design files on our website and share your ideas with the world. We do this to improve the project with great openness and efficiency.
of WifiDuino with similar arduino products and crow funding projects :
Full Arduino compatible and using Arduino IDE

More and more people are becoming incredibly fond of Arduino because of its simplicity and its user-friendliness. As its popularity skyrocketed, it came to the attention of us to design great boards for Arduino lovers. WifiDuino is simple, easy to pick up not only for Arduino users but for everybody, whether they are engineers, designers, students, to enjoy the fun of building things.
uses Arduino Leonardo as the basis for the development of modular, so users can
use WifiDuino as easy as using Arduino. Here’s the WifiDuino pinout diagram:
Committed to quality, our team wants to
make sure our products will not be manufactured without going through high
standard quality control. To ensure the best quality and reliability of our
product, we have done our testing before starting this crowd-founding campaign.
We will be shipping your orders 131 days after the campaign ends.

column4: > Wifi + Duino:. Purchase this perk, you get a Wi-Fi enabled WifiDuino.
>Duino + OLED: Purchase this perk, you get a Duino control board with OLED monitor screen . Please note that you will NOT have Wi-Fi functionality with this perk.
>Wifi + Duino + OLED: Purchase this perk, you get great Wi-Fi enabled WifiDuino with OLED monitor screen. You can control the images shown on OLED through Wi-Fi.

","The WifiDuino is the chip-sized Arduino + Wi-Fi + 128x64 OLED at low price that is easy to use.
WHAT IS IT?WifiDuino is an open-source Arduino-compatible, wifi-enabled board. It
allows users to use Arduino IDE
(Integrated Development Environment) interface to write programs
directly, and with Wi-Fi function. WifiDuino is user friendly, get started in
no time. What’s different from Arduino Wi-Fi shield is that WifiDuino is a lot smaller
in size, cheaper and easier to use.
is an open source project, which means you are welcome to develop and improve
the project if you want. It is also ideal for beginners too. WifiDuino and Arduino
are used the same chip. You can quickly learn how to make things with WifiDuino
with its rich library resources from the Arduino database.
designed WifiDuino based on our belief in the future of the Internet of Things
when everything is connected to the internet. We will be living in a world when
every object can communicate with each other using Wi-Fi. You will be using
your cell phone to control any objects at home with Wi-Fi, which means your
home base objects will be smarter than they are now. WifiDuino is the future
hardware. We are excited to invite you to join our project to make WifiDuino a
size is perfect for wearable design and IOT project. It increases scalability
and usability for any projects. (25.6mm x 38.8mm x 11.0mm)Easy set up Wi-Fi functionWith
WifiDuino, you no longer need to worry about getting a Wi-Fi shield to
implement Wi-Fi function. WifiDuino has done the hard part for you. It’s great
for people who are tired of buying Wi-Fi shields every time you want the board
to be internet connected. All you need to do is get yourself a WifiDuino, a
Wi-Fi connected simple and easy-to-use electronic board to build everything
you’ve ever wanted to build.WifiDuino set up process1
Connect the WifiDuino board to your computer.
Install the Arduino IDE and start writing your code for WifiDuino
Set your smartphone or computer to the same LAN connection that your WifiDuino
Enjoy the fun of building things
believe that we’re entering the future where everything is connected to the
internet. We know the coming age of Internet of Things has the potential to
change the world and that’s why we created WifiDuino. In the near future, you
can easily control things at home with your internet-connected mobile devices
remotely. Our goal is to make better electronic boards to make our daily lives
more convenient in the world of IOT. WifiDuino is an open-source project that
welcomes everyone to share the research and development behind this great
What can you do with it?
following pictures are some of our WifiDuino projects and sensor test projects.
Our team enjoys getting the surrounded things connected to WifiDuino and enjoys
great experience of putting everything in the cloud. It’s great for people who
like to control devices remotely. WifiDuino, the next generation product, can
give you most exciting living experience in the world of Internet of Things.

We believe that the emerging technologies will come out from open source projects. That’s why we want WifiDuino to be open-sourced too. It is a fantastic way to develop and improve the current functions with the help of professional players and a great way to let beginners to join the conversation and start developing their own projects. Our research and development team would be happy to hear your ideas on this project too. We will be putting your design files on our website and share your ideas with the world. We do this to improve the project with great openness and efficiency.
of WifiDuino with similar arduino products and crow funding projects :
Full Arduino compatible and using Arduino IDE

More and more people are becoming incredibly fond of Arduino because of its simplicity and its user-friendliness. As its popularity skyrocketed, it came to the attention of us to design great boards for Arduino lovers. WifiDuino is simple, easy to pick up not only for Arduino users but for everybody, whether they are engineers, designers, students, to enjoy the fun of building things.
uses Arduino Leonardo as the basis for the development of modular, so users can
use WifiDuino as easy as using Arduino. Here’s the WifiDuino pinout diagram:
Committed to quality, our team wants to
make sure our products will not be manufactured without going through high
standard quality control. To ensure the best quality and reliability of our
product, we have done our testing before starting this crowd-founding campaign.
We will be shipping your orders 131 days after the campaign ends.
Wifi + Duino:. Purchase this perk, you get a Wi-Fi enabled WifiDuino.
Duino + OLED: Purchase this perk, you get a Duino control board with OLED monitor screen . Please note that you will NOT have Wi-Fi functionality with this perk.
Wifi + Duino + OLED: Purchase this perk, you get great Wi-Fi enabled WifiDuino with OLED monitor screen. You can control the images shown on OLED through Wi-Fi.

The Arduino Logo, Arduino@Heart, and Arduino, Spark, MicroView and  Digispark Pro name are trademarks owned by Arduino LLC and their company. For more information on trademarks visit their website.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hydroguard is the world’s first affordable flood barrier that will fit to any standard door. Our mission at HydroGuard is to ensure that all people have access to an affordable, one-size-fits-all flood barrier option to help protect their homes from the calamities of flooding.

Presently available solutions such as sandbags are inadequate because they are cumbersome, unsanitary and not reusable. So when a flood situation does arise, homeowners encounter inconvenience and uncertainty. Other flood barriers are more expensive AND less adaptable to the user’s individual home.

column4: >As featured in The Gadget Show Live as one of the top inventions of 2014!

column2: >""Not only can you see it catching on in towns and villages, where it quickly becomes socially unacceptable not to own one, but it will also appeal to housing associations, and electricity and water companies who are obliged to pay for any damage caused by burst water mains and other incidents."" -Haggerston Times

column1:
Why HydroGuard?

With the current options that are available, it’s easy to feel defeated, overwhelmed and disenchanted about the issue. But, if you could save thousands of dollars in damage and preserve your valuable possessions and keepsakes with a simple solution, wouldn’t you do it? HydroGuard is a one-time investment that is simple to store and simple to engage when you need it. And, most importantly, it’s effective in keeping your home dry in the event of a flood, which is becoming a more and more frequent natural disaster. No more nailing and screwing in boards or expensive barriers, and no more scrambling to acquire sandbags before a flood and piling them up clumsily. Hello HydroGuard.

HydroGuard is 100% Unique

We know just how challenging a flooded home can be first-hand, so we have designed a more flexible and practical flood solution than any other currently on the market and there is no need to measure your door frame, due to our clever sliding technology.

Whether wood or UPVC, HydroGuard will fit to any door to create a barrier against rising flood water. The device creates a sealed barrier across your door and will allow you to say goodbye to sandbags or other barriers that are more expensive and only made for specific door sizes and types. 

Other manufacturers are using up to 6 different size units to cover the same width variance as HydroGuard does with one. What sets HydroGuard apart is its intelligent sliding system that adjusts to any door and can be fitted securely in place in seconds – a one size fits all solution. Whether you move or renovate, you will have your HydroGuard barriers to adapt to your needs.

Why is HydroGuard Better Than the Rest?

The HydroGuard flood barrier utilizes innovative technology to provide homeowners with features that have long been overlooked. Key differentiators include:

Compact and Easy to Install: HydroGuard has been designed so that it can be easily installed in minutes - simply remove from the box, expand to fit the door frame and clip into the frame. Unlike many other products, HydroGuard won’t require you to make permanent alterations to your property. HydroGuard fits securely to the door frame and cannot be removed with the door closed.

Adjustable: What makes HydroGuard entirely unique is the intelligent sliding system that allows it to fit to any standard door and create a barrier against rising flood water. Premium materials and robust design ensure a secure seal against fast flowing water and the debris it may carry. Other non-adjustable solutions cost anywhere from £324 - £498 ($537 - $826), so when you move or need them to fit another door, they prove defunct. 

Reusable: Flooding is becoming more frequent. Rather than having to repeatedly invest in flood prevention measures, HydroGuard can be easily stored and then deployed whenever you’re concerned about flooding. Sandbags, although cheap at £0.90 - £1.20, aren’t reusable, effective or easy to get quickly in the event of a flood. 

Affordable: HydroGuard offers all those concerned with flooding access to this revolutionary device at an affordable price. Remember, just a 6-inch flood in a 1,000 square foot home could cost £12,137 ($20,150). Investing in a few HydroGuard barriers is more than worth it. 

Easy to store: With its sliding capability HydroGuard can be pushed together to be conveniently stored even in small places.

The Story Behind HydroGuard

We didn’t just wake up one day and decide flooding was something we felt passionate about fixing - we’ve actually been there, so we know what it’s like to deal with the fallout of a flood. Not long ago, Hannes was an unfortunate victim of a devastating flood which damaged his property and destroyed valuable and treasured possessions. When the water receded, he reflected on what he could do to prevent such a situation from occurring again. To his dismay, there was no solution that met his requirements. And so, when the rains began again just months later, Hannes did all he could, deploying sandbags and moving his furniture, but to no avail. He was unlucky enough to be flooded on not one but two occasions.

Hannes watched with both empathy and frustration as floods continued to hit the news in the UK, devastating homes and destroying possessions. Feeling that there was no viable solution to help both himself and others to protect their homes, he decided he would go the distance to create one himself, and the concept of HydroGuard was born.

So with a rough idea of how such a solution could look, Hannes broached the idea with Robin and James and with the professional help of Studio17, who are proven industrial designers, we managed to come up with a product which met all of Hannes’ requirements, whilst maintaining a simple, streamlined design.

We are extremely excited to be realising our vision and making HydroGuard available for those who, like Hannes, need to protect their property against flooding.

So when a flood situation does arise, homeowners encounter inconvenience and uncertainty. Other flood barriers are more expensive AND less adaptable to the user’s individual home.

column2: >The first object that allows you to catch the big buzz on TV

column1: Buzzcatcher is a fun little object designed for your couch to capture and share your favorite TV moments!

column2: >How cool would it be if you could in a instant capture that moment you just loved on TV and get it sent to your smartphone app without even touching it?

column1: At Ekino, we thought it would be. We actually went and built a complete prototype of this object and tried it out. And it's the best TV experience we've had in years!
The next thing we felt was right was to bring Buzzcatcher to Indiegogo so you guys can be the first to capture and share your TV moments effortlessly.
We didn't built BuzzCatcher alone. Actually, it happens that you can't build any great product alone.

column2: >First let us tell you who we are. Ekino is a 200 people technologically focused web agency in Paris. We design and build award winning websites and mobile apps for great clients like Renault, Deezer, or even startups like Screenpulse, who built the technology behind Buzzcatcher.

column6: >Screenpulse is a french startup launched by Sébastien Gilles, Oxford PhD in Mathematics, who built an outstanding video and audio recognition technology. They know in real time what is happenning on any TV channel, and we are using their Shazaam-like magic at the core of Buzzcatcher and in the digital platform you'll hear about in the How it works section later on.

column1: We also partnered with designer Romain Cuvellier, already awarded for other technological products, who brought to Buzzcatcher his unique vision on designing a technological object that looks as friendly as your pillow! He has built the 3D model of Buzzcatcher and the first prototypes with his own hands.

column2: >""Going beyond a simple remote control, cold and covered with buttons, for me this device should be able to capture the emotions of its user and share it with his community, simply and efficiently. Buzzcatcher is therefor a solid and robust tool""

>""Buzzcatcher is a hyprid object for your living room, with a half organic, half rigid design.
It's a technical monolith, wrapped in a sensitive and communicative skin.”

>""This skin is capable of capturing and understanding the emotions of the user. Then to show him it has received and understood the information thanks to a visual feedback: a colored light sequence, even visible at night""

column1: ""Depending on his mood, the user could press or litterally smash the object, without ever worrying about damaging it”

column2: >""Buzzcatcher will work simply laid on your living room table,

column1: but thanks to its friendly ""soft touch” texture, it was designed to be pleasant in hand. It is also a fun object you will take pleasure in playing with without even thinking about it""

column4: >""Buzzcatcher to handle with care, or not...""

column2: >So far, we've built a functional prototype, integrated the Screepulse technology on it, built the actual Buzzcatcher object, and the the foundations of the digital platform.
>to go from this great idea to a product that sits right next to your TV and that is going to change how you look at and share television.

column1: Buzzcatcher is made up of a controler, a box, a mobile application and a digital platform.
The controler communicates with the box through radio waves. It sends a signal to trigger an interaction with the TV.
It can also receive a signal to signal a feedback for the interaction.
When the user wants to capture video, he presses Bzzcatcher. Which triggers a recording of the TV sound by the box.
This sound is sent to a digital platform that live captures all TV channels.
Thanks to ScreenPulse fingerprinting technology (http://www.screenpulse.tv/), the platform identifies the channel being watched.

The video instant is sent to the user's smartphone app. He can then edit the video on his application, or simply select a picture, add a title and share it on social networks, but also store it in a personal gallery.
Free public WiFi(HotSpot) are not supported
WiFi 802.11 b/g/n (Compatible with WiFi 802.11 b/g/n -  Open/WEP/WPA/WPA-2personnal(TKIP &amp

column4:
>Find more information about Buzzcatcher and the team behind it on Buzzcatcher.io

","The first object that allows you to catch the big buzz on TV

column1: Buzzcatcher is a fun little object designed for your couch to capture and share your favorite TV moments!
How cool would it be if you could in a instant capture that moment you just loved on TV and get it sent to your smartphone app without even touching it?
At Ekino, we thought it would be. We actually went and built a complete prototype of this object and tried it out. And it's the best TV experience we've had in years!
The next thing we felt was right was to bring Buzzcatcher to Indiegogo so you guys can be the first to capture and share your TV moments effortlessly.
We didn't built BuzzCatcher alone. Actually, it happens that you can't build any great product alone.

First let us tell you who we are. Ekino is a 200 people technologically focused web agency in Paris. We design and build award winning websites and mobile apps for great clients like Renault, Deezer, or even startups like Screenpulse, who built the technology behind Buzzcatcher.

Screenpulse is a french startup launched by Sébastien Gilles, Oxford PhD in Mathematics, who built an outstanding video and audio recognition technology. They know in real time what is happenning on any TV channel, and we are using their Shazaam-like magic at the core of Buzzcatcher and in the digital platform you'll hear about in the How it works section later on.
Buzzcatcher / design story  by Romain Cuvellier

We also partnered with designer Romain Cuvellier, already awarded for other technological products, who brought to Buzzcatcher his unique vision on designing a technological object that looks as friendly as your pillow! He has built the 3D model of Buzzcatcher and the first prototypes with his own hands.
What Romain tells us about Buzzcatcher :

Going beyond a simple remote control, cold and covered with buttons, for me this device should be able to capture the emotions of its user and share it with his community, simply and efficiently. Buzzcatcher is therefor a solid and robust tool""
Buzzcatcher is a hyprid object for your living room, with a half organic, half rigid design.It's a technical monolith, wrapped in a sensitive and communicative skin.”

This skin is capable of capturing and understanding the emotions of the user. Then to show him it has received and understood the information thanks to a visual feedback: a colored light sequence, even visible at night""
Depending on his mood, the user could press or litterally smash the object, without ever worrying about damaging it”
Buzzcatcher will work simply laid on your living room table,
but thanks to its friendly ""soft touch” texture, it was designed to be pleasant in hand. It is also a fun object you will take pleasure in playing with without even thinking about it""
Buzzcatcher to handle with care, or not...""
So far, we've built a functional prototype, integrated the Screepulse technology on it, built the actual Buzzcatcher object, and the the foundations of the digital platform.
to go from this great idea to a product that sits right next to your TV and that is going to change how you look at and share television.

The controler communicates with the box through radio waves. It sends a signal to trigger an interaction with the TV.
It can also receive a signal to signal a feedback for the interaction.
When the user wants to capture video, he presses Bzzcatcher. Which triggers a recording of the TV sound by the box.
This sound is sent to a digital platform that live captures all TV channels.
Thanks to ScreenPulse fingerprinting technology (http://www.screenpulse.tv/), the platform identifies the channel being watched.

The video instant is sent to the user's smartphone app. He can then edit the video on his application, or simply select a picture, add a title and share it on social networks, but also store it in a personal gallery.

Our city was hit by an earthquake two years ago. The fieldworkers have been using iPads to record the earthquake damage as they work around the city. We've been repairing these iPads after they've been damaged. Most damage occurs when they are dropped - even though the iPads are kept in 'protective' cases.
It's clear that these cases aren't doing a great job of protecting the iPads.

So, we designed and built an iPad drop-test rig in a lab at local University testing facilities. Over a period of 6 months we dropped iPads thousands of times in many different protective cases and sleeves.

Everything was controlled and measured - we placed strain gauges on the glass panel, measured the acceleration and used load cells to measure impact force. We even used an electromagnet to control the consistency of all the drop tests.

The results were interesting. It turns out that even the most rugged-looking cases are almost useless in protecting the iPads in a drop. In some cases you would be better off without a case on your iPad.

A good protective case should have a small peak impact force. The smaller this peak impact force, the less damage the iPad is likely to sustain. The peak impact force can be seen as the sharp downwards spike on the left-hand side of the load cell output charts below.

Based on these results we thought we could make a better protective system to help prevent iPad damage. We've spent the last year designing and developing the best iPad protection system in the world. We call it Fullstop for iPad.

Fullstop for iPad provides full and easy access to all the iPad ports and cameras. Fullstop features a hand strap on the back which fieldworkers love - it makes it easy to hold the iPad, and helps prevent the iPad slipping out of your hand.

Fullstop leaves almost 90% of the iPad surface area open so that Apple’s gorgeous design isn't compromised. It's simply maximum protection with minimum bulk (amazing, huh?). The protection system weighs a mere 126g, that's around one third of the weight of comparable drop protection cases.

We've drop-tested Fullstop using the same testing rig (complete with load cells, strain gauges and accelerometers) to verify the performance of Fullstop protection system exceeded that of other protective cases.

The red and blue curves at the bottom represent the impact force of Fullstop made from TPU and silicone. The flat shape of the curve means the Fullstop outperformed every other case by a significant margin.
But we didn't stop there. We selected a specific shore hardness of silicone to provide a perfect balance between high shock absorbtion and great durability.
We've spent the last twelve months developing, testing and prototyping the Fullstop protection system. We need your help to raise $9000 to assist us in initial production and tooling costs.
We're giving all contributors a chance to get their own Fullstop protection system from $29 delivered instead of the expected $49 retail price.
All contributors will receive a booklet telling our story, from initial testing, through to development and production of Fullstop. The booklet even has color pictures!

We're a small and motivated team based in Christchurch, New Zealand who have a great track record. We run a successful iPad repair company, with branches across New Zealand and Australia. We've also developed our own range of iPhone accessories through voBack and distributed them to over forty countries.
For this project we've pulled in a wider team including engineers with expertise in impact mechanics and strong product development and testing experience.
We expect to have your Fullstop protection system on your iPad in mid-February 2013. This is based on a realistic timeline (above) with reasonable contingency.
The default colour is matte black. The Fullstop:Color range includes six colours which have yet to be finalised, but will be voted on before the end of the campaign.
What happens if I drop my iPad face down?
When an iPad is dropped it follows the path of least resistance - falling on an edge - which is protected by Fullstop.
Fullstop has been designed in Christchurch, New Zealand and will be manufactured in Shenzhen, China.
Email us at: hello@fullstophq.com or Tweet or FaceBook us.

We believe that being Premium is not a price tag, but a philosophy – a way of life. For the very first time,  U1 brings premium quality design, craftsmanship, and unique features, all accessible within the palm of your hands.

column5: >U1 Labs brought together ex Samsung and Huawei engineers to help us achieve the quality and slow motion aspect of the device which took 6 months. Industry experts who are passionate about their work. The team that built the U1 kept the design integrity intact while working on making the design hardware go perfectly in Sync with future proof hardware.

column4:
/>

The U1 has already been mentioned in the media and we hope that many more will soon follow.

directly to your lock-screen. Now access your camera, music player, calendar,

*The U1 will be featured with its very
own Radial OS available for free of charge update after delivery, for all users.
Built on Android Marshmallow, it oozes minimalistic charm. By cutting out frivolities, we help you focus on your tasks while
maintaining a buttery smooth, delightful User Experience.

As all start-ups, we have faced many challenges and challengers along our way. We have also been supported by many. We have turned a dream into a tangible reality and we now need your support in order to break through all the challenges and bring the U1 into the hands of not hundreds, but thousands, scaling up our production capabilities.

We are designers and tech-passionate, consumers, just like you, tired of the saturation and monopoly we see every day in the field of technology. That’s what drives our inspiration, making us eager to offer you a Premium User Experience for an accessible price.
We believe high quality should be accessible to all users and this motto has been our driver, guiding us through this journey, a journey in which we now invite you to join us as partners.
