I have been in the Telco industry for many years and have quite often seen an opportunity to bring products to market that offer a practical solution to customers. With so many years experience I have many industry contacts but they all wanted a finished product before taking it for distribution and that is where you come in.
While I have been able to make the concept work with simple components, this money will allow me to have a product die created and finishing the app.

I, like many others with iPhones have had two distinct but similar problems. I am either waiting for an important call or message and constantly waking my phone to check or I have left my phone and not known that I missed a call or text. What I have created is a case that not only protects your phone but also illuminates to alert you on an ongoing basis of calls and text but also drawing less power than waking your phone over and over. A soft light will glow from the case when a call or text hasn’t been checked. The case can glow for up to 50 hours before the phone needs to be recharged.

The case itself is made from strong polycarbonate with a soft touch feel with the LED filament built in to the case for minimum bulk. There also three colours available - Black/Green, Purple/Pink and White/Purple with images of each viewable on the Electron iPhone Case Facebook page
Don't settle for case that does nothing but stop the odd scratch, get a case that works for you.

column2: >POP is the perfect add on for iPhones and Android phone models in which it is no longer possible to switch out the battery. With POP, you can finally stop having to carry
column3: > around messes of charging cables or bulky power banks in your pockets in order to ensure your phone lasts as long as you need it to.

column2: >Need to charge up your phone but still have to use it? POP is the best way to do that on the go.
>POP is compact, resistant and designed to attach seamlessly to your telephone thanks to its polyurethane gel strip backing.

column1:
If you use your cell phone a lot during the day or if you're a photographer or film maker, POP ensures that you'll never run out of energy when you need it the most. You can keep extra batteries on hand and switch them immediately so that you can keep using your phone without any down time.

POP is made of slip proof plastic to guarantee good grip when you hold your smartphone.
Stop messing with cables and bulky power banks when you're out and about!
POP can be used with a bumper
POP charges both auxiliary and smartphone battery at the same time

The first POP prototypes were made using professional 3D printers. The aim of our Indiegogo campaign is to raise the necessary funds to industrialize the production and to get a pre-order large enough to cover the costs of molds and the assembly process.
What can I use POP with?
column2: >POP works with iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s (and 6s plus). It also works on all Android phones that have centrally placed micro USB charging port.

column3: >POP will be certified FCC and CEE.

column2:
>What type of protection does POP have for charging?
POP has a circuit that protects against overvoltage.

>Why do I have to buy the battery from you?
You don't have to! We offer batteries that we can order bulk from our suppliers in order to offer you a fully functioning product straight out of the box, but you can buy your battery by yourself.

>Can I use POP with a case/bumper?
Yes!

When I'm charging POP with my Smartphone attached, can I sync data between my phone and my computer at the same time?
Yes!

column1: ","POP is the perfect add on for iPhones and Android phone models in which it is no longer possible to switch out the battery. With POP, you can finally stop having to carry around messes of charging cables or bulky power banks in your pockets in order to ensure your phone lasts as long as you need it to.
Need to charge up your phone but still have to use it? POP is the best way to do that on the go.
POP is compact, resistant and designed to attach seamlessly to your telephone thanks to its polyurethane gel strip backing.

If you use your cell phone a lot during the day or if you're a photographer or film maker, POP ensures that you'll never run out of energy when you need it the most. You can keep extra batteries on hand and switch them immediately so that you can keep using your phone without any down time.POP is made of slip proof plastic to guarantee good grip when you hold your smartphone.
Stop messing with cables and bulky power banks when you're out and about!
POP can be used with a bumper
POP charges both auxiliary and smartphone battery at the same time

The first POP prototypes were made using professional 3D printers. The aim of our Indiegogo campaign is to raise the necessary funds to industrialize the production and to get a pre-order large enough to cover the costs of molds and the assembly process.
What can I use POP with?POP works with iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s (and 6s plus). It also works on all Android phones that have centrally placed micro USB charging port.
Is POP safe?POP will be certified FCC and CEE.
What type of protection does POP have for charging?POP has a circuit that protects against overvoltage.

Why do I have to buy the battery from you?You don't have to! We offer batteries that we can order bulk from our suppliers in order to offer you a fully functioning product straight out of the box, but you can buy your battery by yourself.
Can I use POP with a case/bumper?Yes!When I'm charging POP with my Smartphone attached, can I sync data between my phone and my computer at the same time?Yes!",13.0,0,"1 Campaign
We understand how frustrating it is to run out of
power when you are on the road or when you really need to use your cell phone.
After looking at the existing chargers in the market, we decided that there has

to be a better solution than those battery packs with misleading LED indicators. Not only that, but they also don't have enough power, or are too heavy, have a short battery life, out of style, or claim to hold more charge than they actually. 

That is why we developed the Fig: the first
mobile power bank to offer a live organic LED display that accurately tells its
user how much charge is remaining, and what exactly is going on with their
device. Whether you need to charge your Iphone, Android phone, camera, tablet, handheld toy, or your USB flash light. The Fig displays the actual current that is drained
by your device to help you determine if your device is working and charging
properly or not. Now that is cool!

Never run out of battery again:

Number of charges for a typical smart phone:

6,000 mAh model:     3+ complete charges
To keep it plain and simple, we want to become the
power bank experts. To reach our goal, our plan is to utilize our past
experience in circuit design, integrate the latest SW with our hardware, and
outsource our production to the leading manufacturing experts. This will ensure we bring
you the best power banks in the market. We will continually strive on
improving our design by taking your feedback, keeping up with the newest
technologies in power management design, and utilizing the latest battery
technologies available in the market.
We are so confident in the quality of our work that we offer a 1 year warranty on all of our products. Not too many power
bank manufacturers can do this because of the cheap batteries and low quality material that
With the growing concern of users improperly disposing their Li-Ion batteries, we have developed an initiative to help save the
environment. After pre-ordering your unit today, we will give you a $10 credit
when you return your battery pack one year from the date purchased. This allows us to dispose of
your used battery properly through recycling centers (to help save the
environment). This way you can make sure that you always have the latest mobile
charger, and be assured that you are not harming the <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2:
>environment.

Solar Panel:

If you purchase the Campers Package or one of the combo packages, they will come with this cool and powerful solar panel that can be used when you are camping or out in the wilderness. This panel can charge your 6,000 mAh unit in less than 12 hours from the sun, that's equivalent to 3 full charges on your cell phone.


Campers Package:

column1: Our biggest challenge was working on the hardware
design. When designing from scratch, there are so many different options and
paths to choose from that make it that much harder to start the design. But
after studying all of our options and deciding on the design path, everything
else fell in place. We received a lot of helpful tips from different industry
experts in terms of circuit design, SW development, CAD design (Mechanical),
and manufacturing. Obviously there were a lot of bumps along the road, and technical difficulties, but with persistence and hard work, we were able to

overcome these challenges. 

Now, we have one final obstacle before we can bring
the Fig into production. That is why we need your help and support to pay for
some of the tooling costs. We also want to perform some testing in approved
labs to have proper certification before going out into the market.
Below is a breakdown of the remaining costs that we need to address:

column3: >Battery testing station at factory:

column1: Below is an overview of our design process and next

steps to make this product a reality:

Manual assembly process at plant:
As we stated previously, most backup batteries in today's market only offer a 3 or 4 LED indicator for the remaining battery charge. A lot of times these LED's are very
misleading because of the cheap and inaccurate design. Not only that, but a majority of the these power banks claim to hold a charge that they truly don’t

because of the low battery grade they use. Otherwise they are too bulky or unattractive. 

The Fig solves all of
these issues by accurately indicating the exact charge remaining in your battery with a
percentage indicator. Also, it lets you know exactly what your battery is doing, whether charging or discharging, and how much current
your mobile device is drawing. It also comes in a light weight, modern, and eye
catching design that is sure to attract attention when used around friends or family. Last but not least
column2: quality. The Fig is made using the highest grade material,

column1: (internally and externally), uses the latest processes and technologies, and uses
a battery that has a longer life than competing chargers. In fact, after
testing we noticed that when charging your phone with the Fig, the charge on
your phone lasts longer than when charged with your normal wall adapter.  Awesome right?

OVERALL SUMMARY

Everyday Flower website contains resource of many types of flowers. Our aim is to make people learn, remember and recognize as many trees/ flowers as they can. Are you feel silly when you are sure you have seen this flower but cannot remember its name?

CAMPAIGN GOAL AND USE OF CONTRIBUTIONS

We are raising $1,000 to complete our website. As supporter, you can actively test the website and help us fill up the resource. I ensure that your knowledge of trees/flowers will be much more gained.

The target budget enables to collect the information, complete all features and approach the best way to learn as much as everybody can.

WHY SUPPORT US
Do you love nature? Do you love the colour of flowers around you? Show your love by telling to other people its name as excact and quick as you can.
We love that and feel happy to see other people also love that.
• Khoi, Vu Minh – Technical Lead, Website Developer
• Tham, Do Thi Hoang – Human Resource, Finaincal
• Huge resource of flowers, trees in over the world
• Every user has own page content, layout which can set the preference of flowers, trees by country, color, lifetime ...
• System of points  which can gain by passing guess-game, contribution to resource and many interesting activities in the website

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

ZÙN ZÙN is building the first open source social app that is owned and controlled by its users.
","ZÙN ZÙN is building the first open source social app that is owned and controlled by its users.

0,"

Dear Supporter,
Thanks for checking out my project. I hope you are as excited as I am about the prospect of a new type and innovative social plaform.

With your help we can start a new phase of social networking by creating some new concepts to have a platform which more fit our real life. With much more flexibility and customization, total control and full coverage of our privacy and information plus many services for free.

I have found many restrictions, issues and sometimes complexities using some common social networks so almost six months ago I started to brainstorm about something better that can meet the demands of our lives. At the beginning, I started coding for passion but as my solution was taking form I received encouragement from people who were having issues with existing socials and were looking for an alternative, something a bit more personal, easy to use and versatile.

My goal is to start a new phase in socials scenario. An improved and refined social platfom.
I must raise enough money to take the platform I started developing through the beta design into final development. With your support I will move it from the beta version where it is now to a new and innovative finished platform by the end of March 2013.
More In One is a re-thought concept of a social platform that will move socials a step forward.
<div>It allows to easily configure a custom social environment by selecting capabilities users need
column2: for small/medium business, fun, work or just networking.

column1: <div>We truly believe that socials should start a new evolution
column2: something that can fit our personality and be integrated with our reality.

column1: Socials should be as dynamic as our thoughts on life (or interactions in life) and they have to be closer to our human aspect.
More In One (or mio) is not just a name for this product but it is the perfect match of two concepts:

• More In One is the real human representation of a single physical person with more aspects and interests.
    In real life we interact with different people and we introduce ourselves in a different way based on the relationship we have established or that we want to establish in the future.
    We have friends, colleagues, family members and so on. For each one of them, we are not the same entity.
• More In One is modular and the nature of this system works like a container that provides many different services.
Social networks do not fit real life issues.

We spend significant hours connected on Internet and every day we use different social networks to read or share info by/with our friends/contacts. We share photos, status updates, links and so on. However, this level of interaction does not resolve our issues or needs in real life.
Existing social networks do not support our life making easy to plan activities such as plan to go out, meet people have (some of) our same interests or go to watch a movie.
Basically, they do not add experiences matching our feeling, although, they are generating new types of issues.

We are spending a relevant effort to design a nice user interface and an innovative user experience and our mission is build this platform to give people a new and innovative tool. We want involve our users!
Users will make a silver pledge (and up) have the chance to discuss with us some aspects during the build of the platform to make it closer to their preferences.
Default Dashboard (contacts, calendar, news and messages are default modules)
More In One (mio) seeks to redefine social media and how people will use social networking sites.
More In One aims to give users the option of managing social networking, media sharing, collaboration, and various other social activities in one place.

It provides tools and capabilities to “do things” in life by interacting on different levels of our real aspect. Moreover, More In One aims to use only the capabilities we really want to use by configuring a custom platform which better matches our needs or interests.

More In One is made by free modules which users can easily use to configure their custom social environment by selecting certain capabilities they need for business purposes or fun.

The relevant point in More In One, at the moment, are:

Multiple profile managementMore In One is a service that works as a unique place able to manage specific capabilities we can only use by registering on several different sites.
Inside our platform we designed improved and more powerful services in one place and all for free!

Social networks becoming more exclusive
We have introduced Actions that can be used to involve our friends in real life.
Moreover, we have designed a Social Discovering module able to show us new connections based on the type of connection we are looking for (at the moment).

Privacy issues and data control
We have designed a better system to organize all your contacts using a real perspective of human interaction.
You can manage dedicated Aspects as separate worlds, designating a specific profile that will fit better with each aspects and at the same time keep them well organized.
We have developed a privacy control where you do not have to worry anymore about hiding or protecting your personal information, because the platform already provides a secure method to display your info without any set policy. In fact, it prevents your contacts to know more than what you want them to know. No more leaks and issues with private information and visibility.

Bridge the gap between socials and real experiences
More In One has been designed to be a social which better interact on different levels of our daily life. In fact, it helps its users to add real experiences in their life instead to increase a virtual life on internet.

More effective pages to promote business/hobbies
We are proud about our module called Activities. This is a clever module which allows users to easily create very powerful pages by selecting plug and play features.
Whatever you want to promote: your rock band, your shop, your hobbies or your brand, you can now create specific pages and have e-commerce solutions and much more already embedded.

I have personally faced some frustrations using existing socials and have noticed how other people had the same complaints. Their feedback and encouragement to develop an alternate/enhanced social led me to work on this platform.
My goal is to create something useful that can influence how we make connections. I truly believe that socials should provide something more
column2: something that can fit our personality and be integrated with our reality. Socials should be as dynamic as our thoughts on life (or interactions in life) and they have to be closer to our human aspect.

column1: I developed a beta by investing my personal finances and time, but before I launch it there are things I would like to include and improve and some of the costs I cannot afford without support. For instance:
• I need to improve my server with something stronger in order to guarantee always the best service.
• I need to enlarge the team with some developers and expert designers.
• After introducing More In One, a percentage of the money will be invested in marketing activities when the project is ready to be launch.
We have 37 days to make it happen and we would not be able to do it without you! You are life-blood in the process.

More effective pages to promote business/hobbiesWe are proud about our module called Activities. This is a clever module which allows users to easily create very powerful pages by selecting plug and play features.Whatever you want to promote: your rock band, your shop, your hobbies or your brand, you can now create specific pages and have e-commerce solutions and much more already embedded.

I have personally faced some frustrations using existing socials and have noticed how other people had the same complaints. Their feedback and encouragement to develop an alternate/enhanced social led me to work on this platform.
My goal is to create something useful that can influence how we make connections. I truly believe that socials should provide something more
column2: something that can fit our personality and be integrated with our reality. Socials should be as dynamic as our thoughts on life (or interactions in life) and they have to be closer to our human aspect.

column1: I developed a beta by investing my personal finances and time, but before I launch it there are things I would like to include and improve and some of the costs I cannot afford without support. For instance:
I need to improve my server with something stronger in order to guarantee always the best service.
I need to enlarge the team with some developers and expert designers.
After introducing More In One, a percentage of the money will be invested in marketing activities when the project is ready to be launch.
We have 37 days to make it happen and we would not be able to do it without you! You are life-blood in the process.
At Arnexa we have a new and innovative way of helping people develop a savings habit.
A simple and elegant free iPhone app is already available that demonstrates our approach to helping people set simple savings goals, report progress and meet them.
This IndieGogo campaign is to fund version 2 of our app that adds in crucial features to help make the app more useful to users and to grow the user community.

Version 2 (which we will build if we are successful in our fund raising) will also be free.   This means that (technically) you can wait for others to back version 2 - and benefit from their investment.   However, if after using our version 1 of the app, you are impressed, we'd welcome your backing and support.
Only iPhone will be supported now. Android will come later unless we wildly exceed our fund raising target (would be nice, huh?).

If someone was trying to combat alcoholism, would your only solution be sending them to class or increasing the price of their alcohol?  If someone was trying to lose weight, would you attempt to help them by only giving them better looking bathroom scales?
Why then if someone is struggling to save money are we not immediately repulsed that the only current answers seem to be in budget tools, classes and coupons?

At Arnexa, we have assembled a group of entrepreneurs, engineers, academicians and business experts with many decades of experience in entrepreneurship, software, financial institutions and economics with a unique approach to addressing the ""savings"" problem in which we tap the motivation of individuals to do better.  How do we do this?  We address this in our introductory video  above.

We have already implemented the key ideas in how to motivate individuals in the first version of our app which is already available in the App Store.   Here's a quick video that walks you through the current app.
Please install the app if you have an iPhone and use it now.  Feedback always welcome (whether or not you choose to back us in our quest to develop version 2 of this app).
What we plan to do with the money raised

This Indiegogo project is to build version 2 of our iPhone app so that we can round out the features that would be most useful for users and grow the user community. This version will provide the following high level features and will also be available FREE:
• Add ability for users to invite their friends and family members into Arnexa.

• Add core ""social"" features for users to be able to share their goals and goal achievements at Facebook.  This goes to the core of the idea of celebration at the end of difficult endeavors - this helps and motivates one to keep on the savings path.
• Today users can see the leader board entries but not the profiles of the people at the top. We plan to add this - so that users can see the profiles of those who are the top savers in Arnexa.

Social features are essential to savings (which hitherto have been done solo).  This is because positive affirmations from family, friends (or, savings club partners, etc.) upon meeting goals really helps with motivation and drive.
In version 1 of our app we have a basic scoring and stats engine (streaks, ranking, etc.).  In version 2 we plan to improve this as we get better &
column2: more data so that the stats, notifications and other features become more compelling. For example, as time elapses and user does not make progress towards a goal, does the user run the risk of ""missing"" the goal?  Currently we have a basic ""risk assessment algorithm"".  We can fine-tune this algorithm to make sure that alerts/notifications about potential goal ""miss"" becomes more accurate and can help the ""at-risk"" user.  We discuss this aspect of ""cohort analysis"" in the video below.

column1: Crucial as the features that we have enumerated are, it is just as important that we also grow the number of users of the Arnexa app. The greater the number of users, the greater is the accuracy of our statistical analysis, leader boards, predictions, etc.  To grow the user base, we also will be running campaigns on social media, working with community colleges and schools which have ""financial literacy"" programs as well as employers who are interested in furthering the financial well-being of their employees.

We are looking to raise $11,000 to build out the next version of our app (the features that will be added are listed in the previous section).   Of crucial importance is that we are interested not just in your money but in your use of our product.  Uniquely compared to other Indiegogo projects, we already have a free version of the app available for you to install and use on your iPhone.  You can use it, see if you find it beneficial, and decide for yourself whether you buy into the Arnexa vision for how people may benefit from using our app.
If you do happen to buy our vision, we'd love your help in funding version 2 of the app and growing the user ecosystem.

We plan to roll out features as soon as they become ready.  Some features like social media support may roll out as early as September, others such as better analytics and scoring will roll out later in the Fall (October/November).
Since version 2 is going to be free we cannot offer you discounts. So we are offering you the following super simple items in our perks:

Backers get their names mentioned at our ""Contributors"" wall on our website. At your option, your name can be withheld and just display your initials (for those who may desire that level of privacy).

For backers at the $15 level or above, you also get ""Savings Challenge"" coins.  The number of coins you get depends on which perk you opt for. These coins are made of wood (approx. 1.5"" in diameter).  They will have the Arnexa logo on one side and our tag line ""Save today. Prosper tomorrow."" on the other.  Colors and font-type are approximate only.


The idea behind the savings coin comes to us from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and is based on the simple idea that tactile reminders can often be very effective  in influencing change and habit formation.  Put a coin in your pocket or purse and reach for it when you have the urge to spend - the tactile reminder may help you spend less or even defer your spending. In either case, record the savings in our app!

Savings (or, lack thereof) is a crucial problem in the United States.  Research has shown that the average American would have difficulty in handling an unplanned $400 emergency (see Federal Reserve Research Report on Household Economic Wellbeing May 2016).  Our app cannot cure all societal ills related to savings.

We believe our approach can make a dent in this problem. Our approach while unique in the savings arena has nonetheless been widely used in other areas to help athletes gain superior performance, addicts to combat addictions, etc.  In each area, the central tenets underlying the Arnexa app have been shown to work.
As our app helps drive improved savings from those who would otherwise find themselves in a hole, we think we'd have made an immense contribution to society. And, we'd have you to thank as well!
Most importantly, you'd not be just a backer - you would hopefully be a regular and avid user of the app - which hopefully would have beneficial effects for you and your family as well!

Our team consists of outstanding software engineers, technical and business advisors.  We have brought on top-notch business advisors because we want to bring the Arnexa app functionality to the broadest user base possible.  We will be working with our advisors to explore embedding our app functionality into apps/services provided by partners (employers, unions, schools, etc.) so that those users can benefit as well.

In addition, our mobile apps are built by an outstanding team of engineers and designers at Yalantis in Ukraine who helped build the first version as well.  Talented, motivated and possessed of a design versatility, they bring hundreds of person-years experience in building/executing on mobile projects with quality and efficiency.

At our cost, we have already built and released a free version of the app (download it and try it). We are confident that we can deliver on version 2 because it builds upon the building blocks already laid down in version 1.   Unlike other IndieGogo projects, we are NOT starting from scratch.  We already have a running app that is already serving existing users - which you can try out NOW.
We need to enhance the service to provide increased value.  We know how to do that.

Perhaps the only risk we suffer is that of schedule risk - our app may release about 1 month later than planned.  This invariably happens in software projects as work expands to fill the available time (and beyond).
Thanks for reading this!  We'd love your help in any way you can.  Here are few concrete ways:
Download and use our current version of the app.  Give us feedback (just hit the contact us link at the Arnexa website), or send us a message on our Facebook page (facebook.com/arnexa)
• Contribute at any level that you are comfortable at.
• Share this link with others (via email or social media) who you believe may value our efforts and would like to help.
• Make some noise at the Arnexa Facebook page.

• If your experience with the Arnexa app is positive, share a positive review both at our Facebook page as well as at the App Store product review.  The more people that hear about us, the more likely we will be able to build out our product and realize our vision.

Remember that the version 2 of our app will only support iPhones.  If you have an Android (or, other) device, we plan to support those other devices at a later date. Stay tuned, share your email address with us so we can keep you updated with developments about support for your device.

What is goVIP?

The revolutionary new way to enjoy VIP bottle service whenever you want. goVIP is an app that allows you to start or join VIP tables at the hottest nightclubs in major cities. goVIP gives you the freedom to pay only for your share of the bottle service, whether it’s just you or your guest(s). goVIP gives you the spontaneous and fun VIP bottle experience we know you want.


Why You Will Love It

Never put together a group again. Never front the entire bill again. Meet new people. The reasons are endless! Whether you’re looking to mingle and meet new people, or relax with your significant other while enjoying VIP bottle service, goVIP is the answer you’ve been waiting for. Do you really want to coordinate with 10 other people to get a table and hope they pay you back? Do you really think you and a couple buddies can drink that 12 liter Bollinger? With goVIP, simply pick up your smartphone and with a few clicks a complete VIP bottle service will be waiting for you.


How It Works
column4:
>

We know the Indiegogo community anticipates the

column1: most exciting and revolutionary ideas in order to bring them to fruition and
incorporate them in their daily lives. We believe the goVIP app will fill a
void in the accessibility of the VIP bottle service experience and can change
the way you choose to party. Your opinions and support mean everything to
us. The funding will be used to finish and enhance the app, integrate it with
popular nightclubs, and engage people’s interest to make it the most widely used

app of its kind.


About Me

My name is Ibad Azmi. I came up with this idea after being faced countless times with having to pay for a VIP table at a venue or having to get a large group together when I might just want to go out with my wife and neither of us are drinking. We would love to have an easy way to invite friends for a night on the town or just meet new people.

My professional background is in Predictive Analytics - combining data with statistical models to predict the probability of things. I have extensive experience in both database and software development. My passion is to make things more efficient and to solve problems.

I would love to use this service for myself and am hoping the Indiegogo community can make this into a reality for me, my friends and everyone else.

The FanMian cable is a very powerful tool. It’s a first-of-its-kind dual-direction, fast-charging, multi-device, robust, repairable data and power cable. Yes – it does all that! 

2.1 billion people now own and use a smart phone. In fact, many of you own two. And you probably know a friend or family member who owns a different type of device than you do. 

Even at home, regardless of what type of phone you own, you and your family need many types of cables, from the micro USB to the Apple Lightning to the USB-C, which will be universal cable of the future. 

On top of your phone, you use so many other devices too. At any given time, you likely have headphones, a portable charger, portable speaker or GPS sat-nav in your car – all of which need to be charged too.

How many cables do you need to keep your devices charged?

Answer: Probably too many to count! 

That means a cable for each device, plus backups for those cables. In the end, you have to carry a whole tangle of cables to keep your devices running smoothly.It’s a waste of time and space to carry so many cables for all your devices and the situations you might find ourselves in.

And most cables you own are made to deteriorate. They are made from cheap materials and are designed to break. (And evil plan to force you to buy new ones.)

The FanMian cable can literally be compatible with all devices on the market . Life is too short to fuss over long, tangled cables - tailor the FanMian cable to suit your needs. If you need a long cable, leave it as is. If you want a short cable – simply cut it to size. You can even turn the remaining cable into a second (or third) custom cable – nothing goes to waste. 

How easy is it to customize the FanMian cable?

It’s as easy as 1,2,3.

1. To create your custom cable, use the tool to cut it to the desired length, then:

2. Open the latch-clamp on the single form and click it back into place over the end of the cut cable.  

3. If required, change the adaptor on the un-cut end to customize the cable as needed to connect your required devices.  

1· USB-C adaptor futureproofs your device so that you can use it with newer laptops, tablets and other mobile devices. 

· Lightning adaptor can be used with current iPhone and iPads.

· Micro-USB adaptor – the most widely used adaptor everywhere.

· USB adaptor – connect to almost every laptop in the world or mobile charger.

Stop worrying about untangling cables. You no longer have to wrestle with cable ties to get your multiple cables in order either. 

And since you won’t have cables running across your table-tops or sticking out of every power socket, your room will look neat, tidy and free of clutter.

Unlike most other cables, the FanMian cable is made from the highest quality materials. It’s outer cover is made of durable yet soft TPE flame-retardant material while the inner lining protects the corrosion-resistant zinc alloy wiring, sheltering it from the outside air, ensuring it’s free from the risk of oxidization.The FanMian has an embedded smart chip that recognises the device it is connected to and ensures that the right electrical current is supplied to it. 

And even if there’s a worn section, all you need to do is cut the worn section off, then continue using the rest of the cable.   

The OTG function enables power to be interchanged between two mobile phones.Instantly turn your phone into a power-bank.

Meaning it’s able to turn your mobile phone into an emergency mobile charger to help you power your additional devices or simply help a friend charge theirs. The FanMian cable is also trickle charge-enabled which helps to maintain a device’s battery and prevent failure while being stored and not in use.

The FanMian cable supports 3A fast charging , which means that your device could charge twice as quickly compared to a regular cable. Enjoy the effectiveness of FanMian.

The FanMian has an embedded smart chip that recognises the device it is connected to and ensures that the right electrical current is supplied to it. You can tell that it is a superior cable due to the low heat that it emits while charging. 

Furthermore, Femain cables include intelligent smart chips that eliminates electric surges in the current by automatically detecting and monitoring charging to protect the battery and minimize overheating of your phone or other devices.

Regular cables tend to wear out in places where they’ve been bent. Because of this, they have to be replaced regularly. That means that you’re creating waste. Fanmian cable is made to be softer and more durable  comparing with other cables on the market. 

Use it as your primary cable and as a universal spare at home. Put one in your car, one in your office and give one to each of your family members. Custom wire your desk for a neat, tidy look. It’s a great gift for your device-obsessed friends too.  

The Fanmian cable was created by the  Guangmi Intelligent Technology Co. Founded in 2016 and based in China they are a well-established innovative R&
column2:
D technology company creating consumer electric technology solutions. 

Backed by a vertically integrated marketing and sales departments they’re committed to  build products and a brand that consumers can trust and rely on.

 

Challenge &
column3:
Risk 
Shipping: Delivery times will vary depending on the region and location we are shipping to. While we make every effort to ensure prompt delivery to all customers, please be patient and understand that there may be delays that are beyond our control during the shipping process. 
Legal variances from country to country: Regulations vary significantly across regions and countries, especially for electronic goods. We will take every precaution in ensuring that our product and shipping policies meet with local legislation in all areas, but there could be minor delays in fulfilling compliance requirements. 
Defective products: It is our responsibility to make sure we deliver the best products we could to our customers. However, with limited resources, there might still be some issues that we need to overcome along the way to get this product ready for mass production.if you do receive a defective product that falls below expectations, please contact us and we will send you a replacement. 
Startup: As a small startup company, this is a very busy time for us, during which our team is operating at full capacity. We apologise if we cannot respond immediately, but please be assured we will get back to you as soon as we can. 
If you like what we do, please support us and back us up by pledging to this project and help us spread the world! Thank you!

You no longer have to wrestle with cable ties to get your multiple cables in order either. And since you won’t have cables running across your table-tops or sticking out of every power socket, your room will look neat, tidy and free of clutter.Unlike most other cables, the FanMian cable is made from the highest quality materials. It’s outer cover is made of durable yet soft TPE flame-retardant material while the inner lining protects the corrosion-resistant zinc alloy wiring, sheltering it from the outside air, ensuring it’s free from the risk of oxidization.The FanMian has an embedded smart chip that recognises the device it is connected to and ensures that the right electrical current is supplied to it. And even if there’s a worn section, all you need to do is cut the worn section off, then continue using the rest of the cable.   The OTG function enables power to be interchanged between two mobile phones.Instantly turn your phone into a power-bank.Meaning it’s able to turn your mobile phone into an emergency mobile charger to help you power your additional devices or simply help a friend charge theirs. The FanMian cable is also trickle charge-enabled which helps to maintain a device’s battery and prevent failure while being stored and not in use.The FanMian cable supports 3A fast charging , which means that your device could charge twice as quickly compared to a regular cable. Enjoy the effectiveness of FanMian.The FanMian has an embedded smart chip that recognises the device it is connected to and ensures that the right electrical current is supplied to it. You can tell that it is a superior cable due to the low heat that it emits while charging. Furthermore, Femain cables include intelligent smart chips that eliminates electric surges in the current by automatically detecting and monitoring charging to protect the battery and minimize overheating of your phone or other devices.Regular cables tend to wear out in places where they’ve been bent. Because of this, they have to be replaced regularly. That means that you’re creating waste. Fanmian cable is made to be softer and more durable  comparing with other cables on the market. Use it as your primary cable and as a universal spare at home. Put one in your car, one in your office and give one to each of your family members. Custom wire your desk for a neat, tidy look. It’s a great gift for your device-obsessed friends too.  The Fanmian cable was created by the  Guangmi Intelligent Technology Co. Founded in 2016 and based in China they are a well-established innovative R&D technology company creating consumer electric technology solutions. Backed by a vertically integrated marketing and sales departments they’re committed to  build products and a brand that consumers can trust and rely on. Challenge & Risk Shipping: Delivery times will vary depending on the region and location we are shipping to. While we make every effort to ensure prompt delivery to all customers, please be patient and understand that there may be delays that are beyond our control during the shipping process. Legal variances from country to country: Regulations vary significantly across regions and countries, especially for electronic goods. We will take every precaution in ensuring that our product and shipping policies meet with local legislation in all areas, but there could be minor delays in fulfilling compliance requirements. Defective products: It is our responsibility to make sure we deliver the best products we could to our customers. However, with limited resources, there might still be some issues that we need to overcome along the way to get this product ready for mass production.if you do receive a defective product that falls below expectations, please contact us and we will send you a replacement. Startup: As a small startup company, this is a very busy time for us, during which our team is operating at full capacity. We apologise if we cannot respond immediately, but please be assured we will get back to you as soon as we can. If you like what we do, please support us and back us up by pledging to this project and help us spread the world! Thank you!",35.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: I've been a Systems Engineer for over ten years designing mission-critical systems which provides the necessary knowledge to combine various intricate systems together and work fluidly.  In addition, I was involved in the ideation process within Motorola for more than four years, evaluating ideas along with providing feedback for many aspects of design, including mobile phone design.

I've been designing this in my head for more than two years. I was prepared to design this system for Project Ara, Google's modular phone, and attended both DevCons, but when that platform fell through my plans were put on hold.  With the MotoMod platform and being selected as a finalist, I have a chance to create something that will be beneficial to those who need it.

Although I am not vision-impaired, nor do I know anyone who is, I have always been troubled by technology's steady march toward becoming increasingly visual.  Phones with a physical keyboard were once commonplace but are now a rarity
column2: this could hinder the ability of visually-impaired users to effectively use their phones. While advancements in screen size and resolution assist with vision-impaired, it does not directly assist those who are blind. And while voice dictation can be used, it's cumbersome and doesn't allow for pauses for a user to think.

column1: So, why do it?  I love design.  I love technology. And I think it's meant for everyone.

I tried to use the voice navigation within Android, and it's an extremely frustrating experience.  It is extremely difficult to navigate and use, doesn't allow for privacy of the user unless they constantly have headphones, and is troublesome for those who read faster than a voice speaks.

column3: '>This is a starting point to determine if this is something that people wish to have developed.  Users with disabilities should not be left behind while technology progresses.  Braille keyboards are extremely large and expensive.

column1: One of the issues is that I need to be vague to protect patentable concepts while still providing enough details for individuals to stand behind.  The answers will be in the patents and the features that they will provide.  There are two designs planned, one for a single character and one for multiple.  The single character design is planned around six actuators, whereas the multiple character design will have a custom design.  Software design will have custom features to display the information normally onscreen with user personalization.
A presentation is available for Motorola upon request.

The amount requested will not be capable of providing a finalized product. Funding will go towards the costs of equipment, prototyping, printing/molding, and outside assistance. The primary costs covered will be an oscilloscope for debugging communications issues, ordering custom actuators, and contract or direct 3D printing and molding.  For example, the actuator company I just spoke to requires a $14,000 payment just for a feasibility study.

column3: '>One of the things that has bothered me about crowdsourcing projects I've funded in the past is the opacity as to the status of the project and what the funding is being used for
column4: this will not happen with my project.  There will be at a minimum monthly updates for one year or the life of the stage, whichever is longer.  When you donate, you'll find out exactly what it was used for, including any crowdfunding fees (which can be up to 10% of the amount raised depending upon contribution method).

column1: As this is a fixed funding, if the total amount isn't raised, no funds are received and no perks will be provided.  However, I'll still send a thank-you email, it's the least I can do.

There are an estimated 6.6 million in the US alone who have reported a visual disability, and the World Health Organization estimates 39 million blind and almost a quarter of a billion with low vision.  According to the National Federation of the Blind, over 80% of gainfully employed blind people utilize braille every day.  However, one aspect that limits Braille use to just 10% of blind users in the US is access.

Portable Bluetooth Braille displays cost over $1000, have a strap to hang around the user's neck, and are limited in the number of characters.  This is a huge burden both physically and financially, and I want to address it.  With advancements in technology the potential exists for a design that is less obtrusive, more integrated, and especially less expensive.
Proof of Concept Build single unit braille proof of concepts for finger Braille display and one piece of full Braille display
• Create proof of concept platforms (Arduino and Raspberry Pi)
• Determine dimensions and maximum number of Braille characters for full Braille display

The primary risk is too narrow of a market.  This would be for a certain type of phone, would be subject to mechanical and electrical changes in the future, and this could affect development.  The other primary risk is mechanical failure that would compromise the functionality of the unit as a whole.

The best way to address both issues is with a finalized modular design, both in construction and internal design.  With a modular frame, as long as the size does not exceed the area allowed on the phone, it can be adapted to fit different devices.  Internal self-reliance allows for less dependencies on other platforms, and allows for possibilities with Bluetooth as a future option.

Ideally, internal components would be modular as well, allowing for replacement of components to account for the eventual mechanical or electrical failure.  This may add height to the final design, but I feel this is a worthwhile tradeoff.
The final component is where possible, the design will be 3D printed which will allow for flexibility of sources and readily created replacement parts.
Feel free to share on your favorite social media or through the share tools on Indiegogo, comment on the campaign, and tell your friends!

The Legal Stuff

Braille Mod for Moto Z, a Moto Mods™ concept for Moto Z smartphones. Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t. To learn more visit www.motomods.com.

The goal of the campaign is solely a donation to support further development, not providing any goods or services. No guarantee of success, delivery or result can be provided. Under no circumstances will the owner of this campaign be liable for losses or damages of any kind whatsoever.

I tried to use the voice navigation within Android, and it's an extremely frustrating experience.  It is extremely difficult to navigate and use, doesn't allow for privacy of the user unless they constantly have headphones, and is troublesome for those who read faster than a voice speaks.

This is a starting point to determine if this is something that people wish to have developed.  Users with disabilities should not be left behind while technology progresses.  Braille keyboards are extremely large and expensive.

One of the issues is that I need to be vague to protect patentable concepts while still providing enough details for individuals to stand behind.  The answers will be in the patents and the features that they will provide.  There are two designs planned, one for a single character and one for multiple.  The single character design is planned around six actuators, whereas the multiple character design will have a custom design.  Software design will have custom features to display the information normally onscreen with user personalization.

column2: >Greetings from paradise, from the city of love or congratulations to the wedding. With WishU you can easily create unforgettable Wishes.

column1: How do you congratulate a close person on a special day ? Think about it for a moment and be honest. Do you congratulate him personally or do you call him ? The fact is that many people don´t have or take the time for a short phone call or personal congratulations. Instead, they send short messages, images from the Internet or old congratulations they once got themselves. In the age of messaging services, only impersonal messages are sent for each occasion.

Don`t you know this situation too? It's Christmas and you always get the same impersonal greeting cards, sayings or short videos from different people. That sucks, it`s boring and can spoil one's mood.
It's your birthday and all your friends will send you short impersonal messages with emojis. Or worse, nobody remembers your special day. That can be really hurtful.

Many have the problem that they often travel on business and work long. They simply have no time or forget important days of their loved ones. This often leads to disputes in relationships and hurts other people's feelings.

Only a few make the effort to send something personal. In addition, the convenience is another problem. A short message is written faster than the search for a greeting card or a matching image on the internet.

WishU is a unique application designed to help people. It combines several functions in one and therefore it can prevent many problems. WishU offers his user the possibility to communicate in the form of a chat between two persons with text and picture messages. Furthermore, the user can create freely designed Wishes and send them automatically throughout the year. WishU also reminds you a few days in advance if someone from your contacts list is celebrating an event soon.

WishU also provides you with a huge library of pictures for every occasion. Use these or your own pictures to create an unforgettable Wish. The images and the premade Wish layouts will be updated by us over time.
Your privacy is important to us. All messages are transmitted end to end encrypted and can not be read by us or third parties.

column2: >These features combined in a unique application make WishU distinctive, individual and what it is.
>Invite someone to dinner, to a joint activity or to your party. WishU allows you to implement your ideas attractively and once.

column1: WishU has been programmed for two years in a small team consisting of two people in leisure after studying. The application is programmed for about 85%. The main functions are implemented and WishU is already being tested. There are still some little things that are needed to make the application work more smoothly.
The study is over now and we both have to go to work. In addition to our job, we can not afford any time for WishU. Completion will be delayed or never take place.

With your help, we can continue to work full time on WishU and upload it in its full functionality soon to the App Store for free. Of course, the Android version should also be programmed on time and launched shortly after the iOS version. This programming work costs a lot of time and money.

For your support we also offer great perks. For a little help, we will create an individual Wish for any occasion. Help us by acquiring test accounts, so you can be one of few exclusively owners of WishU and can also suggest requests for changes. For greater support, you'll be honored in our WishU Hall of Fame. We honor you with your logo or name. Every user can see the Hall of Fame. If you believe in us, you can also purchase a logo below the WishU logo. This logo will be displayed every time you start WishU.
The more help we get from you, the faster we can finish WishU. We may also hire other programmers and designers for our Wish library.
Don`t forget, with WishU you not only help us, you also help many other people to find back to old long forgotten forms of congratulations.
WishU is a unique application that doesn`t exist in this form. It helps people to make special days in a person's life, especially.
At the moment WishU is being tested in a small test group in its functionality. Some of these testers say the following about WishU:

""I especially like the option of Wishes. You can easily create custom greeting cards for someone and customize them personally. There are almost no limits in form and design. You can choose different fonts and make your Wish look professional, like a page in a magazine. The large internal library is very helpful and saves you time to search pictures on the internet."" Dilara(30)

""WishU is the future in the field of sending digital greeting cards. Due to the extensive functions, I can create my greeting cards individually and adapt them to the desired person. By WishU, I'll never forget a special day or occasion from my loved ones, and can bring joy to those with a personalized greeting card. By this application the conventional invitation ""Fancy a beer"" gets a very personal meaning."" Eduard(33)

""I particularly like the opportunity to create a year event. Especially for people who are often traveling on business, this feature is very helpful. With the Year Event, everyone can create and manage creative wishes one week, one month or one year in advance. You can edit, improve and put a lot of love into it at any time. This love will be felt by the receiver with certainty."" Renata(16)
""I'm not very present in the social media, and I don`t like to write very personal stuff there. WishU's special days are a great way to share my special days with my friends and family."" Thomas

""As an inventor, of course, I like everything about Wishu. But especially I find the combination of the Year Event and the Special Days very beneficial for people who find it difficult to remember special days of others. I have the problem that I can never remember birthdays. Sure, I could write down the birthdays of others or use reminder apps, but with WishU I get notifications about all the special days of my contact list. Thus, I can respond to all days and never forget another important event of my friends and family."" Arthur

WishU is very important to me, I like working on this application. At the beginning of the development, Wishu had only a few functions but always a goal in mind, to help people. Meanwhile, WishU has grown and offers unique featchers to realize the goal. There are already plenty of updates planned for the future after the release of WishU. Video messages, animations and much more, should be installed at a later date to provide WishU more functionality. This makes Wishes even more individual and free design.

WishU should not compete with well known Messanger services, but rather should create a new category of communication. It should grow and be known not only as an application, but should be its own brand in the future with many other products.

column2: >If you like our idea, the application and our team. Then you can now help us to finish WishU. A perk or a small donation will bring us closer to our aim. Thank you for your help !
>For feedback or questions, please contat us also via wishu.feedback@gmail.com

Here, we would like to introduce more about  “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable”.

Smart phones and tablets which gradually replace the PC become the main devices in daily entertainment, communication and office. OTG technology makes the function of smart phones and tablets extended unlimited.  Recently, mobile phone manufacturers pay more attention to the OTG technology and gradually apply it in the  mobile phone and tablets.
Currently, 90 percent of OTG cables only have the single-function, and the other 10 percent cables only have the one-way mode.
As we known, as the main accessories of mobile phones and tablets, the most important function of the data cable is charging
column2: then is data transmission and support OTG application. So, we always bring along a data cable to charge our phone when we are out of the door. Few of us remember to bring a single function OTG cable. It is quite inconvenient for us to take along two cables with us. To resolve the problem, we develop two new products named “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable”.

column1: You may notice that most smart phones and tablets have OTG function. If users can experience the convenience of OTG function, that will be a trend. So,
column13: > may be one of the lead products in this area!

column1: ""Harrier cable"" combines two cables together and it has a very lovely shape, just like a love dog. It is not only useful, but also has a good visual image. We believe most of you will like it!

With two modes of data cable and OTG function, “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” can be charging for mobile phone, data transmission and support OTG application at any time. Meanwhile, the cable supports several cables to charge the mobile phone and tablets at the same time. they can share one USB port.
Data cable mode supports data transfer and charging for mobile phones
column2: USB female socket can be used as an extended port to realize multi-line shared pattern.

column1: Based on innovation and design, Shiyong Creation is a team which aims to improve the applicability of products to make our customers feel better on physical, mental and visual needs.

Shiyong Creation is an earnest, active thinking and hard-working team which mainly consists of ID designers, MD designers, hardware engineers and software engineers. Through more than nine years working experience in this industry, they are quite familiar with the whole processes of the products from design to mass production. They are in charge of many projects for Intel, MOTO, HP, DELL and so on. Meanwhile, the team is always in collaboration with institutions of higher learning to explore new ideas and concepts and put them into reality. What’s more, the team has the professional purchaser, logistics and other professionals to assist in the completion of the manufacture of the product.
Our belief: innovation, applicability and endow souls to products.

column1: ","Here, we would like to introduce more about  “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable”.

Smart phones and tablets which gradually replace the PC become the main devices in daily entertainment, communication and office. OTG technology makes the function of smart phones and tablets extended unlimited.  Recently, mobile phone manufacturers pay more attention to the OTG technology and gradually apply it in the  mobile phone and tablets.
Currently, 90 percent of OTG cables only have the single-function, and the other 10 percent cables only have the one-way mode.
As we known, as the main accessories of mobile phones and tablets, the most important function of the data cable is charging
column2: then is data transmission and support OTG application. So, we always bring along a data cable to charge our phone when we are out of the door. Few of us remember to bring a single function OTG cable. It is quite inconvenient for us to take along two cables with us. To resolve the problem, we develop two new products named “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable”.

column1: You may notice that most smart phones and tablets have OTG function. If users can experience the convenience of OTG function, that will be a trend. So, “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” may be one of the lead products in this area!
Harrier cable"" combines two cables together and it has a very lovely shape, just like a love dog. It is not only useful, but also has a good visual image. We believe most of you will like it!

With two modes of data cable and OTG function, “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” can be charging for mobile phone, data transmission and support OTG application at any time. Meanwhile, the cable supports several cables to charge the mobile phone and tablets at the same time. they can share one USB port.
Data cable mode supports data transfer and charging for mobile phones
column2: USB female socket can be used as an extended port to realize multi-line shared pattern.

column1: OTG mode supports the mobile phones and tablets to read USB drive, connect keyboard, mouse, camera, MP3, printer and another mobile phone.
Support two operation modes transferred freely.
Under data cable mode to realize basic needs of power charge and data transmission.
Under OTG mode,  your smart phone and tablets can connect the  peripheral electronic equipments.
The most commonly use is to connect your smart phones and tablets to the USB drive, keyboard, mouse, camera, MP3, printer and even another phone.
Without PC, you can also do everything PC does.
Multi-lines share one MIC_USB port to charge for more than one device at the same time.
Suitable for all smart phones and tablets with OTG function.
Five kinds of color for  ""Harrier Cable”
A lovely cartoon harrier design adds joys to your daily life.
The visual impact would be great.
The design with USB AF insert to AM is very convenient.
Tie the cable to your key chains or bags to save the room.
You will hard to forget to bring it along withyou when go out.

In light of the difficulty of manufacture which
leads to the delay delivery of “Apple Worm”, we release “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow
Cable” more cautiously. At present, the mould has been already tested successfully,
and we are preparing for samples now.
To catch up with the Christmas, we will send
the first batch “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” before Nov 30, 2014. We
hope you can experience the convenience of our products during the festival.  The second batch will be sent out after the

With rich shipment experience, our team will deliver the “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” to you wherever you are. The targeted retail price is $19.00 (USD).   Now, you will get it with the best prices during the campaign and begin to use it before it appears on the market.
Do feel free to ask us for any questions by send email to info@decentodm.com , sale@decentodm.com or leave messages on our website at  www.decentodm.com, or contact us with Facebook、twitter.
We hope you can share the love “Harrier Cable” and “Rainbow Cable” with your family, colleagues and friends, to let more people experience the convenience of our creation!

Want to charge your iPhone and use it at the same time, the 11º Dock is the solution. Inspired by the simplicity of Braun and Apple.


The idea began about 12 months ago, I was in work, my iPhone on charge in the Apple dock and texting at the same time, I couldn't believe how frustrating it was trying to text and charge at the same time.

The steep angle meant that I had to twist my hand. I looked online for a dock with a shallower angle, and when I couldn't find one, I decided to design one myself. 

My designs are heavily influenced by the 1950's and 60's modernism, using companies such as Vitsœ, Braun and Apple as benchmarks of good design. The 11° Dock presents your iPhone 4/4s/5 or 5s ready for use on your desk.


This is a simple solution to an everyday problem, if you see where we're going with this, please back our campaign. 

For the latest news, follow us on twitter

Everything´s OK is new project being built out by two entrepreneurs (Matt &
column2: Phil) with a goal to improve the safety of both children and teens when they are out of house.  When we initially came up with this idea, we saw that there were already several systems on the market that did this, but all required that your child or teen had an expensive iphone or some other type of smart phone.  We don't think it is fair that parents should have to buy a smartphone just for peace of mind, so we designed a product which helps keep children safe using a plain-ol-lowtech-cellphone.

column1: We have been working on this product for the past year, and have a strong proof of concept, but need to raise money in order to make it ready to launch.  If you have children, and think that this type of system would be useful, then please contribute!

Simplicity is the guiding principle behind the design of Everything’s OK - simple for parents to setup, simple for teenagers to check-in.  In keeping with this philosophy, Everything’s OK is accessed by parents through a simple web based interface.  In order to activate Everything’s OK, all a parent needs to do is the following:
• Create an Everything’s Ok user account, or if they have an account already, log in with this account.
Setup an Everything’s Ok monitor, which requires that you provide the following details:
Once the monitor has started, Everything’s Ok will begin sending regular text messages ( for example once every hour) to the teenagers cell phone, simply inquiring “Is everything ok?”.
• Upon receipt of the text message, the teenager has 30 minutes to respond with any text message, whether “yes”, “ya”, “you bet”, etc...

• If a response to the text message has not been received by Everything’s Ok within 30 minutes, Everything’s Ok will send a new text message stating “We have not received a response in 30 minutes, please let us know if everything’s ok?”.

• If no response to this text message has been received within 15 minutes, then the parent is immediately called at the provided contact number that their teenager has stopped responding, and that they should try and establish contact as soon as possible.
• So long as the teenager continues to respond to the text messages throughout the evening, parents can relax and know that their kids are safe.

• If the monitoring curfew time is used, then the teenager must respond with a predetermined password in order to shut off the monitoring.  This password can either be given to the teenager before they leave, or if there is concern about breaking curfew, written on a note and pasted on the fridge after they leave.
• If the monitor has not been shut off by the time the curfew time is reached, the parents will also receive a call, notifying them that their teenager is ok, but is out past curfew.
All you need is any working cell phone with text messaging capability and access to the internet.

• We see Everything’s OK as a solution to a problem that has been around since we were teenagers, and which still persists today. If you have been a teenager in the “cell phone age” you remember how annoying and uncool it was to have a parent constantly checking up on you while out with friends. On the other end of the spectrum, parents know the stress of worrying about their child being safe while out and about, causing many sleepless nights.

• There is a need for a product like Everything’s Ok. We disagree with the need to monitor one’s child at all times via things like GPS, which totally infringes upon their privacy, as well as requires them to have an expensive smartphone. Everything’s OK lets your teenager have more of that privacy, while letting you sleep soundly and stress free. We strongly believe in this hands off type of monitoring and see it as something that could really take off in the future.

We have tested this concept with many parent groups, and the overwhelming response has been that this is a tool that would not solely provide peace-of-mind, but much more critically, serve as an early warning tool for when the unthinkable happens. We don’t want this system to be perceived as a for-profit venture which preys on the fears of parents, but rather an honest, open, and reliable system which helps to ensure the safety of their children.  We feel that the Indiegogo community is very much aligned with this open and altruistic philosophy, and that by seeking funding through Indiegogo, we are creating a foundation of openness that strongly resonates with the principles and ethics that we want Everything’s Ok to represent.

We have been working on this solution for several months now, and feel like we have moved the system to an ""alpha"" level of development.  It functions very well for our small group of test users, but we haven't been able to test it with a larger group of users yet.  We are approaching the Indiegogo community for $10,000 funding in order to help us bring the system to a level of maturity and trustworthiness that parents will require from a service such as this.  We do not have the luxury of using our user group for beta testing, and want to make sure that all the kinks are sorted our before providing access to the public.

We are the creators of Everything´s OK, Matt and Phil. We met randomly a couple of years ago while both of us were working in Bergen, Norway. We are both very entrepreneurially minded and wanted to start a project that would be both innovative and something that would genuinely benefit society.  We have a history in web software development, and have delivered on several successful concepts before, but this is our first time turning to the Indiegogo community for funding.

Kaptchr is a 1 tap anonymous smartphone video recording app and website designed for the average person to record and share their first hand account of newsworthy events as they are happening.

We're a team of passionate entrepreneurs based out of Vancouver, BC and are fortunate enough to live in a beautiful part of the world with an unrivalled lifestyle. Sadly we know we are living a life that most of the world can only dream about. Kaptchr is our attempt to give everyone the power to record their situation, share it with the global community so together we can bring positive change to their lives.

Your investment will help pay for marketing costs in target countries so that awareness of the app is developed and people can start using it to share their stories with the world. These marketing costs include:
3. Geo-targeted advertising via facebook, and google ad-words- $1,000
4. Local tech press and blog coverage - Free (hopefully)

How would history be different if the ability to record what really happened was in everyone's pocket? What would we see and learn if the average person who lived these events had the power to record and share what was going on around them, as it happened?

Thanks to the growing usage of smartphones, everyone will soon have this capability. With Kaptchr we want to empower those who feel powerless. And give oppressed people the freedom to share their stories and struggles with the world.

Not everyone has the freedom or choice to live the life they want. Whether through conflict or oppression they may feel like there is no way they can change their fate. Deep down they feel that if the rest of the world could only see what is happening to them, we would be compelled to act. Kaptchrs purpose is to be that outlet.

The Kaptchr app is live in developing countries and we are requesting your support to promote it. These funds will be used to raise the awareness of Kaptchr in countries such as the Ukraine, Nigeria, and Thailand. User videos will be available for view and download on the Kaptchr website.

Currently we have both the app Beta and website (http://www.kaptchr.com/) Beta live. The app is available in select(ed) markets on Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.VideoApp  markets include Ukraine, Thailand, Nigeria,Egypt on a staged roll-out. Kaptchr v1.2 has just launched with many enhancements and is a full stable release.
We've self financed the project and we are projecting to go full-time in 2015. We haven't received outside funding/investment yet

This project has its fair share of challenges. The biggest one is getting users in our target markets aware that Kaptchr exists.

The second challenge is getting a user to use it when they see a newsworthy event. We think we have addressed this challenge by making it simple. One tap to record and share, anonymously, instantly. We have automated it so that no matter what situation they are in, they can safely share their video with the world.

The beauty of this project is for a relatively small sum we could potentially reach a large population. The more we reach the more videos we'll see and hopefully the more lives we'll change for the better.

column5: >NOAH is a humble vessel that houses your cables with a simple twist. Designed with basic necessities in mind, NOAH can efficiently store, organise and shorten laptop and phone cables on the tablescape.

column1: Cables are great. They connect us with the world.  But let’s face it. The cables sitting on your desktop are just plain messy.

column1: Given 7 years of industrial experience, the NOAH team comprises of individuals who have worked in diverse disciplines, spanning from Branding to Medical and even IT. With our know-hows, we are confident that we can offer you a satisfactory solution that answers your cable woes.

At this moment, Indiegogo does not provide selection fields for alternative choices. However, please do not worry because after
