column1: For a more efficient delivery, we kindly request that you provide a response within 2 weeks after the enquiry mails are sent to you. This is to ensure a smooth production. In the event where there is no response, the team will randomly select the colour on your behalf.

2. What do you mean by international shipping? Do I have to pay for international shipping?

A. Backers from SIngapore need not pay for the international shipping. Delivery costs will be absorbed on our end.
B.Backers from the rest of the world will be required to pay additional 10 USD per piece with the exception of the following offers:
Do contact us so that we can tailor the costings to suit your location. You can drop us a mail at this address: noahsolutionsg@gmail.com
3. What is the dimension of NOAH and is it available in other sizes?

NOAH is 180mm in length, 71mm in width and 46.5mm in height. Unfortunately, NOAH is only available at this size. NOAH had undergone many iterations before reaching this ideal size, so worry not for NOAH is well suited to take the job on.
4. How many cables can NOAH hold?
Without looping, NOAH can store up to 9, 6mm, cables or 18, 3mm, cables.
With looping, NOAH can ideally store up to 3, 6mm, cables or 5, 3mm, cables.
from 2mm to 8mm*. This may include android or apple supporting cables, USB cables or even LAN cables.
condition where looping is not performed.
6. What is NOAH made of and why?
NOAH's lid and zig-zag structure is made from ABS (Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene). Because the material is impact resistant and durable, NOAH is ready to take on the hard knocks of life.
NOAH's base is made from silicon (shore hardness A70*) to ensure traction such that it does not slip and move.
*Shore hardness depicts the stiffness of the material.
NOAH shift from its position when cables are extended or retracted?

Rest assure that NOAH will not shift about on the desk*. High grade silicon is used as a traction material which leverages on friction to keep NOAH firmly in place. This also prevents the need for any adhesive usage.
*NOAH works best on desktops with a relatively clean surface. Be sure to wipe off any dirt and dust before placement for optimum usage.
8. What is the length of the cable
This differs cable to cable but
column6: > NOAH is proven to be able to store cables up to 40cm in length. With more loops added, the storage length will increase in proportion. However do take note that storage capacity will be affected.

column1: 9. Why is NOAH only available in Chalk Grey or Carbon Black colour and why do I have to pay more for a different colour variation?
The team strives to provide the best solution at the most affordable pricing possible. Changes in colour within a production cycle can be costly. The costs are most optimum at 2 colours.
That being said, the team has already calculated the required amount and has willingly absorbed maintenance costings on our end so that you pay only the minimal required.

In A NutshellNOAH is a humble vessel that houses your cables with a simple twist. Designed with basic necessities in mind, NOAH can efficiently store, organise and shorten laptop and phone cables on the tablescape.
Cables are great. They connect us with the world.  But let’s face it. The cables sitting on your desktop are just plain messy.
Existing solutions, big or small, either keep the cables in place or hide the clutter. However, both ends fail to offer the flexibility of storage within a modest package.
Quick & Convenient Access l NOAH's lid pops right off with a simple nudge to reveal the storage within. This also works when cables are in place too!

Simple Gestures l By forming a single loop, your cables can be instantly shortened. This is also the key step that gives NOAH the magic touch to lengthen or shorten your cables. Naturally, forming more loops allows you to store greater lengths too.
Modest Mechanics l The humble zig-zag structure serves to organise your cables into 3 levels. It also serves as a springboard that helps with the lid removal.
Snug Fit l NOAH's tapered design guides the lid to snap comfortably in place. Thanks to the tapered form, cable storage and removal can be done even when NOAH is flushed against a flat wall.
PRESTO! Flexibility To Extend Your Cables l A simple tug is all you require to 'lengthen' your cables. Likewise, a quick push allows you to 'shorten' it once again.
More Than Just A Paperweight l NOAH spots an inviting surface for your convenient storage.
Tailored For Your Lifestyle l Nestled on your desk, NOAH is a beauty to behold.
Design Anatomy l NOAH spots a sturdy ABS (Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene) frame and is coupled with a silicon base for traction to ensure it never slips.

NOAH In Your Style l At this moment, NOAH is available in Chalk Grey and Carbon Black. With a little more, you can add a splash of colour to NOAH. NOAH's base is currently available in other colours like Plum Red, Tangerine & Midnight Blue.

Technical Specifications l NOAH is designed as a compact solution to house sufficient cables* while retaining a small footprint. The dimensions are as follows: (L) 180mm by (B) 71mm by (H) 46.5mm. Refer to FAQ*
Compact Solution l For those that are worried of NOAH's footprint on a desktop, worry no further for NOAH is palm sized (lady's hand below). Good things do come in small packages.
How Did It All Start? l Our humbling experience.
Like how all great designs begin, the team started off with a frustration
column2: entangled cables. Determined to bid adieu to the unsightly cables, the team began to explore the possibilities in the existing market. Working together with the feedback from the local community, we have since undergone numerous rounds of rigorous discussions and ideation to generate concepts to solve the clutter.

column1: To evaluate our ideas, quick prototypes were further made to assess both form and function. With each new refinement, the team gained new insights on how to better extend or retract the cables within a reasonable length. While it may be time consuming, this iterative process drove an evident evolution in the design.

Once the core idea was decided, the team then moved onto the little details of the design. With feasibility as a guiding principle, we worked closely with experienced manufacturers to finetune the construction such that the production process can be smooth sailing.
Ready, GO! l All set and prepared.

After months of preparations, we have finally completed our development. We are excited to announce that we are now ready for production. We just need your help to raise funds for the injection tools so that we can deliver this amazing solution to your table scape. We appreciate and look forward to your generous support!

Given 7 years of industrial experience, the NOAH team comprises of individuals who have worked in diverse disciplines, spanning from Branding to Medical and even IT. With our know-hows, we are confident that we can offer you a satisfactory solution that answers your cable woes.
1. Why am I unable to select the colours on my purchase? How do I know if the colour(s) that I want will be delivered to me?

At this moment, Indiegogo does not provide selection fields for alternative choices. However, please do not worry because after the successful campaign closure, the team will personally contact you via email to enquire about your colour preference.

For a more efficient delivery, we kindly request that you provide a response within 2 weeks after the enquiry mails are sent to you. This is to ensure a smooth production. In the event where there is no response, the team will randomly select the colour on your behalf.

B.Backers from the rest of the world will be required to pay additional 10 USD per piece with the exception of the following offers:
Do contact us so that we can tailor the costings to suit your location. You can drop us a mail at this address: noahsolutionsg@gmail.com
3. What is the dimension of NOAH and is it available in other sizes?

NOAH is 180mm in length, 71mm in width and 46.5mm in height. Unfortunately, NOAH is only available at this size. NOAH had undergone many iterations before reaching this ideal size, so worry not for NOAH is well suited to take the job on.
4. How many cables can NOAH hold?
Without looping, NOAH can store up to 9, 6mm, cables or 18, 3mm, cables.
With looping, NOAH can ideally store up to 3, 6mm, cables or 5, 3mm, cables.
from 2mm to 8mm*. This may include android or apple supporting cables, USB cables or even LAN cables.
condition where looping is not performed.
6. What is NOAH made of and why?
NOAH's lid and zig-zag structure is made from ABS (Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene). Because the material is impact resistant and durable, NOAH is ready to take on the hard knocks of life.
NOAH's base is made from silicon (shore hardness A70*) to ensure traction such that it does not slip and move.
*Shore hardness depicts the stiffness of the material.
NOAH shift from its position when cables are extended or retracted?

Rest assure that NOAH will not shift about on the desk*. High grade silicon is used as a traction material which leverages on friction to keep NOAH firmly in place. This also prevents the need for any adhesive usage.
*NOAH works best on desktops with a relatively clean surface. Be sure to wipe off any dirt and dust before placement for optimum usage.
8. What is the length of the cable

This differs cable to cable but on average, NOAH is proven to be able to store cables up to 40cm in length. With more loops added, the storage length will increase in proportion. However do take note that storage capacity will be affected.
9. Why is NOAH only available in Chalk Grey or Carbon Black colour and why do I have to pay more for a different colour variation?
The team strives to provide the best solution at the most affordable pricing possible. Changes in colour within a production cycle can be costly. The costs are most optimum at 2 colours.
That being said, the team has already calculated the required amount and has willingly absorbed maintenance costings on our end so that you pay only the minimal required.",23.0,0,"2 Campaigns

The pedometer can track your daily steps. The pedometer is based on ADXL345 3-axis digital accelerometer. It can filter irregular activities and save last 7 days data. You can use the smart phone application to read the steps and corresponding time.

Hardware devices consist of mechanics, electronics and firmware. The 3D printed prototype has taken one engineer and one industrial designer over two months to finalize. The electronics and firmware has taken even longer to develop.
• ADXL345 3-axis digital accelerometer, resolution increases with g range, up to 13-bit resolution at ±16 g (maintaining 4 mg/LSB scale factor in all g ranges)
• Built-in 70 mA lithium battery with 7 days standby time
• Micro-USB port for charging and connecting to computer

The option of Bluetooth 4.0 for iPhone devices will be available soon. The Bluetooth 4.0 will always be active in this case while the Bluetooth 2.0 for Android devices is off usually and will be turned on manually before connection.
At first, you need turn on the switch. The screen will display the current time, steps and battery indicator.

• When you push the button once, the OLED screen will be on for several seconds and then it will turn itself off to save power. The battery can last for a week, so you need recharge it in time. You can review the steps on the OLED screen even in low-light environments.
• When you push the button once again while the screen is on, it will display the current date, distance and calories respectively.

• When you push the button twice quickly while the screen is on, it will turn on the bluetooth to accept new connection. The Bluetooth of pedometer is in slave mode. So your application needs to connect to the pedometer in advance. The pedometer time can't be retaining after it's turned off. So you need to send a time string to synchronize its time, such as ""T1325419200"", T with the seconds since Jan 1 1970. When you send 'R' to the pedometer, it will return all 7 days data in JSON format with prefix ""datastart"" and suffix ""dataend"".
The Android trial app is available now. The iPhone trial app will be available soon. The apps for Android and iPhone can read data from Fihuo pedometer via Bluetooth.

Fihuo is a mobile health program sponsored by Research Institute of Information Technology of Tsinghua University of P. R. China. We created a talented team to design and develop creative productions and services for personal health. Our research areas focus on mobile Internet and big data management.

You will receive a survey at the end of the campaign and you may then choose what Bluetooth version and color you prefer. As long as our products pass the standard quality test for a country or region, we are shipping to the entire world. Shipping is free.
Fully assembled and tested Fihuo Pedometer. You are ready to use the pedometer to track your steps.
We have a rough production schedule like this:
• March 2013 – Finalizing design and construction of the Fihuo pedometer
• April 2013 – Start tooling for plastic injection molding, do batches of electronics
• May 2013 – Product tests, certification and finding fulfillment partner
• July 2013 – Start shipping Fihuo pedometers to our earliest backers.

We need your support to make this happen! We are so close but we need you to help us be able to start manufacturing. Each stage of production will be done by local businesses. The printed circuit boards (PCBs) will be made in Shenzhen, China. The injection molded cases will be made in Beijing and the PCB assembly for the pedometer will be done in Beijing.

The Fihuo Pedometer is working and nearly production ready. We are working with a local manufacturing company that has the resources and ability to scale to whatever volume we need. The main risk for this project is unforeseen delays. In every step of the production, our manufacturers need strict guidelines and tests to sort out the good units from the bad ones. The delivery dates for the rewards are based on the time needed for assembly and packaging of the complete Fihuo Pedometer and the time needed to pack and ship the kits overseas. Any delays will be communicated at every step along the way.

We are two 18 year old boys from Norway trying to make it. We have no business education, no mentors/parents educating us, no written out path laid out for us to walk on. Quite frankly, we have been pushed in the other direction of our hearts. By our parents, by our comrades, by our teachers and by our community. But, that didn't stop us. In 2018 we decided to take a leap of faith and start our own corporation. We already had a lot of great ideas together and decided this is something we had to act on. Things escalated and got serious pretty fast. When we first started we didn't know a lot. We had to research, study and find out about things on our own. We still don't know it all, but I like to think that we have come a long way. We used the means we had, and just went with it.

Everything started with an idea of making new innovative products. But, we quickly realized that there's just so much more to it. We had to create a name for ourselves and a logo to go with it. After a lot of brainstorming we came up with ""Dropasmile"". The story behind our name, is simple that we want to make products that bring enjoyment into people's lives. We want to spread happiness through our own products, and ""Drop a smile"" on any customers face. And with that, we have created a logo that goes well with the name. The logo is built up like a drop of water, but has a shininess to it. So it has two meanings. The first meaning is just wordplay, ""dropasmile"" on your face with the waterdrop logo, but it can also mean that it is a tear, but the diamond shining through reflects that it is happy tears.
Dropasmile - Turn the negative into a positive

This is the first idea we want to go forth with. The idea came together after a lot of frustration using our phones, trying to get a comfortable grip. We just knew there was a better way. In the process of designing the holder, we realized that we not only wanted to create a helpful product. We wanted to make the product fun also. Thats why we added the spinning function. The spinning function lets you spin the phone in any direction like a fidget spinner. The ball bearing makes the spinning smooth and also makes it last long. This can be used as just a fun gadget to fiddle with, pastime and release stress.
The rubberized grip is detachable and can be swapped out with different colors and sizes. We will make all kinds of different color and sizes, so everyone is happy.

The products is quite big and goes out a bit. But to make this comfortable to have in your pocket and so on, we are making it so you can fold it down against the phone. When flipped up in stationary position, it ""clicks"" into place so it doesn't move around or fold by accident. It can also be used in folded position by having your fingers against the phone.

The product will be produced in top notch quality. We will work hard to ensure that every customer is happy. The product will get delivered in safe packaging with instructions. You can easily attach it to your phone by the strong double sided tape under the mounting plate.

Our plan is to start production as soon as possible. Our production team are waiting for our start signal, and this indiegogo is what will really push it even further. Things will go faster, and if the indiegogo comes through we will be up and running in a few months time. The product will then get shipped out to all of our backers and the deadline for this is set to be in december. The goal is set to 6000 USD. This will help us get all the machines and the production going. This may seem like a lot, but we are really passionate about bringing quality into the market and quality machines are expensive.

Our long term plan is to have a store with 10+ innovative, self made products. We are already sitting on 5-6 ideas with a lot of potential, so this is only the beginning. We will also work more on building our brand and branching out.

We have very creative personalities, so we want to make a future for ourself in something we enjoy and are really passionate about. And also share our creativity, bring enjoyment to others and bring new exciting quality products into the market.

We are still very young, so we also want to inspire other young people and show them that they can do anything they want. It's not about the age. If anything, the younger you are when you start, the better. The experiences you get at a young age are so important. We have noticed just since we started, that there is nothing like this you can learn in school. You have to get out there, get experience, fail and learn from your mistakes. If you're sitting on an idea of what you want to be doing, but too obsessed with what other people might think. We are here to say that we support you and really hope that you begin your journey and start executing.
Hopefully, you support us as well and help us get started with our journey!

Potential risks is that things may take longer due to unexpected delays. Things may become more expensive and the budget might get tight, but if this happens it wont effect backers. We will still finish, use personal resources and get through.
We will only use high quality material so the products endure more and last longer.
Our factories will only be based in Norway and by the nature of our products, the waste from production will be minimal.

We took the humble pocket clip and added smart features to solve all the ways you want to carry your phone. The ring gives you a solid one-handed grip on the go, lying down, sitting up, upside down, playing games, shooting video, or taking selfies. Landscape or portrait. Reach every corner of your phone with one hand without adjusting your grip. The Clip holds tight to your pockets or your bag. Your phone is always in fast reach. It's also a kickstand with a slick all-metal mechanism to hold your phone in portrait or landscape.

 

 

P O C K E T C L I P

The Westa Clip was inspired by the pocket clips found on many everyday carry items such as pocket knives, lights, and pens. We were frustrated by the lack of a similar clip for the one item almost everybody carries every day, so we made one. The clip makes access to the phone fast and simple. No more digging through pockets or dropping an expensive phone in the bottom of pockets with items which can scar or tarnish it.

 

Clip it to your pants.

 

Or a bag.

 

G R I P

Phones keep getting bigger, yet our hands stay the same size making parts of the screen hard to reach. By gripping the phone by its center, the corners of the screen are easier to reach. The Westa Clip’s patent-pending ring grip provides multiple comfortable grip options. Try the inside of the ring or wrap a finger around its outside. The smooth texture allows for a variety of comfortable grip options.

 

Reach your whole screen with one hand.

 

Flip your screen effortlessly.

 

K I C K S T A N D 

There are grips. There are kickstands. Some do both. None do both as gracefully as the Westa Clip. With the push of a button, you can convert the clip into a steady kickstand. The dual locking mechanism will hold a phone at a handy 75 degrees in portrait or landscape. The versatile kickstand is great for video conferencing, watching videos, FaceTime, following recipes. It's perfect for recording TikToks, workout videos, dance how-tos, or whatever else you creators can come up with!

 

Press the button to release the precision lock and convert the clip into a kickstand. 

 

 

 

L I E S  F L A T

Unlike many phone grips and stands, the Westa Clip lies flat. No more wobbling screens as you try to use your phone. 

 

W I R E L E S S

The Westa Clip works with wireless chargers in the open position.

 

U N I V E R S A L

 

The Westa Clip fits many phone cases using a 3M industrial adhesive. This is the same stuff they use instead of rivets to bond sheet metal and to attach GoPros to Formula 1 cars. It's strong. Just peel, place, press, and go. We recommend attaching your Westa Clip to a hard, flat case for a permanent bond. See the FAQ below for more details on the best ways to use your Westa Clip and a note on attaching the clip directly to glass-backed phones.

 

M A T E R I A L S

The Westa Clip is made from high-quality materials. Aluminum for the clip arm, button, and locking mechanism. And EMS Grivory for the base. Grivory is an exotic composite polymer that's used in specialized metal-replacement applications. If you're a collector of high-end knives, you might recognize the name. It's really cool stuff!

Always keep it in reach. The Westa Clip was designed to be used with the phone inside the pocket and the clip lever on the outside of the pocket. 

Hold the phone with your pointer or middle finger in the ring. Or wrap it over the top. Or try pinching it with two fingers. Lots of options! Do you use your phone in bed? Yes, of course you do. Finally, you can lie on your side with your phone propped at a comfortable angle without it flopping over. 

Push the side button, lift the lever open, and enjoy your phone in landscape or portrait. Push the side button again to release the lock. 

You might not think halving the time it takes to get to your phone is important to you. Until you get used to it. Do you remember the last time you forgot to turn your ringer off in a meeting or a movie? 

The Westa Clip works best on smooth, hard cases with a flat surface under the clip. The other thing to keep in mind is the location of your cameras and fingerprint readers. With the clip attached at the bottom of the phone as we recommend, it most likely won't interfere with your phone's features. If you're not sure, you can measure.  

 Depth: 8mm

We estimate all rewards will ship by October.  

 

Who is this “we?”

Hi. I'm Michael. I was born and raised in Northern California. I ride bikes, motorcycles, and things which slide on snow. I used to build software, but now I build hardware. I’m obsessed with woodworking videos on YouTube.  

 

I’m the hands-on type, so I taught myself how to do nearly every part of this project. Designing and 3D printing prototypes, branding, web development, graphic design, patents and trademarks, package design, sourcing, logistics… That’s not to say I haven’t had amazing help along the way. I’ve recruited the help of a wonderful design engineer to elevate the Westa Clip into the great product it has become. Craig really knows his stuff. He has brought many successful products to market, including bike accessories, toys, and motor racing products. And to the friends and experts who have volunteered their help along the way, thank you.

What is Westa?

Westa's spirit is somewhere outside, playing in the mountains. But what it really comes down to is making the best products for the things you do. We thrive on motion, doing, exercising, connecting, and experiencing. I want to build quality products we’d both actually use everyday. Products which are ridiculously practical. I hope that ethos is felt by you in every single product Westa makes.

 How is Westa's supply chain doing?

Our factory is working hard on the Westa Clip everyday. Their staff is healthy and taking all available precautions to maintain a safe working environment and safe products. They've made the molds and we have completed three rounds of tool revisions to really perfect the clip. They started making the first production run two weeks ago. We expect that first batch will be ready to ship from the factory by October.

We made a lot of prototypes to get here. The first was cut and hammered out of a steel sheet. It was an ugly failure. But we did discover that a nickel and dime are the perfect dimensions for a Westa Grip Ring. Plus, cutting steel with a grinder is always a good time, right?

Over on the 3D printer, the first problems to solve were the basic dimensions of the clip - how long, how tall, how to mount it? Once that was optimized, dozens of ring textures were tested. I think you’ll love the perfect balance of grip and smoothness for a nice hold that won’t feel rough when rotating your phone.

The kickstand had to be sturdy without compromising the main clip function. So with the help of an amazing design engineer, we crafted a slick double-lock mechanism to solidly hold your phone in portrait or landscape. I could be wrong, but I don’t think any other phone grip can claim this capability. Once we finalized the mechanism, we spent months refining the look, feel, and function through progressive prototypes. Now we’re here, ready to launch with a finely-tuned product. We’ve got real product, from production molds. We’re ready to go. I hope you like it!

Here are some of the things we’ve done to make the Westa Clip great:

• The Westa Clip is very far along in its development, reducing the risk of failing to deliver. I have paid for and made the tooling, meaning the factory is now ready to manufacture. The clips you see here in pictures and video are the real thing, from factory molds.
• We have gone through twelve significant engineering revisions of the Westa Clip (as of this writing) in our effort to perfect the product.

• The Westa Clip is made from high quality aluminum and Grivory, plus a 3M adhesive. Those of you who know high-end pocket knives will know Grivory as an exotic, high-strength polymer which is used in place of metal in specialized applications. It’s really cool stuff.

• All things eventually wear out. Especially something you use all day, every day. The Westa Clip was designed with this in-mind. We utilize wedges in the lock mechanism which wear in as you use it. This helps keep your clip tight as it wears over its lifetime - another innovation inspired by high-quality pocket knives.

column2: >There are other smart doorbells available. So what makes FlexiBell better? The good thing about FlexiBell is, that it's actually rather dumb! In a good way. FlexiBell does not require internet access to function. Neither do its users. There's no app needed to use FlexiBell. The device works via mobile network to deliver a simple phone call. FlexiBell is ideal for outside conditions, it is durable in contact with rain and wind so it can be installed also to the gate. FlexiBell has a gate opening function, if the customer has an automated gate.
>The device has a SIM card already. You just have to mount the metal istallation plate on to the wall or the gate.
>Activate FlexiBell using the app*. It's ready to use!

column3:
>______
*the app is only needed for setup

column2: >FlexiBell comes in three tones. To blend in. Or stand out. It's up to the user.

column1: • Anyone living in a private house or detached house
• Your children can call you at any time, when they loose their keys and the mobile phone is empty or missing.
• Your neighbors can always communicate with you, even when you are travelling.
• Your delivery guy or postman can reach you every time.
• It is common for burglars to ring doorbells before they act, with FlexiBell they think you are always home.
• If you have little children  who take a nap then ordinary “ding-dong” bells are noisy and therefore cause more stress.
It's easy to use for everyone. Installing it is no rocket science. It does not require an internet connection. Works via mobile network with a pre-installed SIM. Compatible with any phone.
Albert Einstein once said that if you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself. We took it a little bit further and say that if your dog can understand it, it is simple!

We want to produce a doorbell that is elegant and easy to use for everyone. The bell has to be equally easy to use for a courier or a toddler. This is why it has only one button and works through a mobile network. Existing smart doorbells are too complicated to use and they work mainly with WiFi, but what if the WiFi is not accessible? With FlexiBell it will never happen and we need your help to bring FlexiBell to the market.

1. We have produced 10 FlexiBells in a real manufacturing site. The electronics have been manufactured and the housings have been made using molds.
2. We have a lot of orders from businesses and we want to launch an Indiegogo campaign to also reach our private customers.
3. We have agreed conditions with manufacturers. FlexiBell will be produced in Estonia.
4. We have an agreement with a Vodafone subsidiary for mobile service.
We already have a working prototype and now we’re looking for funds to put FlexiBell into mass production. We know what we’re doing
column2: We have the know-how and skills to do it because we've led the development and manufacturing of other hardware products in previous companies, including Myoton Muscle Diagnostics, Airpatrol air conditioner controller that can be managed via cell phone, the first GPS / GSM car security system, Fleximoover a disabled children's rehabilitation training device.

column1: Now we just need your help to bring FlexiBell to customer!

column2: >Our team has helped to create various products for the past 15 years. Our mission is to develop items that are not just beautiful or cool but also simple — we want to help people.

column1: Iseasi Design Bureau -  designers of FlexiBell. They helped us with their knowledge of how to deal with different materials and how to produce the housing. They are also investors in the company.
Buildit Hardware Accelerator - we participated in the Buildit acceleration program. They are supporting us with their network, knowldege and investments.
Telecommunications service company Elisa - we have a partnership to provide FlexiBell users with mobile connection and SIM cards.
There's always risks that can delay the process before FlexiBell gets into your hands. We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we are dealing with.

Component supply: FlexiBell, or any product for that matter, contains a significant amount of components. These components come from different suppliers which have different lead times for their components. If ONE of these suppliers has a short supply or a long lead time this will delay the entire production if a substitute is not found for that component.

Enhancements in production: When in production there are a couple of parameters that can be improved during the process such as the color, click feeling, translucence, IP code etc. Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with FlexiBell. We will do everything we can to ensure that FlexiBell ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.

column2: >FlexiBell can be installed inside and outside, it means that you can install it even behind the gate. Because it is designed and built for outside conditions.

column1: 2. What power supply do I need?

column2: >A 5-30Vdc power supply is built in, just plug in the mains cable provided.
>It will work anywhere in the world where there is a mobile network and it can receive a signal.

column1: 4. Can it be used from another country?

column2: >It can be used from anywhere in the world as long as you have access to a phone.

>Your calls will be charged at your mobile operators rate but the first six months in Europe is free, covered by us. Door or gate opening function does not cost anything. It is operating with you existing door or gate automatics.

column1: 6. What hapens with after six months?

column2: >You may continue with our service for 2 euros a month in Europe.
>Or You can choose Your own mobile network service provider.

column1: 7. What’s different from Smart Doorbell devices on the market?

column2: >FlexiBell does not require WiFi. FlexiBell is always available for you and is independent from internet connection.

column1: 8. How do you set up FlexiBell?

column2: >FlexiBell can be set up using our app. (The app is only needed for setup – for daily use of FlexiBell, the app is not needed.)

column1: 9.  How does the FlexiBell door or gate opening function work (remote access)?
There is two ways to operate your automated gate:

column2: >1. You can open the gate during the FlexiBell call with your guest.  Just dial 1 on your phone.

>2. You can open the gate for yourself. Just make a phonecall to FlexiBell and the signal will be delivered to automatics and the gate or door opens (You can set up Users in the FlexiBell App). Therefore you can use you phone as a gate remote control.

column1: 10. Does FlexiBell work with any electric gate or lock?

column2: >Thank you for helping us make life simpler!

>FlexiBell is a simple idea but we believe it can impact our daily lives in a huge way. We’re still a new start up that's been launched with our personal savings so that’s why we need your help. You can support by pledging and sharing the campaign on social media. Every euro will go towards production.
>

column1: There are other smart doorbells available. So what makes FlexiBell better? The good thing about FlexiBell is, that it's actually rather dumb! In a good way. FlexiBell does not require internet access to function. Neither do its users. There's no app needed to use FlexiBell. The device works via mobile network to deliver a simple phone call. FlexiBell is ideal for outside conditions, it is durable in contact with rain and wind so it can be installed also to the gate. FlexiBell has a gate opening function, if the customer has an automated gate.
The device has a SIM card already. You just have to mount the metal istallation plate on to the wall or the gate.
Activate FlexiBell using the app*. It's ready to use!
______*the app is only needed for setup
FlexiBell comes in three tones. To blend in. Or stand out. It's up to the user.
Anyone living in a private house or detached house
Situations when you benefit from FlexiBell:
Your children can call you at any time, when they loose their keys and the mobile phone is empty or missing.
Your neighbors can always communicate with you, even when you are travelling.
Your delivery guy or postman can reach you every time.
It is common for burglars to ring doorbells before they act, with FlexiBell they think you are always home.
If you have little children  who take a nap then ordinary “ding-dong” bells are noisy and therefore cause more stress.
It's easy to use for everyone. Installing it is no rocket science. It does not require an internet connection. Works via mobile network with a pre-installed SIM. Compatible with any phone.
Albert Einstein once said that if you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself. We took it a little bit further and say that if your dog can understand it, it is simple!

We want to produce a doorbell that is elegant and easy to use for everyone. The bell has to be equally easy to use for a courier or a toddler. This is why it has only one button and works through a mobile network. Existing smart doorbells are too complicated to use and they work mainly with WiFi, but what if the WiFi is not accessible? With FlexiBell it will never happen and we need your help to bring FlexiBell to the market.
WHERE WE ARE AT THE MOMENT

1. We have produced 10 FlexiBells in a real manufacturing site. The electronics have been manufactured and the housings have been made using molds.2. We have a lot of orders from businesses and we want to launch an Indiegogo campaign to also reach our private customers.3. We have agreed conditions with manufacturers. FlexiBell will be produced in Estonia.4. We have an agreement with a Vodafone subsidiary for mobile service.
We already have a working prototype and now we’re looking for funds to put FlexiBell into mass production. We know what we’re doing
column2: We have the know-how and skills to do it because we've led the development and manufacturing of other hardware products in previous companies, including Myoton Muscle Diagnostics, Airpatrol air conditioner controller that can be managed via cell phone, the first GPS / GSM car security system, Fleximoover a disabled children's rehabilitation training device.

column1: Now we just need your help to bring FlexiBell to customer!
Our team has helped to create various products for the past 15 years. Our mission is to develop items that are not just beautiful or cool but also simple — we want to help people.
Iseasi Design Bureau -  designers of FlexiBell. They helped us with their knowledge of how to deal with different materials and how to produce the housing. They are also investors in the company.
Buildit Hardware Accelerator - we participated in the Buildit acceleration program. They are supporting us with their network, knowldege and investments.
Telecommunications service company Elisa - we have a partnership to provide FlexiBell users with mobile connection and SIM cards.
There's always risks that can delay the process before FlexiBell gets into your hands. We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we are dealing with.

Component supply: FlexiBell, or any product for that matter, contains a significant amount of components. These components come from different suppliers which have different lead times for their components. If ONE of these suppliers has a short supply or a long lead time this will delay the entire production if a substitute is not found for that component.

Enhancements in production: When in production there are a couple of parameters that can be improved during the process such as the color, click feeling, translucence, IP code etc. Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with FlexiBell. We will do everything we can to ensure that FlexiBell ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.
FlexiBell can be installed inside and outside, it means that you can install it even behind the gate. Because it is designed and built for outside conditions.
2. What power supply do I need?
A 5-30Vdc power supply is built in, just plug in the mains cable provided.
It will work anywhere in the world where there is a mobile network and it can receive a signal.
4. Can it be used from another country?
It can be used from anywhere in the world as long as you have access to a phone.

Your calls will be charged at your mobile operators rate but the first six months in Europe is free, covered by us. Door or gate opening function does not cost anything. It is operating with you existing door or gate automatics.
6. What hapens with after six months?
You may continue with our service for 2 euros a month in Europe.
Or You can choose Your own mobile network service provider.
7. What’s different from Smart Doorbell devices on the market?
FlexiBell does not require WiFi. FlexiBell is always available for you and is independent from internet connection.
8. How do you set up FlexiBell?
FlexiBell can be set up using our app. (The app is only needed for setup – for daily use of FlexiBell, the app is not needed.)
9.  How does the FlexiBell door or gate opening function work (remote access)?
There is two ways to operate your automated gate:
1. You can open the gate during the FlexiBell call with your guest.  Just dial 1 on your phone.

2. You can open the gate for yourself. Just make a phonecall to FlexiBell and the signal will be delivered to automatics and the gate or door opens (You can set up Users in the FlexiBell App). Therefore you can use you phone as a gate remote control.
10. Does FlexiBell work with any electric gate or lock?
Thank you for helping us make life simpler!

FlexiBell is a simple idea but we believe it can impact our daily lives in a huge way. We’re still a new start up that's been launched with our personal savings so that’s why we need your help. You can support by pledging and sharing the campaign on social media. Every euro will go towards production.",28.0,0,"2 Campaigns

My name is Daniel Berenguer and I am the founder of the panStamp project. As a freelance electronic architect, I’ve been faced with dozens of situations where measurements had to be transmitted wirelessly to remote IP servers. In every case, I realized that there was no easy way to accomplish this without developing custom gateways and IP services or even building custom hardware. There was no way for professionals or enthusiasts to create wireless sensor/actuator networks hooked to the cloud without spending too much time and money or relying on proprietary “black boxes”. Some of the current available solutions allow us to create low-power wireless networks for metering and automation projects. Some other solutions concentrate on providing cloud data storage and graphic representation. However, there is still a gap between both sides of the picture, where one has to do a large amount of work in order to bring real measurements to the IP world.

panStamp is a solution which completely provides all the necessary components to create low-power wireless networks for metering and automation applications and unlike other solutions, panStamp stays truly open and extensible. Everyone has the ability to pick their preferred hardware, software application and remote cloud data service. Wireless boards can then be configured via our Device Management Tool whilst server applications provide a complete web interface for managing readings and program actuations based on time or network events. Finally, data can be pushed to a number of cloud solutions as Pachube or ThingSpeak.

panStamps are small wireless “Arduino clone” boards with all the necessary parts to start measuring analog and binary data and control PWM and binary loads. Data is then transmitted over the air thanks to the on-board CC1101 radio IC at 868/915 MHz. Being arduino software compatible boards, panStamps can be programmed easily from the Arduino IDE. Moreover, we provide a library that simplifies developing new applications for panStamps whilst releasing the developer from having to deal with RF-related tasks. On the other hand, anyone can use panStamps without having to develop a single line of code. By choosing any of the available application images and base boards, you will be able to set-up your own wireless network in minutes.

Once real data is on the air, a Lagarto computer can read them and trigger one of the programmed events such as sending a wireless command or pushing data to the cloud. Lagarto is a free server-client software solution written in Python that has been specially designed to bring wireless panStamp networks to the IP cloud. Moreover, new Lagarto servers and clients can be (and will be) developed, providing support for new M2M technologies and functionalities. The following link provides further information about how the panStamp ecosystem works: www.panstamp.com/how-it-works

The project is now in a mature stage and it has been beta-tested for three months. We count on an active team of independent beta-testers that have been providing us, not only with bug detections, but also with lots of fresh ideas. At this moment we are ready for production on the following items:
On the other hand, we are actively working on completing and testing these other components of the solution:
• Application generator wizard for new wireless panStamp firmwares

Documentation-side, we have a wiki providing technical details for users and programmers. There is also our technical blog, where the real genesis and progress of the project is documented. Finally, we maintain a mailing list and should be able to release our own discussion forum soon.

Commercial-side, our website is already available at www.panstamp.com which is our virtual face on the web. Meanwhile, our company will finally be started at the end of this campaign. But before that, we need to acquire funds in order to complete the remaining work and invest in an initial stock. We want to break down the price of panStamps so we need to be able to work with high quantities on our first production batch.

Development-side, we need to produce a number of prototypes before releasing new boards and designs. We need to develop some Lagarto applications as well and test everything before going to production.
What do you get by helping us?

Your perks will be rewarded in form of pieces of hardware. Your investment will help us to start our production and increase the panStamp community at the same time. A double positive effect with a single perk!!

panStamps will not be prototypes but real production units. After the end of this campaign, we will need between four and six weeks to produce our first stock before sending your panStamps to your shipping address. You will find detailed updates on production and shipping from the “Updates” tab. You must also know, that in case we are not able to acquire our target funds, we would not receive a single cent and you would be refunded the total amount of your perk. Please see indiegogo’s policies for more details about this.
If you don’t want to spend your money but still want to help us, there are still some ways to do it:
• Build your panStamp clone and become a beta-tester for future applications
• Develop new Lagarto servers and clients for your preferred automation technologies
• Send us your inquiries and suggestions. This will help us to improve our systems and services
• Post any automation-related message on our future forum

My name is Daniel Berenguer and I am the founder of the panStamp project. As a freelance electronic architect, I’ve been faced with dozens of situations where measurements had to be transmitted wirelessly to remote IP servers. In every case, I realized that there was no easy way to accomplish this without developing custom gateways and IP services or even building custom hardware. There was no way for professionals or enthusiasts to create wireless sensor/actuator networks hooked to the cloud without spending too much time and money or relying on proprietary “black boxes”. Some of the current available solutions allow us to create low-power wireless networks for metering and automation projects. Some other solutions concentrate on providing cloud data storage and graphic representation. However, there is still a gap between both sides of the picture, where one has to do a large amount of work in order to bring real measurements to the IP world.

panStamp is a solution which completely provides all the necessary components to create low-power wireless networks for metering and automation applications and unlike other solutions, panStamp stays truly open and extensible. Everyone has the ability to pick their preferred hardware, software application and remote cloud data service. Wireless boards can then be configured via our Device Management Tool whilst server applications provide a complete web interface for managing readings and program actuations based on time or network events. Finally, data can be pushed to a number of cloud solutions as Pachube or ThingSpeak.
How does the panStamp ecosystem work?

panStamps are small wireless “Arduino clone” boards with all the necessary parts to start measuring analog and binary data and control PWM and binary loads. Data is then transmitted over the air thanks to the on-board CC1101 radio IC at 868/915 MHz. Being arduino software compatible boards, panStamps can be programmed easily from the Arduino IDE. Moreover, we provide a library that simplifies developing new applications for panStamps whilst releasing the developer from having to deal with RF-related tasks. On the other hand, anyone can use panStamps without having to develop a single line of code. By choosing any of the available application images and base boards, you will be able to set-up your own wireless network in minutes.

Once real data is on the air, a Lagarto computer can read them and trigger one of the programmed events such as sending a wireless command or pushing data to the cloud. Lagarto is a free server-client software solution written in Python that has been specially designed to bring wireless panStamp networks to the IP cloud. Moreover, new Lagarto servers and clients can be (and will be) developed, providing support for new M2M technologies and functionalities. The following link provides further information about how the panStamp ecosystem works: www.panstamp.com/how-it-works
Why do we need your support?

The project is now in a mature stage and it has been beta-tested for three months. We count on an active team of independent beta-testers that have been providing us, not only with bug detections, but also with lots of fresh ideas. At this moment we are ready for production on the following items:
Device Management Tool for wireless networks
On the other hand, we are actively working on completing and testing these other components of the solution:
RGB LED driver board for panStamps
Power meter base board for panStamps
Plastic enclosure for the above boards
Application generator wizard for new wireless panStamp firmwares

Documentation-side, we have a wiki providing technical details for users and programmers. There is also our technical blog, where the real genesis and progress of the project is documented. Finally, we maintain a mailing list and should be able to release our own discussion forum soon.

Commercial-side, our website is already available at www.panstamp.com which is our virtual face on the web. Meanwhile, our company will finally be started at the end of this campaign. But before that, we need to acquire funds in order to complete the remaining work and invest in an initial stock. We want to break down the price of panStamps so we need to be able to work with high quantities on our first production batch.

Development-side, we need to produce a number of prototypes before releasing new boards and designs. We need to develop some Lagarto applications as well and test everything before going to production.
What do you get by helping us?

You will find detailed updates on production and shipping from the “Updates” tab. You must also know, that in case we are not able to acquire our target funds, we would not receive a single cent and you would be refunded the total amount of your perk. Please see indiegogo’s policies for more details about this.

column2:
>

Our ANVOLVE Wallet is designed to have a minimalistic and cool look. With one easy pull, all your cards will lay out in a ladder-like fashion, allowing you to choose your cards with ease.  ANVOLVE Wallet uses leather and fabric for the wallet and the card slots respectively, helping you achieve a practical and sleek look whether you are running for a quick errand or strolling down the streets. The magnets attached to the back of the wallet allow you to attach and detach from the back of the phone effortlessly.  With the wallet attached to the back of your phone, it gives a complete, whole look to your case.
column3:
>

Meet ANVOLVE Survival.

A survival card tool that comes with a plastic frame so it can be attached to the back of your case through magnets. The poly edges on both ends give a metallic look for the entire gadget to accompany the survival card. The opening of the frame allows you to slide your card in and out with ease. The card will not fall out as there are slots within the frame to keep it secured.

https://vimeo.com/535122149 

Having this gadget on the back of your case is practical for daily life use. Whether it be opening a bottle or cutting an object, this is the gadget.

column1: ANVOLVE Fidget is unique from the majority of the fidgets toy on the market. Our ANVOLVE Fidget is modular so you can mix and match with the other fidget toys to your liking.
Not feeling like playing with the joystick? Just slide it out and switch in any of the other 10 fidget toys that we offer.
Don't really like the position of your fidget toy? Just move it to a different position with another toy.
Our ANVOLVE Fidget offers fidget toys ranging from basic ones like joysticks to new and more sensory ones like to pull cords and velcro straps.
In time, based on your feedback, we will design more fidget toys to add to your customisable and modular fidget.
Last but not least, within our ANVOLVE Fidget are slots for each module, allowing each individual fidget toy to slide in and stay intact.
ANVOLVE Covid is the gadget you need for this pandemic. Our ANVOLVE Covid uses leather for the cover, fabric and plastic for the band grip.

With the pandemic going on, we believe it is essential for everyone to have a gadget where they can have their personal hygienic products all in one place. ANVOLVE Covid does just that. ANVOLVE Covid allows you to store your hand sanitiser, alcohol wipes and mask inside. The mesh pockets is there to protect them from moving around.
Instead of digging around your bag for some wipes, simply unzip ANVOLVE Covid attached to the back of your phone and pull it out.
Eating at a restaurant and not sure where to place your mask in a clean place? ANVOLVE COVID is your answer. The elastic mesh pocket will keep your mask safe.

For all of these gadgets to attach to the back of your phone, we have designed a magnetic case where there are 4 neodymium magnets hidden beneath the leather layer. 

https://vimeo.com/535611105

The position of these magnets on the case are aligned with the magnets on the underside of every gadget, allowing you to attach and detach it easily from the back of the case. You can switch between the Wallet, Survival, Fidget and Covid gadgets based on your mood.
Although all ANVOLVE Gadgets come in one size only,  we have magnetic cases supporting the recent iPhone and Samsung models.

column2:
>The beginning of the fidget gadget

The fidget gadget design follows the idea of a modular concept. We wanted it to have a wide variety of fidget toys for you to choose from and be able to customise it to your wanting. 

From then on, we began refining the idea, as well as expanding fidget toy options to give our buyers the freedom to customise it. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

The survival gadget design was the trickiest of them all. How can the gadget be functional but not too bulky or thick?  An essential part of our process of coming up with the perfect design was this question.
column3:
>Conceptual Idea of the Survival Gadget 

This conceptual idea consisted of both pull-out and embedded tools. However, thickness remained an issue and the plausibility of this design was low. 

 

So why not take something that already exists and make it better?

This led us to the survival card. Essentially, we decided to go with this design as it was both sleek, practical and thin.

________________________________________________________________________________________

What are phone accessories without the basic wallet?

The first draft of the wallet design was a basically a bi-fold wallet inspired from Distil Union. 

However, we realised this design was too thick so we decided to eliminate everything else and just leave the pullout slot and strap.

This led us to simply creating a sleeve with a strap used to pull out the cards store within the slot. 

______________________________________________________________________________________

With COVID-19 going on, we wanted to create an accessory mainly for the storage of essential items during this pandemic. So we created the COVID gadget. This gadget allows you to place your masks, alcohol wipes, spray inside the mesh pockets. 

We added a band grip on top of the gadget for easier grip. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

Eventually, we began 3D rendering them.  

________________________________________________________________________________________

Risks and Challenges:

Some of the challenges we faced were trying to narrow down the plethora of ideas that we had for the gadgets. We talked with potential consumers to see what would fit their needs the best. Eventually, we came up with these four ANVOLVE Gadgets that embody fun and practical traits. 

Due to the pandemic, we might face delays during the production and shipping of the ANVOLVE Case and Gadgets. Nevertheless, we will be sure to keep you updated of any changes.

Reusability and recyclability:

You can keep your magnetic case when more gadgets are being produced as the positions of the magnets remain the same throughout all designs.

Sustainable fulfillment and distribution:

We will optimise shipping and delivery by grouping orders by country and keeping the size of the packaging to a minimum.

This electronic device helps you to protect your most precious valuables, such as your Smartphone, your keys or any other item which is important to you.
Just by pressing a button, BlueBee will find your lost property and save you time, money and stress.
All you have to do is attach the BlueBee mini-tape to your belongings and relax!
Forbes: Lost-And-Found Gets Crowdsourced With BlueBee

column4: fb_aggregation_id=288381481237582"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Indiegogo of the week: get other people to look for your lost stuff!

column1: DadDoes: BlueBee, finally a way to crowdsource the finding of my keys
Peace Magazine: BlueBee, a revolutionary lost-and-found in your pocket
MacMagazine: Pequeno acessório que parece uma fita cassete impede que você perca seus objetos mais valiosos

column4: fb_aggregation_id=288381481237582"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">BlueBee: sleutelbos terugvinden met je iPhone via andere gebruikers

column1: Paradoxe Temporel: BlueBee pour localiser à distance des objets
Certi-Car: Ne cherchez plus votre auto, BlueBee vous la localise !
Génération-NT: BlueBee, la balise de localisation communautaire
Economie Nouvelle: Interview avec BlueBee: des balises de localisation avec recherche communautaire
iPhon.fr: Une solution bluetooth originale pour retrouver ses objets précieux et même son iPhone ...
Journal du Geek : BlueBee, une balise de localisation avec une autonomie d'un an !
BlueBee is easily attached to the things you want to protect like your keys, your car, your bag, your pets or anything else you want to keep safe.

BlueBee is based on the Blue Crowd Search technology. This is a completely new way of thinking geolocalisation. This system taps the power of the crowd to find your lost objects, which makes it possible to build very small, affordable and power-efficient tracking devices.

With ""BlueCrowdSearch"" you can find your things with the help of other BlueBee users. Wherever your lost valuables are, it can be automatically detected by the smartphone of another BlueBee user passing by, and it will notify you with the exact location. Of course, everything is automatic
column2: other users don’t even know their devices are looking for your stuff!

column1: And in order to make the Blue Crowd network even stronger we are already discussing partnerships with some of the big mobile app development companies to integrate our API into their apps. This will bring thousands of users into the Blue Crowd network from the very beginning making it ready to roll.

The Blue Crowd Search network enables long range localisation. It is the perfect solution to find a lost wallet, a stolen car or a missing pet. In order to cover our service maintenance costs, users will be invited to buy an annual subscription (starting at 15 euros/year) ... HOWEVER ...
We have decided that every Indiegogo contributor will be offered a FREE golden membership which provides a LIFE PASS to the Blue Crowd Search network.

Indeed we believe that as an Indiegogo contributor not only are you helping to create the initial core of the Blue Crowd Search user network, but you also believe in this project as much as we do and this really matters to us. Early adopters should never have to pay for the Blue Crowd Search service.

The BlueBee app helps you finding your things quickly and easily. It was designed with passion to be powerful and intuitive, and its polished interface will make your user experience even more appealing.
There are 5 great features in the app:
1) Bee Map: you can see on a map where and when you left your BlueBee
2) Reminder: you can be warned when you get too far from your BlueBee
3) Smart Zone : save some safe places like your home and your office to be warned if and only if your valuables leave these Smart Zones.
4) Bee Buzz: in a 50 meters range you can see on the radar how far you are from your BlueBee and make it ring to find it quickly
5) Remote shutter: this is a fun bonus feature :) you can use the BlueBee mini-tape button to remotely shut your smartphone camera and take neat group pictures
BlueBee is easily attached to the things you want to protect. You can use the App to find the mini-tape and make it ring.
The BlueBee button triggers an alarm on your smartphone so that you can find it quickly and easily.

column2: lasts about 1 year on a single charge

column1: Compatibility: iOS and Android with Bluetooth Low Energy
• iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 (iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, new iPad, New Touch, iPad mini)
• Android devices supporting Bluetooth Low Energy, running Android 4.0 and newer. The Samsung S3 and Note 2.0 have been successfully tested so far, more test news to come...

We're focused on developing a new generation of wireless objects and smartphone accessories: things that will make people's lives easier. We also believe that technology can completely change the way we interact with our environment and with other people. After realizing two years ago how powerful the cooperation between thousands of people willing to help each other can be, we decided to start X6 Innovations and its first project: BlueBee.

By reaching Indiegogo we are willing to prove a genuine interest in this product, and design something really amazing and user-centered, based on the feedback of the early adopters. Each Indiegogo supporter makes our BlueCrowdSearch network grow larger and stronger, helping all of its members. We also wanted to make this technology affordable for everybody, and the only way to do that is to have a high initial production volume, which can be achieved with help of Indiegogo users.

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put BlueBee into production. We have the best French electronics and computer science engineers by our side, many of whom have led development and manufacturing of several hardware products for companies and research labs. All we need now is your support.
With your help BlueBee and the first pocket Lost-and-Found system will become a reality.
Ask on the comment thread here or email contact@x6innovations.com

Please note that you have to add an additional amount to the perk price for shipping! Indeed, we didn't include shipping fees in the perk price because we wanted to offer you the chipset possible BlueBees (and thus we don't make ANY profit from this!).
So please, when submitting your contribution remember to add the following amount to the perk for shipping:

column2: Switzerland (Germany, Belgium, Denmark, France, Spain, Estonia, Finland, UK, Ireland, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Suede, Switzerland): please add $10 to the perk amount

column1: - International (including USA and Canada) : please add $15 to the perk amount
Thank you very much and keep on supporting BlueBee!!!

- European Union & Switzerland (Germany, Belgium, Denmark, France, Spain, Estonia, Finland, UK, Ireland, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Suede, Switzerland): please add $10 to the perk amount
- International (including USA and Canada) : please add $15 to the perk amount
Thank you very much and keep on supporting BlueBee!!!",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

""While handing over my son to my ex, I thought of emBrace""!

column7: >was born on this simple idea, and it avalanched to a cutting edge security device for <span style=""font-size: 24px

column1:
We have packaged together all the high tech gizmos you already have, in a beautiful bracelet for your loved ones.


emBrace can monitor your loved for you: where they are, how their pulse and temperature are, and send all the data to you, on your PC, on your tablet, on your smartphone, even on your old-generation phone.
column3: >emBrace is light-weight, flexible, and one size fits all.
column5:
>

emBrace packages GPS sensor, temperature sensor and pulse sensor
column6: and can reach you though GSM SMS* and 3G/4G. Making sure the data can reach you where ever the bracelet is and <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column7: >In case the bracelet is removed a notification is sent right away, with its last known location.
column8:
>

*Through SMS technology the bracelet stays connected to you even when 3G/4G fail, making its range almost global.


emBrace can give you peace of mind, for the well-being of anyone you love!

emBrace needs You to Grow!

We have developed emBrace to our limits, now we need your help!

emBrace is ready to monitor your loved ones and to communicate to you their status. emBrace can inform you through the internet (3G/4G), through a phone call, and through SMS. Our prototype is ready and needs a home to grow. We need to go into manufacture and certification. This is where you come in!


That is not all though, emBrace needs to grow in many more ways. We have plans for voice communication, voice recognition, camera communication, and many more, but while you wait for further development we want you to be safe, hence we are launching.


Your contributions will help us finance the final stages of manufacture and certification. More than that though we offer pre-purchases of emBraces
column9:
emBrace will hit the market in Q2 2014, be the first to have one, be the first to protect your loved ones!


The Details are inside.

We have packaged together, a sim card module, a gps module, temperature sensor, and pulse sensor. We have put inside a memory module as well, capable of holding one second data, for over 2000 hours! 


emBrace itself can initiate alarms and communicate with all that are listening to it, through the web-app, or the mobile-app, or even SMS and a phone call. 


Multiple people can monitor the same emBrace.
column10: >Each emBrace is coded with a unique secure key, so that only authorized persons can access it.
column12: >With emBrace you can set alarms for location change, pulse change, temperature change, even speed and acceleration limits! emBrace will contact you immediately if any of your alarms are fired, giving you a head start on any problem.
column14:
>

emBrace was invented on the idea of keeping our young ones safe and always under our wing. emBrace though is ready to guard anyone, of all ages and all situations. Your elderly, disabled, or even just simply eachother.

Embrace, emBrace!

Spread the Word, emBrace!

Tell people! Tell people! Tell people!

emBrace is ready to help everyone as long as everyone learns about it. So please spread the word, and the word is emBrace!

","""While handing over my son to my ex, I thought of emBrace""! - Roys R.

column1:
0,"
 

Fastpad 10W wireless car charger provides you with a perfect phone charging solution. It is equipped with QC3.0 adapter that you can fully enjoy fast charging. Does it always happen to you that you can’t find the phone cables? Or can’t find the jack accurately to plug in your cables?
column2:
>Intelligent Control on the Temperature

As we all know, while charging, the temperature will greatly affect the charging efficiency. What’s worse is that overheat possibly causes many hidden dangers, such as explosive and flammable. To avoid these dangers, Fastpad applies a unique optimization scheme to reduce the charging pad heat generated during charging. Fast charging with no heat protects your phone from hurt.
column3:
>Intelligent Induction

Fastpad's unique intelligent sensing system allows you to enjoy the convenience of wireless charging. The Fastpad can identify the models of mobile phones quickly and start charging automatically while you put on your phone. The charging function is only for smart phones which support Qi tech wireless charging.

column4:
>High Sensitivity

It's very likely that we use cases to protect phones. Fastpad has a extremely high sensitivity, so you don't need take off your phone case while charging. However for your successful charging, we suggest that thickness of the phone case is not more than 2mm.
column5:
>A Large-area Induction

 

Fastpad uses high-quality induction coils and has a larger effective induction area than traditional wireless chargers, which ensure stable charging, high conversion rate and heat dissipation. This charger supports 5W/7.5W/10W power output and is compatible with QC2.0/QC3.0 USB car charger. In order to achieve fast charging, we suggest 7.5W or 10W output with QC3.0 USB car charger. Now early bird can get free QC3.0 USB car charger!
column6:
>Tightly Holding

When we are driving, sometimes the traditional car holder can't hold the phone firmly, we keep upgrading and testing our prototype to realise a better holding. Fastpad charger holder will hold your phone tightly even under tough driving condition.
column7: />

column1: We use high-quality stepper motor and specially-designed gear rotating which effectively reduce the noise and ensure the smooth movement. The stepper motor promotes an extremely tight locking which prevents your phone from falling.

column2:
/>

 
 

Your family may want to charge in the car, but there is no car holder. Have you noticed the groove at the base? With it, the wireless charger can be used as a phone holder for wired charging phones.
The only thing to note is that you should be careful not to touch the extremely sensitive touching switch on the bottom to prevent your phone from falling.
column3:
>Selected Silica Gel Holds Your Phone Well

We know that you care about your smart phone very much. So we apply high-quality silica gel to Fastpad which does not hurt the body, and also holds the phone firmly. The stability and protection are excellent.
column5:
>Non-slip Rubber Clip Clamps Vents

 

We tried the traditional car holder mount solution, but after sun exposure, the base will be very weak after long-term use. Hence we adopted a unique clip method — mechanical fixing method, so that the wireless charger can be used in many different situations. The durability is greatly increased.

 

 

Meet Fastpad Team

We are a team who is working out to connect technology and life. Technology will make our life better. Wireless charging is such a thing that betters our life. It is applied to phone charging now, and in the future, we believe it will be applied to more areas. We often encounter situations where the phone is out of power while driving. USB car charger is a solution, but whose charging speed is extremely slow. Power bank is another solution, but which is inconvenient to carry. So we are thinking of a device which can charge phone fast and is easy-control. So Fastpad came out. Fastpad is a 10W wireless car charger. It provides a new phone charging way while driving which helps people get rid of messy cables. Fastpad is also a phone holder. People are always distressed about no safe place for their phones while driving. Fastpad is the solution. We believe Fastpad will be the best companion beside you. In the last several months, our team was striving to perfect Fastpad 10W wireless car charger. Until now, technology has got a great improvement. For the further study and mass production, we make this campaign. We also hope more people can get pleasure from wireless car charger. Our Fastpad is ready to be your partner.
