column2: >A product designed by Think Big Factory
>Just when you thought the Hyperalarm couldn’t get any better, we’re proud to announce a new color option: Hyperalarm Sunrise.

>At Think Big Factory, we love heavy sleepers. That’s why we’ve designed a game-changing alarm clock specifically for you. Hyperalarm will wake you up and get you moving so that you never have to worry about early morning appointments again. So rest easy, heavy sleeper.

>With the Hyper mode activated, the only way to shut off the alarm is by getting out of bed. That’s right, you have to physically separate the Hyperalarm from your Smartphone in order for the bluetooth-based technology to deactivate the alarm.  “Five more minutes,” might have worked with your mom, but Hyperalarm doesn’t take excuses.
>And for those days when getting out of the room to turn off your alarm might be inconvenient, you can turn off the Hyper mode, turning your Hyperalarm into a smart alarm clock.

column1: We have been working non-stop on the Hyperalarm sound. It is impossible to ignore because of its use of high frequencies, and the complex sound of interwoven pitches prevents your brain from getting used to a simple tone. We will include new sounds with every software update, not only to wake you up but also to help you fall asleep and create special notifications.
Our battery life system allows you to rely on your Hyperalarm with 100% confidence. It simple won’t let you activate the alarm if the remaining battery is insufficient.
With our easy to use app, you can set up and manage your alarm seamlessly with iPhone and Android phones. Compatibility with Applewatch and Pebble Time smart watches is just on the horizon.
A smart alarm clock connected to your smartphone by Bluetooth Low Energy
Works with iOS 8 on iPhone 4s and above. Works with all Android 4.0+ phones including Samsung, HTC, Sony, LG, Google, Motorola, Xiaomi and more.
We have been working on Hyperalarm for over 8 months. Though it might undergo last-minute tweaking, its final design is complete and we have tested and validated a working prototype.

column2: >Our capable team has built a solid production plan, and we’re committed to meeting the estimated delivery times. Now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make Hyperalarm available for you.

>We are working with companies that we trust, but there could always be manufacturing or production delays outside of our control. If we experience any bumps that could affect your experience as a backer, we promise to let you know in a timely and transparent manner.

column5: >Help us by sharing Hyperalarm with your friends!

column1: Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about Hyperalarm? Share our campaign with them through the ""Share this project"" button.
Can I choose a different sound for my alarm? We will include new sounds with every software update, not only to wake you up but also to help you fall asleep and create special notifications.
• Are there other colors? If we reach 1200 units, we will introduce a new color. And yes, it’s going to be awesome.
How long does the battery last? 20 days+ without needing a charge.

The fee reflects current costs to reliably ship the Hyperalarm to you in each available country. We are shipping from Spain. Shipping costs do not include any possible extra payments, which may be added, such as customs taxes that may be charged at delivery. There are many hurdles we need to go over until we have a complete picture of the international market. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.
","A product designed by Think Big Factory
Just when you thought the Hyperalarm couldn’t get any better, we’re proud to announce a new color option: Hyperalarm Sunrise.

At Think Big Factory, we love heavy sleepers. That’s why we’ve designed a game-changing alarm clock specifically for you. Hyperalarm will wake you up and get you moving so that you never have to worry about early morning appointments again. So rest easy, heavy sleeper.

With the Hyper mode activated, the only way to shut off the alarm is by getting out of bed. That’s right, you have to physically separate the Hyperalarm from your Smartphone in order for the bluetooth-based technology to deactivate the alarm.  “Five more minutes,” might have worked with your mom, but Hyperalarm doesn’t take excuses.
And for those days when getting out of the room to turn off your alarm might be inconvenient, you can turn off the Hyper mode, turning your Hyperalarm into a smart alarm clock.

We have been working non-stop on the Hyperalarm sound. It is impossible to ignore because of its use of high frequencies, and the complex sound of interwoven pitches prevents your brain from getting used to a simple tone. We will include new sounds with every software update, not only to wake you up but also to help you fall asleep and create special notifications.
Our battery life system allows you to rely on your Hyperalarm with 100% confidence. It simple won’t let you activate the alarm if the remaining battery is insufficient.
With our easy to use app, you can set up and manage your alarm seamlessly with iPhone and Android phones. Compatibility with Applewatch and Pebble Time smart watches is just on the horizon.
A smart alarm clock connected to your smartphone by Bluetooth Low Energy
Works with iOS 8 on iPhone 4s and above. Works with all Android 4.0+ phones including Samsung, HTC, Sony, LG, Google, Motorola, Xiaomi and more.
We have been working on Hyperalarm for over 8 months. Though it might undergo last-minute tweaking, its final design is complete and we have tested and validated a working prototype.

Our capable team has built a solid production plan, and we’re committed to meeting the estimated delivery times. Now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make Hyperalarm available for you.

We are working with companies that we trust, but there could always be manufacturing or production delays outside of our control. If we experience any bumps that could affect your experience as a backer, we promise to let you know in a timely and transparent manner.
Help us by sharing Hyperalarm with your friends!
Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about Hyperalarm? Share our campaign with them through the ""Share this project"" button.
Can I choose a different sound for my alarm? We will include new sounds with every software update, not only to wake you up but also to help you fall asleep and create special notifications.
Are there other colors? If we reach 1200 units, we will introduce a new color. And yes, it’s going to be awesome.
How long does the battery last? 20 days+ without needing a charge.
Why is there a shipping fee?

The fee reflects current costs to reliably ship the Hyperalarm to you in each available country. We are shipping from Spain. Shipping costs do not include any possible extra payments, which may be added, such as customs taxes that may be charged at delivery. There are many hurdles we need to go over until we have a complete picture of the international market. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
SUPPORT US! INDIEGOGO WILL **FULLY*REFUND** YOUR PAYMENT IF WE DON'T MEET OUR FUNDING GOAL

NPlug measures room temperature, power consumption and can switch On/Off your electrical appliance from the web. We are integrating all automation examples from the video (scheduler, thermostat, carbon calculator, consumption limit, twitter sharing, etc.)
Precision instrument unlike most powermetters NPlug isn't a toy. We designed it to give meaningful readings even for devices consuming very little power.
Stand alone NPlug connects via WiFi. No need for a computer, a receiver  nor any additional device.
Keep control over your data which are stored on cosm.com. Cosm keeps you the sole owner of your data. You may also store your data on a USB flash drive.
Open source firmware all software we wrote for NPlug is open source.

Evolutive hardware NPlug features a programable ZigBee module to talk to existing Internet of Things products and the future ones. Its capabilities may also be extended by standard USB devices: 3G or bluetooth dongle, webcam, USB missile launcher, etc.
Examples of USB devices with available linux drivers
First demo of working prototype (1 year ago)

We are preparing a new video demoing our current working prototype. We've been iterating on our design for quite some time now, so while waiting for the new demo we propose you to watch one we made a year ago! Since then the electronic has been redesigned from scratch and we totally changed our approach of the enclosure: https://vimeo.com/55752637
By the way if you want to learn more about us or check the history of the project we created a Facebook timeline: http://www.facebook.com/nplugit

Our two last perks allow you to get a version of our actual working prototype. We will have to hand-solder it for you and spend some time helping you to program it. That's why it's way more expensive than the regular perks. It will not be a finish product, but you will be able to study it and have access to its source code right away. We will also send you the final version in priority when done.
What's done, What's left to do

Electronics: We have a solid and well tested prototype. Our actual board still features several solutions that we wanted to test. It needs to be refined for production to make it smaller and easy to manufacture. Certification are planed only for US and EU market.

Enclosure: We have a printed and painted concept (used for our photographs). We need to adapt it for injection molding, and have the mold made. Only one piece is to be molded, we will use a plate for the back.

Embedded Software: We have a functional version both for the Linux board (firmware running our own daemon) and the Atmel MCU. All basic features are implemented (Measurements/Sending/Receiving) and some automations, but more advanced stuff still needs to be added and tweaked.

column2: Mobile Dashboard: We will need to re-design a dashboard from scratch. We only need a front-end as Cosm.com handles the backend. We'd like to design that with you by submitting wireframes gather your feedback modify it, etc.

column1: As members of the Maker movement we recognize the right of any customer to truly own the product he or she purchases, and to be able to modify it has he wishes. All software we wrote to run in NPlug are open source — as define by opensource.org. Though some parts, mostly written by chip manufacturers aren't.

Collaborative design might just sounds like a buzz word, but in reality it is simple. It means that we will not take your money, enclose ourself in our office and get back to you 6 months later with a product you might not want any more. Instead we will keep you updated of our progress and take your inputs in consideration. We'll have a weekly post to interact with you.

Manufacturing: We are at our 5th iteration of the design, though we still need at least one more iteration to have only our final set of components on the board. From that we'll be able to start optimizing for our manufacturing partner. Each of these step implies a risk of additional costs and delays.

Delays: We based our time frame on what each phase should take to complete, but more importantly we monitored how much time similar project have taken to be delivered. Basically we allowed us as much time as kickstarter project's 'Twine' took to ship. It's a similar project, and it ran into a lot of issues so we think we are as realist as we can get.

Certifications: We will have to meet EMC and safety standards. We anticipated these tests. Even if no one can be 100% sure that he will pass these at the first try, our electrical engineer has successfully submitted dozens of products to test labs. We'll be extra careful with suppliers especially for the enclosure which is a major risk for an AC device to transmit fire. Regarding wireless, we are using modules that have already been approved separately to minimize risks.

No, we didn't submit our project to Kickstarter. We are based in France and Indiegogo has a pretty good record of hosting international projects willing to collect funds in US dollars. Besides kickstarter recently excluded home improvement projects from its guidelines.
Can you ship NPlug outside of the EU or the US?

For now we are not planning to have NPlug certified for markets outside of the United States and the European Union. If you are positive that the customs of your country won't seize the package for not complying with local regulations then it is your responsibility to try. Please add an extra $15 to your pledge to cover the shipping cost.
We are sticking to a proven business model: designing proprietary hardware and releasing all the software we wrote for that hardware under an opensource.org compliant license.
Why specifications aren't mentioning measurement precision?

Batch units testing with lab-like tools has to be conducted to be able to give a satisfying representation of measurement's precision. We were not willing to conduct these tests with our actual prototype. Though you can be sure that we are not building one of those ultra cheap powermetter. The chip we're using (MCP3909) aim at way better measurements. Note, you can't expect to have a Fluke-like tool either!

Basically we allowed us as much time as kickstarter project's 'Twine' took to ship. It's a similar project, and it ran into a lot of issues so we think we are as realist as we can get.

Certifications: We will have to meet EMC and safety standards. We anticipated these tests. Even if no one can be 100% sure that he will pass these at the first try, our electrical engineer has successfully submitted dozens of products to test labs. We'll be extra careful with suppliers especially for the enclosure which is a major risk for an AC device to transmit fire. Regarding wireless, we are using modules that have already been approved separately to minimize risks.

No, we didn't submit our project to Kickstarter. We are based in France and Indiegogo has a pretty good record of hosting international projects willing to collect funds in US dollars. Besides kickstarter recently excluded home improvement projects from its guidelines.
Can you ship NPlug outside of the EU or the US?

For now we are not planning to have NPlug certified for markets outside of the United States and the European Union. If you are positive that the customs of your country won't seize the package for not complying with local regulations then it is your responsibility to try. Please add an extra $15 to your pledge to cover the shipping cost.
We are sticking to a proven business model: designing proprietary hardware and releasing all the software we wrote for that hardware under an opensource.org compliant license.
Why specifications aren't mentioning measurement precision?

Batch units testing with lab-like tools has to be conducted to be able to give a satisfying representation of measurement's precision. We were not willing to conduct these tests with our actual prototype. Though you can be sure that we are not building one of those ultra cheap powermetter. The chip we're using (MCP3909) aim at way better measurements. Note, you can't expect to have a Fluke-like tool either!",3.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: You can also give a name to your parasol,  so that your friends can find you easily on the beach!

· SensySUN delivers 5 V USB output.
· A Battery is included: Li-Ion2,600mAh.
· The electronics can be left attached to the parasol while folded up, and can fold up with it.
· Temperature and Luminosity + UV exposure sensor
· SensySUN can withstand rain. Rugged to support heat and permanent sun exposure, the electronics can stand up to 70°C (you would have left the parasol before! We're already thinking at metal tube parasols heating up a whole day in Equator!)
· The design includes flexible mounting straps to allow positioning at any level inside the higher part of the parasol.
· iBEACON / BLE broadcasting range and proximity: the exact maximum range depends on the environment. Bluetooth is using the same type of radio waves as 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi routers. The signal can be diffracted, interfered or absorbed by water (including the human body). Open field communication can be up to 50 meters.
· Phones or other smart devices in the range can pick up the Bluetooth radio signal without previous pairing. The closer you are to the beacon, the stronger the signal is.
· Instruction Manual and App are included (Applications supported: IOS / Android)
· Dimensions:  150 * 150 * 90 mm / Weight:  Approx. 0.40 lbs. (150 g)

The team is made up of electronics and firmware engineers living in U.S.A. and Europe (in France and in Luxembourg). We are ideally positioned as we benefit from the skills of unique engineers with multicultural technical background to extract the most of each countries’ technical knowledge’s and strengths.

Our founder Claude LEFRANCOIS has run several computer and service companies and he has already successfully created other startups. Our Electronics Engineer Sami TEJ has 15 years’ experience in custom developments with communication and RF devices. These two are the innovators, and they are already putting a strong support team together.

column3: '>is recognized for his entrepreneurial skills and his ability to motivate the team, he likes to work hard and he challenges the team to deliver the right quality at the agreed deadline.

column1: Sami is passionate about electronics, particularly the Internet of Things and ""M2M"". With his academic background  - ""Masters in Electronics"" -  his professional background and the dynamic team around him, he is working hard to turn our vision of the future into our realizations, taking care of the hardware development and production.
David will be joining the team for International Sales and Marketing. He has worked for the last 20 years in business development and custom applications for the industry.
Among our high priorities in setting up this new business we are placing CUSTOMER SATISFACTION first.
Like most innovations the SensySUN concept started when facing the reality: we were on vacation on a beautiful beach, and our smartphones went dead in the sun!

From there we started thinking we could develop a complete solution which requires no power except from the sun: something simple, reliable, with low emission and low energy requirement, and the ability to store energy even on a cloudy day.

column1: Faites vous partie comme nous des personnes qui emportent leur smartphone ou leur tablette partout, même à la plage ou à la piscine ?

Nous n'y sommes par parvenus, et nous avons donc pensé à une solution simple...
Profitez sans souci de l'été et gardez votre batterie à pleine capacité, tous vos appareils mobiles peuvent être rechargés gratuitement
Communiquez avec les personnes autour de votre PARASOL

Les emails et les réseaux sociaux ne remplacent pas les vrais contacts avec les personnes qui nous entourent.
Une communauté ""physique"" vous entoure, faites vous des amis !
SensySUN inaugure une nouvelle forme d’interactivité avec les personnes PHYSIQUEMENT présentes sur votre lieu de détente :
Avec SensySUN vous pouvez être informés sous le parasol, la température, le niveau d'exposition aux U.V., le prochain tournoi de volley-ball sur la page  : ne manquez rien !
• SensySUN prévient automatiquement les personnes autour de vous si quelqu'un cherche à dérober votre appareil, ou le déconnecte pendant que vous vous baignez,
• Vous pouvez commander une boisson sans vous déplacer, ou vous connecter socialement aux personnes qui sont présentes au même moment dans un rayon proche autour de la piscine...
• Et bien sûr, chargez votre smartphone ou tablette à votre convenance car la fonction principale de SensySUN est celle de CHARGEUR SOLAIRE.
Les derniers smartphones fonctionnent partout, et nous accompagnent toute la journée, mais la batterie relève un défi chaque jour!

SensySUN keeps an eye on your device.
An alarm bells if anyone disconnects it from the charger.
· In option (if they agree) you can forward this alarm to the connected neighbor’s.
· Made up of a 3 face solar sensor components.
· Can load any kind of smartphone within a couple of hours.
· Ideally designed to be placed on top of the parasol.
· Or  stand-alone device,with reasonable sunlight exposure.
Its original design fits ideal to parasols, but any stand-alone placement in direct sun exposure is sufficient.
You can use SensySUN at home, in the camping, during your vacation and week ends. Its primary function as a SOLAR CHARGER will be of great help everyday,
You make (small) economies but most importantly you demonstrate that you

A hotel, a bar, a camping place, a tennis club... multiple organizations will have an interest for SensySUN. For instance hoteliers and bar managers will have a way to prove they are great in service and want to offer you a new experience with the communication possibilities (see iBEACON proximity communication properties below).
Owners of public places can rent it for a minimal daily fee and provide some independence to their guests!
SensySUN will offer you a great service, EVERYWHEREand this FOR FREE!
Our solution is so advanced that hoteliers and bars will like to share information with you – hence giving you a good reason to
stay longer and enjoy the moment!
·  Loading time is quick but you can enjoy another drink, some food, you can
·  And look at light how fascinating the slight glow of our
Night LEDs will warm up the atmosphere!
SensySUN DOES MUCH MORE THAN LOADING: IT COMMUNICATES!
SensySUN embeds iBEACON (Bluetooth Low Energy) Technology for proximity communication purposes.

Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0 such as the Galaxy S3 and higher, Optimus G and higher along with the iPhone 4S and higher versions can use BLE functions. Moreover other smart devices like smart watches and Google Glass can too.
This functionnality can be particularly interesting for Hoteliers, Bar Managers, public places or tennis clubs for instance:
A free App is automatically offered in free download, immediately allowing your smartphone to relay several levels of information (such as temperature, estimated loading time, position).
Your smartphone or tablets can seamlessly communicate with a service to extend its functionalities in receiving text messages, ads, or alerts.

SensySUN brings you IN TIME communication with the restricted network of your visitors - speaking for maximum interactivity with your customers - it creates « community sharing » because it is USEFUL and GREEN.

In addition SensySUN can report temperature, luminosity and measure U.V. levels: you can easily send warnings to your customers in case of high sun exposure risk level (you may for instance recommend higher cream protection in case of maximum UV level).
3 LEVELS OF PUSH INFORMATION TO SHARE WITH YOUR COMMUNITY:
Level 1 -  Security / examples: ""Greg 6 years (blue eyes) was lost near the baby pool about 5 minutes ago"" or ""Warning / strong wind»

Level 2 - Owner Promotion / examples: ""Happy Hour on Beach Bar - place your orders now"" or ""I'd like to order 1 beer and 2 coke please""... If you order a beer, the waiter can locate you quite easily and bring your beer really CHILLED!
Level 3 - User messages examples: ""Water Polo in Main Pool at 11:15 - Meeting in 10 minutes at Beach Bar.""
It could also support commercial Information - example:
Free dinner today for the first 2 who come and show this message at the Pool Bar""
You can also give a name to your parasol,  so that your friends can find you easily on the beach!

· SensySUN delivers 5 V USB output.· A Battery is included: Li-Ion2,600mAh.· The electronics can be left attached to the parasol while folded up, and can fold up with it.· Temperature and Luminosity + UV exposure sensor· SensySUN can withstand rain. Rugged to support heat and permanent sun exposure, the electronics can stand up to 70°C (you would have left the parasol before! We're already thinking at metal tube parasols heating up a whole day in Equator!)· The design includes flexible mounting straps to allow positioning at any level inside the higher part of the parasol.· iBEACON / BLE broadcasting range and proximity: the exact maximum range depends on the environment. Bluetooth is using the same type of radio waves as 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi routers. The signal can be diffracted, interfered or absorbed by water (including the human body). Open field communication can be up to 50 meters.· Phones or other smart devices in the range can pick up the Bluetooth radio signal without previous pairing. The closer you are to the beacon, the stronger the signal is.
· Instruction Manual and App are included (Applications supported: IOS / Android)
· Dimensions:  150 * 150 * 90 mm / Weight:  Approx. 0.40 lbs. (150 g)
SensySUN is part of a wide offer of
Get more power and flexibility in Energy Management!
WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?
SensySUN is a fantastic product range with huge potential and you can make it happen with us !
understand, our project has not yet started: we have made several prototypes
and a pre-engineering study, and only further investments can CONTRIBUTE TO MAKE SensySUN a FULLY OPERATIONAL
SensySUN is facing costs like injection mold
tooling (for future devices) and finalizing electronics and the
application software, before we can start shipping to all countries. In
order to guarantee delivery of the first devices in the next three months,
and to meet all the technical and production challenges, we require a
For this project we've decided to make it VERY SIMPLE:
SUPPORTER AND FRIEND: ""I believe in the idea and I support the team with $ 1,-""
SPONSOR: ""I like this idea and I contribute with $ 10,-""
EARLY SENSYSUN USER: ""I NEED one and I PURCHASE one SensySUN (or more) at the unit discounted price of $ 49,- (Early Bird Rate!) - plus shipment cost.""
Also we have decided to go for a ""fixed"" target:
Should we not meet our goal amount, everyone shall be reimbursed. You are TAKING ABSOLUTELY NO RISK!
We are releasing the products at discounted prices for early birds.
Retail prices will be higher after the crowdfunding campaign.

This project is very simple : we are not offering multiple perks because this device is very simple. Colours will be dark-brown or black - we shall inform during the campaign if other colours can be offered (depending on you!).
If we don’t meet our goal we won't deliver the perks and reimburse.

But we chose $35K (about 700 units) as our goal because we think that’s the minimum number of SensySUN modules we need to manufacture in order to launch the product in a timely manner and prove that our manufacturing quality is excellent.
Production could start in the summer, as we are currently testing several prototypes in a real sunny environment.
This period is ideal for you as a backer - if you support us we are making sure thet SensySUN turns into reality very soon.
We are confident we can implement the technology and our ability to make a nice device as we have already demonstrated with SensyBEE products
Should SensySUN meet its $ 35,000 funding goal we have everything in place to ship by October / November this year.
Be assured we are working hard to reward you with products which shall address all of the expectations we have raised so far.

The team is made up of electronics and firmware engineers living in U.S.A. and Europe (in France and in Luxembourg). We are ideally positioned as we benefit from the skills of unique engineers with multicultural technical background to extract the most of each countries’ technical knowledge’s and strengths.

Our founder Claude LEFRANCOIS has run several computer and service companies and he has already successfully created other startups. Our Electronics Engineer Sami TEJ has 15 years’ experience in custom developments with communication and RF devices. These two are the innovators, and they are already putting a strong support team together.
Claude is recognized for his entrepreneurial skills and his ability to motivate the team, he likes to work hard and he challenges the team to deliver the right quality at the agreed deadline.

Sami is passionate about electronics, particularly the Internet of Things and ""M2M"". With his academic background  - ""Masters in Electronics"" -  his professional background and the dynamic team around him, he is working hard to turn our vision of the future into our realizations, taking care of the hardware development and production.
David will be joining the team for International Sales and Marketing. He has worked for the last 20 years in business development and custom applications for the industry.
Among our high priorities in setting up this new business we are placing CUSTOMER SATISFACTION first.
Like most innovations the SensySUN concept started when facing the reality: we were on vacation on a beautiful beach, and our smartphones went dead in the sun!

From there we started thinking we could develop a complete solution which requires no power except from the sun: something simple, reliable, with low emission and low energy requirement, and the ability to store energy even on a cloudy day.

In our vision, our device should not only load your smartphone but also offer additional services, such as ""local network announcements"" - which will serve to make people connect together in a geographical way!
That's why next to the CHARGER primary function we are developping the iBEACON useful apps.
Thank you for reading this far. We are also honored to accept your pledge.
Remember every contribution is VERY important to us :

Back us with ONE DOLLAR, this is already a way to prove that you are supporting the concept as we are looking at reaching maximal audience of supporters who believe our concept is right ! This motivates us far beyond the financial aspect!

Pledge for the «SPONSOR» level, and you get one cheaper SensySUN later (we shall deduct your contribution from your first order): help us and enter the world of « positive contributors » to a greener world!

To our family, our friends, and our professional network, your contribution in joining the community of SensySUN users during this crowdfunding campaign is very important to us, as this tells everyone you HAVE TRUST what we are doing !
Help us get the word out! Let your friends and followers know what we’re doing to move the Internet of Things and ecology forward.
Faites vous partie comme nous des personnes qui emportent leur smartphone ou leur tablette partout, même à la plage ou à la piscine ?
Avez vous déjà cherché à recharger facilement vos appareils au cours d'une journée à l'extérieur ?
Nous n'y sommes par parvenus, et nous avons donc pensé à une solution simple...
Profitez sans souci de l'été et gardez votre batterie à pleine capacité, tous vos appareils mobiles peuvent être rechargés gratuitement
Communiquez avec les personnes autour de votre PARASOL
Les emails et les réseaux sociaux ne remplacent pas les vrais contacts avec les personnes qui nous entourent.Une communauté ""physique"" vous entoure, faites vous des amis !
SensySUN inaugure une nouvelle forme d’interactivité avec les personnes PHYSIQUEMENT présentes sur votre lieu de détente :
Avec SensySUN vous pouvez être informés sous le parasol, la température, le niveau d'exposition aux U.V., le prochain tournoi de volley-ball sur la page  : ne manquez rien !
SensySUN prévient automatiquement les personnes autour de vous si quelqu'un cherche à dérober votre appareil, ou le déconnecte pendant que vous vous baignez,
Vous pouvez commander une boisson sans vous déplacer, ou vous connecter socialement aux personnes qui sont présentes au même moment dans un rayon proche autour de la piscine...
Et bien sûr, chargez votre smartphone ou tablette à votre convenance car la fonction principale de SensySUN est celle de CHARGEUR SOLAIRE.
Les derniers smartphones fonctionnent partout, et nous accompagnent toute la journée, mais la batterie relève un défi chaque jour!

L'été nous passons des heures à l’extérieur, et nous sommes souvent amenés à trouver le moyen de recharger nos appareils dans des lieux souvent incompatibles avec l'électricité, comme le bar de la piscine, ou la plage.
SensySUN est une solution simple : à présent sous un parasol vous pouvez charger un téléphone ou tout appareil compatible en liaison USB, avec l'énergie gratuite du soleil.
SensySUN vous apporte l'ENERGIE GRATUITE ET UTILE SOUS LE PARASOL
Branchez simplement votre smartphone, tablette, et bronzez
SensySUN recharge et surveille !Une alarme se manifeste si quelqu'un déconnecte votre téléphone du module de charge.
En option, s'ils l'ont accepté, vos voisins connectés autour de vous seront avertis et pourront vous prévenir immédiatement.
· design pyramidal très épuré pour s'adapter à tout environnement.
· 3 composants solaires pour une bonne capacité de charge, sans besoin d'orientation compliquée
· permet de recharger un smartphone en 2-3 heures, même en l'absence de soleil car SensySUN contient une batterie intégrée qui stocke l'énergie.
· idéalement SensySUN est placé en haut d'un parasol, bien exposé mais discret.
· Ou alors se pose simplement sur une table, un bar, avec une exposition correcte au soleil.
Le design original est prévu pour coiffer un parasol, mais tout emplacement libre avec une exposition directe au soleil est parfait.
Vous pouvez utiliser SensySUN à la maison, dans le jardin, au camping, pendant les vacances et le WE.
Ce CHARGEUR SOLAIRE vous rendra service chaque jour.
Vous ferez une petite économie sur l'électricité en montrant surtout que vous vous souciez de l'environnement!

Les hôteliers, bars, campings ou tennis clubs... De multiples organisations pourront utiliser. Par exemple pour démontrer qu'ils offent un service excellent, en proposant une expérience innovante en termes d'interactivité avec leurs clients (voir plus bas notre façon très innovante de développer la communication en protocole iBEACON).
Plus généralement les propriétaires ou exploitants de lieux d'accueil du public pourront louer le service SensySUN pour une somme très modeste, et offrir
une nouvelle forme d'indépendance à leurs clients ou visiteurs!
SensySUN vous rend un grand service, PARTOUT
Notre proposition est si originale que les hôteliers et gérants de bars voudront partager plus d'information avec vous, tout en vous donnant un bon prétexte pour :
Rester plus longtemps et profiter mieux de l'instant !
·  Rechargez un téléphone, c'est rapide, mais vous pouvez prendre le temps pour commander une autre boisson, une collation, tranquillement,
Vous RELAXER parce que vous ne tombez plus en panne de batterie !
·  Et regardez comme le scintillement de nos LEDS réchauffe l'atmosphère la nuit!
SensySUN FAIT PLUS QUE CHARGER : IL COMMUNIQUE !
SensySUN embarque la technologie iBEACON (Bluetooth Low Energy) à des fins de communication interactive de proximité.

Tous les appareils Android avec Bluetooth 4.0 comme le Samsung Galaxy S3 et suivants, Optimus G et suivants, les générations à partir de iPhone 4S embarquent les technologies (Bluetooth Low Energy). De nombreux appareils ""smart"" comme les montres ou les Google Glass le peuvent aussi.
Cette fonctionnalité est particulièrement intéressante pour les gérants de lieux accueillant le public, hôtels, bars, tennis clubs ou campings par exemple :

Une application gratuite est automatiquement suggérée en téléchargement, permettant à votre appareil connecté de relayer différents niveaux d'informations (comme la température, le niveau d'UV instantané, le lieu de votre séjour ou d'accueil).

Votre smartphone ou tablette peuvent ainsi communiquer avec le service de l'hôte (en local, sans coût d'opérateur) et étendre ses capacités de communication par la réception de messages, promotions ou alertes qui ne concernent QUE LE LIEU OU VOUS VOUS TROUVEZ.
VOUS NE MANQUEZ RIEN de la communauté ou des services qui vous environnement.
- la communication EN TEMPS REEL avec le réseau exclusif de vos visiteurs
- vous offre une interractivité INSTANTANEE et LOCALE avec vos clients
- tout en étant utile (donc ACCEPTE) et positif pour l'ENVIRONNEMENT !
3 NIVEAUX D'INFORMATION POSSIBLES AVEC VOTRE COMMUNAUTE :
Niveau 1 - Sécurité exemples: ""Greg 6 ans (yeux bleus) a disparu il y a 5 minutes, aidez nous à le retrouver!"" ou alors ""vent fort, baignade dangereuse""
Niveau 2 - Promotion locale exemples: ""Happy Hour au Bar - placez maintenant vos commandes"" ou alors ""La soirée dansante aura lieu ce soir au bord de la piscine""
Niveau 3 - Messages d'utilisateurs / exemples: ""Water Polo à la piscine à 11:15 - inscrivez vous au Bar."" ou ""qui veut jouer à la pétanque vers 17 heures"".
SensySUN vous apporte une interactivité en local avec une grande simplicité.
Vous pouvez aussi donner un nom à votre parasol pour que vos amis vous trouvent facilement sur la plage !
· SensySUN délivre 5 V sur la sortie USB.
· Le boitier électronique est installé sur le bras du parasol, et reste en place même si le parasol est fermé.
· Mesures de la température et luminosité, mesure du niveau d' U.V.
· SensySUN résiste à la pluie et est prévue pour une utilisation intensive en extérieur, l'électronique résiste à 70°C (vous aurez quitté le parasol avant!)
· Le design original du boitier électronique comprend un mode de fixation par bandes auto-agrippantes (ou par vis) pour être placé facilement sous le parasol.
· iBEACON - Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) : les capacités de couverture dépendent de l'environnement précis.
· Un manuel d'instruction et une application gratuite sont livrés (Applications supportées en mode IOS / Android)
SensySUN fait partie d'une gamme complète d'objets connectés pour la gestion intelligente d'énergie :
Des passerelles optionnelles BLE / RF connectent SensySUN à l'ensemble de la gamme de modules  SensyBEE que nous avons déjà lancés !
Plus de flexibilité dans la gestion des ressources énergétiques !
Nous pensons que SensySUN est un concept très utile avec un gros potentiel de développement, et vous pouvez nous aider à concrétiser le lancement commercial en devenant nos premiers clients !

Comme vous le comprenez, notre projet est au stade de l'étude et de pré-validation. Il fonctionne (nous l'avons testé en extérieur, en situation réelle). Nous avons plusieurs prototypes fonctionnels qui donnent satisfaction.

A ce stade nous devons prendre la décision d'investir pour que SensySUN arrive sur le marché. Pour finaliser les moules, outillages et cartes électroniques, créer les applications informatiques nous espérons réunir un financement de 35,000 Dollars.
Pour ce projet nous avons une approche très simple dans les niveaux de financement demandés :
SUPPORTER et AMI : ""j'aime l'idée, et je soutiens l'équipe avec ma contribution symbolique de 1 $""
SPONSOR: ""je veux donner sa chance au projet, et j'investis 10 $ qui seront déduits de mon éventuelle première commande lorsque le produit sera lancé""
PREMIER UTILISATEUR SENSYSUN : ""j'en veux un et je profite de l'occasion pour bénéficier du prix de lancement de  49 $ (plus frais de port selon ma région ou pays).""
Nous avons aussi décidé de partir sur une financement FIXE :
Si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif dans son intégralité, chacun est remboursé :
Notre produit est proposé à un prix spécial de lancement.Les prix de vente seront supérieurs par la suite.

Nous simplifions au maximum la gestion du projet : nous cherchons à lancer un produit unique, dans la couleur marron ou noir, assez neutre pour convenir partout, et nous vous tiendrons informés régulièrement au cours de la campagne de crowdfunding si des couleurs supplémentaires sont demandées et possibles.
Notre objectif de 35,000 Dollars correspond à environ 700 modules. C'est une quantité minimale à produire pour valider et démontrer le sérieux de nos fabrications, et bien sûr
POUR VOUS LIVRER DANS LES MEILLEURS DÉLAIS UN PRODUIT ABOUTI
La production pourrait démarrer juste à la fin de la campagne, à la fin de l'été. Nous en profitons d'ici là pour tester une maximum de prototypes durant les mois ensoleillés.
Pour vous en tant que contributeur c'est l'assurance que le produit soit efficace.
Nous sommes confiants car les premiers essais sont positifs, et nous avons acquis de l'expérience en lançant les modules de gestion énergétique SensyBEE.

Si nous atteignons l'objectif de 35,000 Dollars, nous pensons pouvoir livrer courant Octobre-Novembre de cette année, et vous pourrez faire un cadeau original à Noël en offrant un produit d'été pratique et écologique !

Nous sommes une petite équipe d'ingénieurs informatique et électronique vivant aux U.S.A. et en Europe (France et Luxembourg). Nos compétences couvrent un vaste domaine et nous bénéficions de la richesse de plusieurs cultures et nationalités.
Le fondateur de la société Claude LEFRANCOIS a développé plusieurs sociétés au cours des 25 dernières années, et était déjà entrepreneur en mode ""start-up"" dès le début de sa carrière.
Notre Directeur technique Sami TEJ a 15 ans d'expérience dans le développements de produits en communication radio-fréquences.
Ils sont à l'origine des innovations récentes (gamme SensyBEE et maintenant SensySUN).
David CHEDOTAL a rejoint l'équipe pour prendre en charge les ventes et le marketing, après avoir consacré 20 années au développement de réseaux commerciaux dans les produits industriels.
Notre priorité est la SATISFACTION DU CLIENT.
Rappelez vous, toute contribution même minimale est importante pour nous :

Supportez nous avec la contribution symbolique de 1 ou 10 Dollars. Nous cherchons une audience maximale auprès des supporters qui adhèrent à notre projet ! Cela nous motive bien au delà de l'aspect financier.
Achetez un module SensySUN , et vous nous donnez déjà l'opportunité de produire le dispositif tout en rejoignant la liste de contributeurs actifs pour un monde plus écologique !
Votre contribution en devenant un utilisateur de SensySUN à l'occasion de ce lancement attestera de votre confiance. Equipez-vous et parlez en autour de vous !
Partagez cette page avec vos amis et relations !",45.0,0,"2 Campaigns

width=""580"">

THE TAP by ARMORZ

The TAP's revolutionary design combines click accuracy with menu command access for unparalleled maneuverability. With greater flexibility navigating your iPhone, the TAP allows for easier access to your iPhone's essential features. Menu items that were out of reach are now right at hand. Page switches and refreshes all fall into place. It all adds up to a better overall experience with your iPhone.

column1: • Two-button, precision touchscreen navigation for greater efficiency
• Comfort when you're in a crunch for time

The TAP was designed to enhance your iPhone experience. Dual button access to the menu and page toggle functions makes for more precise motion. Movements come quickly and easily. The results speak for themselves: Access a wider range of functions with less motion and greater accuracy. Enjoy the benefits of:
TAP allows easy access to the menu items without having to use your off hand. Without compromise, the TAP allows users to:
• The most advanced level of impact protection

Founded in 2009, Armorz pushes the boundaries of innovative design in smartphone accessories. Dedicated to reaching the pinnacle of craftsmanship, we continue to develop accessories that improve our customers' experience with their devices. We strive to exceed expectations in everything we do, and this commitment is reflected in the results: Superior product designs that enhance your everyday life.

While many notable third-party application developers have signed onto our innovative design, not all apps support the TAP. We believe that the TAP is the natural evolution of superior design, and that the results will ultimately reward that innovation. It will be a challenge to move from a prototype to fabrication to mass production. Based on our track record, we do not anticipate these challenges will keep the TAP from thriving in the global marketplace.

>The most user friendly portable wireless speaker for virtually any smartphone and unlimited uses.
At home or on the go, keep the Hi-Fi with you!

FHM - ""All your problems may soon be solved by the brilliant-looking Sonomad Portable Bluetooth Speaker""

Gear Moose - ""There is nothing sacrificed, however, with The Sonomad portable Bluetooth speaker""

Gadget Sin - ""if you want to enjoy those beautiful music on the go or in a party, the Sonomad retro portable Bluetooth speaker may be able to catch your eyes""

Street Gentry - ""Combine a unique retro design, compatibility with almost any device, sound quality matched only by the high-end German manufacturers and you get the unique Filowz Sonomad""

Mike Shouts - ""portable Bluetooth speakers are a dime a dozen, but one that also lets you dock your smartphone and turn it into one neat portable package is far and few between""

Android et vous - ""De quoi vous décoiffer !!!""

Cooli Gadget - ""une toute nouvelle enceinte portable Bluetooth qui permet d’intégrer votre smartphone et de le recharger. Ce qui est un vrai plus par rapport aux autres enceintes portables Bluetooth""
column7:
>Gadget - ""the Sonomad, a hi-fi wireless portable sound system that gives high-end stereo sound and easy portability""

Clubic - ""Encore une enceinte mobile, oui. Mais avec des spécificités qui valent le détour""
column8: >Android Guys - ""If you’ve been looking for a speaker that offers high performance with an innovative universal dock, be sure to hit up the links below""
column9: >Les Numériques - ""Conçue pour un usage nomade ou à la maison, elle intègre un compartiment qui permet de mettre à l’abri toutes sortes de smartphones ou baladeurs""

column1:
Hi, we are Filowz. Thank you for your interest in our project.
We love music, and many of us use smartphones as a source of music. We always have our smartphones with us, wherever we are. But how do we share the music we love?
The Sonomad is a Hi-Fi wireless portable sound system which lets you enjoy and share your music anywhere, anytime with an unmatched combination of performance and portability.
• 20 hours of nonstop music playing on battery
• an extremely user friendly wire free stereo system
• a unique safe dock compatible with any smartphone

Hi-Fi sound quality, huge power and long lasting battery life: the high quality internal components and materials of the Sonomad make it the best sounding and most powerful sound system of its class. And combined with its high capacity optimized battery, the entertainment will go on for hours.

The Sonomad is a unique piece of industrial design. Thought and built to be as strong as possible, the Sonomad is truly portable and really convenient to use, thanks to its compact form and its carrying functions (handle and shoulder strap). And if you do not want to carry it, you can easily throw it in your backpack.
The Sonomad is compatible with any smartphone, computer, tablet, mp3 player…wirelessly connected through Bluetooth, or with a wire via the standard stereo input.
The safe dock is compatible with any smartphone which is less than 3 in (76 mm) wide and 6.2 in (160 mm) high. Let's say that almost all smartphones will fit nicely inside the Sonomad.

Designed in Paris, the Sonomad brings the 70's back with the latest and best technology of the 21th century. Carry it with the retractable handle or with the included shoulder strap and you are ready to be on the move…musically!

Connect to the Sonomad through Bluetooth and control the speaker from up to 30 feet (10 meters). And if you do not have Bluetooth or just are too far away from the speaker, simply use the standard audio connector.

Recharge your smartphone or your mp3 player through the included USB connector (5V). Since your smartphone battery will probably be empty a long time before the Sonomad gets a low battery, let's share energy and keep the music going!
Connect several Sonomad units together through the audio output to get a bigger, wilder sound. Connect a smartphone to a Sonomad, and just plug in as many Sonomad units as you want!
The Sonomad is the only speaker including the universal mount which can protect your smartphone.

Use it as a dock at home and as soon as you are on the move or doing outdoor activities, your smartphone is safe. Just need one hand…and your smartphone will not fear water, sand or any accidental fall.

Filowz is a French company based in Paris. Funded by Grégoire, a sound engineer who has traveled and lived in Africa for 6 years, where he felt the need for an effective, convenient and reliable portable speaker. Old school Ghetto Blasters are too heavy, not powerful enough and fragile
column2: traditional Hi-Fi systems are expensive, not portable and cable messy.

column1: Filowz gathers a team of professional industrial designer, electronics, acoustics and mechanical engineers, passionate about music and what they do.
Our aim is to bring the best sound quality anywhere at anytime, without any constraint: small size, small weight, small price, big sound, huge power, long lasting battery life.

After 2 years and more than $70k of research and development, we are more than happy to introduce the Sonomad. But the trip isn't over yet. To bring this kind of industrial product to a market, we need to build injection molding tools, get certifications and have a minimum order quantity.
The funds we get from this Indiegogo campaign are for the following:

By supporting Filowz and the Sonomad, you will not only get one of the best portable sound systems but you will also be part of a great entrepreneurial adventure. You have the opportunity to support a young and innovative team of passionate people who want to improve our music experience and to keep making its products in France. For that, we need YOU to be part of our project.

Q/ Will my smartphone, tablet, or computer be able to play music on the Sonomad?
A/ You can wirelessly connect to the Sonomad through Bluetooth. If your equipment doesn't have Bluetooth, you can easily connect it through the standard audio jack input.

Q/ How do I know if I can use the safe dock with my smartphone or MP3 player?
A/ The maximum width of the safe dock is 3 in (76 mm). For example, a Samsung Galaxy S4 is 2.75 in (69.8 mm) wide and an Apple iPhone 5 is 2.3 in (58.6 mm) wide.

Q/ Is a smartphone included with the Sonomad?
A/ No, there is no smartphone included with the Sonomad.

Q/ How loud can the Sonomad be?
A/ The Sonomad is capable of delivering up to 105 dB of Sound Pressure Level at 20 in (50 cm). It means that you won't be able to talk next to the Sonomad when it is at its maximum volume…

Q/ Will the power outlet work in my country?
A/ The Sonomad is rechargeable and/or powered through a 110-240VAC / 50-60Hz power unit. So yes, it will work perfectly in pretty much every country in the world.

Q/ Is shipping included?
A/ Yes, international shipping is included in every perk!

Q/ If I order a Sonomad, what will I get?
A/ A Sonomad, an audio cable, a should strapp, a power supply and a user manual.

Q/ I live in Paris, will it be possible to come and pick up my Sonomad as soon as it is ready?
A/ Absolutely. We would love to meet all our contributors personally.
Read more at FILOWZ.com and do no hesitate to share the project:

Ce qui est un vrai plus par rapport aux autres enceintes portables Bluetooth""Gadget - ""the Sonomad, a hi-fi wireless portable sound system that gives high-end stereo sound and easy portability""Clubic - ""Encore une enceinte mobile, oui. Mais avec des spécificités qui valent le détour""Android Guys - ""If you’ve been looking for a speaker that offers high performance with an innovative universal dock, be sure to hit up the links below""Les Numériques - ""Conçue pour un usage nomade ou à la maison, elle intègre un compartiment qui permet de mettre à l’abri toutes sortes de smartphones ou baladeurs""

Ir a la versión en español

Keyapp is an encryption service for messages in any environment, our objective is to return the privacy of users all over internet, Keyapp believe that privacy should be more than a right, an obligation to provide it through the platforms, but these, governments and companies have made this a business.

In keyapp we don't limit ourselves to encrypt only your emails, we cover all applications used daily in our devices, WhatsApp, Messenger, Line, Telegram, Skype, Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, SMS and any web page, actually any platform that has a text box, Keyapp encrypted it.

In Keyapp we are committed to privacy seriously, we can not decrypt any message, even if a government requires us, this is because the information goes through us in encrypted form and is simply impossible.

Keyapp uses military technology to encrypt messages in Keyapp use its latest version which is AES-256 bits, why we say it is impossible to decrypt without the key ?, because it would take billions years to decrypt a message encrypted in AES-256 hard crude and currently most powerful computer, and use RSA / 2048/4096 to share personal keys, all this works locally on your device.
Keyapp uses two encryption algorithms RSA asymmetric encryption algorithm or public key and AES is a symmetric encryption algorithm, these algorithms are the basis of our service.

RSA works as a lock with two entrances, one to open and another to close, in this case the closing brace does not open, then a user can send a message and closes with the key, but this is not going to be able to open, only the recipient has the key that opens.
AES works as a conventional padlock that closes the same key opens, so RSA is used to share the AES key between users, since AES has no limitations to the size of text or files and is much faster.
In addition, each message encrypted with AES is different, so have the same content, so we avoided the cryptanalysis of messages.
You have to enable and select the keyboard before you can encrypt messages with Keyapp.

Keyapp uses a custom keyboard very similar to each mobile additionally a button that displays a list of contacts and groups to choose to whom it is addressed the message and encrypt it for that contact or group.

If you want to read a message simply copy the message and automatically Keyapp deployed a dialogue with the decoded message, if not an encrypted message, not shown this dialogue, if error, show by the same method.

Thanks to the funds raised in this campaign we can recruit and expand our team and accelerate the development of the application for iOS and desktop (Windows, Linux, OS X), to deliver the service on all major platforms, we currently have the application Android also will use the funds raised to buy the necessary servers and provide the highest possible level of service.

We not only want to stay here, we have a list of objectives to fulfill and deliver more capabilities to their memberships and double its characteristics, we want to add features such as encrypted files as videos, images, documents and others, but unfortunately we have insufficient resources to carry them out simultaneously.

Impact

In Keyapp we hope to create an awareness, we want to teach that privacy is important to everyone, whether a message of ""Hello"" among friends, are private messages, must be respected, and now we will have control over our information.
We just want to protect among us had already become trivial to mention privacy and took for granted that businesses and governments use them, but it should not, it's time to give us our place.

Challenges

Some governments and private companies will be against our service, but if this happens is to assert our point we are giving them our information, forced some legal terms but we do not want to accept.
If we all fight together, we can overcome all these difficulties overcome.
You can contact us at contact@keyapp.co for any questions you have or directly with me luis@keyapp.co.
Currently, we have no free accounts, but the implement when we have more stability.
You can request an invitation https://keyapp.co, and be one of the first 1000 free users.
The short answer is we have to pay the bills and team work Keyapp, but we promise to introduce a free account soon.

It is impossible to guarantee 100% protection, since a part of the responsibility of the user, be sure to have your encrypted device, use a pin or password to access the device and choose a strong password for your account Keyapp.
How and when will I get my reward?
The benefit will be a code that will be sent via email with which it is to be registered in Keyapp, they will be delivered progressively during the campaign and after this.
You can help us share this campaign on social networks with your friends and family, so we can grow together.

Keyapp es un servicio de cifrado para mensajes en cualquier entorno, nuestro objetivos es regresar la privacidad de los usuarios de todo internet, en Keyapp creemos que la privacidad debe ser mas que un derecho, una obligación suministrarla por las plataformas, pero estas, gobiernos y las empresas han hecho de esto un negocio.

En Keyapp no nos limitamos a cifrar solo sus correos electrónicos, abarcamos toda las aplicaciones utilizadas diariamente en nuestro dispositivos, WhatsApp, Messenger, Line, Telegram, Skype, Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, SMS y cualquier pagina web, en realidad cualquier plataforma que tenga una caja de texto Keyapp lo cifrara.

En Keyapp estamos comprometidos enserio con la privacidad, nosotros no podemos descifrar ningún mensaje, incluso si un gobierno nos obliga, esto es porque la información pasa por nosotros de forma cifrada y es simplemente imposible.

Keyapp utiliza tecnologia militar para cifrar mensajes, en Keyapp utilizamos su ultima version que es AES-256 bits, ahora, ¿Por que decimos es que imposible descifrarlo sin la llave?, porque se necesitaría billones años para descifrar un mensajes cifrado en AES-256 con fuerza bruta y la computadora mas poderosa actualmente, y utilizamos RSA/2048/4096 para compartir las llaves personales, todo esto funciona localmente en su dispositivo.
Keyapp utiliza dos algoritmos de cifrado RSA que un algoritmo de cifrado asimétrico o de llave publica, y AES es un algoritmo de cifrado simétrico, esos algoritmos son la base de nuestro servicio.

RSA funciona como un candado con dos entradas una para abrir y otra para cerrar, en este caso la llave que cierra no la abre, entonces un usuario puede enviar un mensaje y lo cierra con la llave, pero este no lo va a poder abrir, solo el destinatario tiene la llave que abre.

AES funciona como un candado convencional la misma llave que cierra lo abre, por esto se utiliza RSA para compartir la llave AES entre los usuarios, ya que AES no tiene limitaciones con el tamaño de textos ni archivos y es mucho mas rápido.
Ademas cada mensaje cifrado con AES es diferente, así tengan el mismo contenido, así evitamos el criptoánalisis de los mensajes.
Hay que habilitar y seleccionar el teclado antes de poder cifrar los mensajes con Keyapp.

Keyapp utiliza un teclado personalizado muy parecido al de cada móvil, adicionalmente un botón que despliega una lista de los contactos y grupos, para que elija para quien va dirigido el mensaje y cifrarlo para ese contacto o grupo.

Si quiere leer un mensaje simplemente copia el mensaje y automáticamente Keyapp desplegara un dialogo con el mensaje descifrado, si es no es un mensaje cifrado, no saltara este dialogo, en caso de error, se mostrara por este mismo método.

Gracias a los fondos recaudado en esta campaña podremos contratar y expandir nuestro equipo de trabajo y acelerar el desarrollo de las aplicación para iOS y escritorio (Windows, Linux, OS X), para poder entregarles el servicio en las principales plataformas, actualmente tenemos la aplicación en Android, también, los fondos recaudados los utilizaremos para comprar los servidores necesarios y brindarles el nivel de servicio mas alto posible.

No solo queremos quedarnos aqui, tenemos una lista de objetivos por cumplir y entregar mas capacidades a sus membresías y duplicar sus características, queremos agregar características como cifrar archivos de videos, imágenes, documentos y demás, pero infortunadamente actualmente no tenemos suficientes recursos para llevarlos a cabo simultáneamente.

Impacto

En Keyapp esperamos crear una conciencia en los usuarios de internet, queremos enseñarles que la privacidad es importante para todos, así sea un mensaje de ""Hola"" entre amigos, son mensajes privados, hay que respetarlos, y ahora nosotros vamos tener el control sobre nuestra información.

Solo queremos protegernos entre nosotros, ya se había convertido en algo trivial hablar de la privacidad y dábamos por hecho que las empresas y gobiernos las utilizan, pero no debe ser así, ya es hora de darnos nuestro lugar.

Retos

Algunos gobiernos y empresas privadas van a estar en contra de nuestro servicio, pero si esto pasa es afirmar nuestro punto que les estamos dando nuestra información de forma obligados a unos términos legales que no queremos pero tenemos que aceptar.
Si todos luchamos juntos, podemos vencer todos sobrepasar todos estos inconvenientes.
Puede contactarte con nosotros en contact@keyapp.co para cualquier duda que tengan, directamente conmigo luis@keyapp.co.
Actualmente, no tenemos cuentas gratuitas, pero si la implementaremos cuando tengamos mas estabilidad.
Puedes pedir una invitación en https://keyapp.co, y ser uno de los primeros 1000 usuarios gratuitos.
La respuesta corta es que tenemos que pagar las facturas y a el equipo de trabajo de Keyapp, pero prometemos introducir una cuenta gratuita pronto.

Es imposible garantizar el 100% de la protección ya que una parte de la responsabilidad es del usuario, asegúrate  de tener su dispositivo cifrado, utilizar un pin o contraseña al ingresar al dispositivo y escoger una contraseña muy fuerte para su cuenta de Keyapp.
¿Como y cuando voy a recibir mi recompensa?
El beneficio sera un código que se le enviara vía correo electrónico con el que se va a registrar en Keyapp, se entregaran progresivamente durante la campaña y después de esta.
Puedes ayudarnos compartir esta campaña en las redes sociales, con tus amigos y familiares, así podemos crecer juntos.

You can request an invitation https://keyapp.co, and be one of the first 1000 free users.
The short answer is we have to pay the bills and team work Keyapp, but we promise to introduce a free account soon.

It is impossible to guarantee 100% protection, since a part of the responsibility of the user, be sure to have your encrypted device, use a pin or password to access the device and choose a strong password for your account Keyapp.

The benefit will be a code that will be sent via email with which it is to be registered in Keyapp, they will be delivered progressively during the campaign and after this.

No solo queremos quedarnos aqui, tenemos una lista de objetivos por cumplir y entregar mas capacidades a sus membresías y duplicar sus características, queremos agregar características como cifrar archivos de videos, imágenes, documentos y demás, pero infortunadamente actualmente no tenemos suficientes recursos para llevarlos a cabo simultáneamente.

ImpactoEn Keyapp esperamos crear una conciencia en los usuarios de internet, queremos enseñarles que la privacidad es importante para todos, así sea un mensaje de ""Hola"" entre amigos, son mensajes privados, hay que respetarlos, y ahora nosotros vamos tener el control sobre nuestra información.

Solo queremos protegernos entre nosotros, ya se había convertido en algo trivial hablar de la privacidad y dábamos por hecho que las empresas y gobiernos las utilizan, pero no debe ser así, ya es hora de darnos nuestro lugar.

RetosAlgunos gobiernos y empresas privadas van a estar en contra de nuestro servicio, pero si esto pasa es afirmar nuestro punto que les estamos dando nuestra información de forma obligados a unos términos legales que no queremos pero tenemos que aceptar.
Si todos luchamos juntos, podemos vencer todos sobrepasar todos estos inconvenientes.
Puede contactarte con nosotros en contact@keyapp.co para cualquier duda que tengan, directamente conmigo luis@keyapp.co.
Actualmente, no tenemos cuentas gratuitas, pero si la implementaremos cuando tengamos mas estabilidad.
Puedes pedir una invitación en https://keyapp.co, y ser uno de los primeros 1000 usuarios gratuitos.
La respuesta corta es que tenemos que pagar las facturas y a el equipo de trabajo de Keyapp, pero prometemos introducir una cuenta gratuita pronto.

Es imposible garantizar el 100% de la protección ya que una parte de la responsabilidad es del usuario, asegúrate  de tener su dispositivo cifrado, utilizar un pin o contraseña al ingresar al dispositivo y escoger una contraseña muy fuerte para su cuenta de Keyapp.
¿Como y cuando voy a recibir mi recompensa?
El beneficio sera un código que se le enviara vía correo electrónico con el que se va a registrar en Keyapp, se entregaran progresivamente durante la campaña y después de esta.
Puedes ayudarnos compartir esta campaña en las redes sociales, con tus amigos y familiares, así podemos crecer juntos.",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: We need your help to make ShutIT available for your mobile device. We've put in months of hard effort, tested several prototypes, and made many improvements along the way. We're finally ready to start mass production. Our team is extremely excited and dedicated to bring ShutIT to your device, but we can only do so with your funding. We've finalised a supplier that can manufacture ShutIT with the level of precision required to achieve a premium quality finished product. Majority of the $30,600 we're raising will finance the expensive tooling and moulds required to manufacture the custom design profile of ShutIT. The rest will fund certain startup costs, application development, and help us achieve the minimum order quantity.
We need your support to achieve our mission - to deliver an awesome product that just makes life easier. Even if this isn't for you, it may be useful to someone else.
Please help us spread the word - speak to your friends and family, like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, etc. Your recommendation will go a long way and we thank you in advance.

The FREE ShutIT App will automatically configure ShutIT to toggle Vibration by default.  Using the App, you can select the most desired function from 6 key functions, which will then be toggled through ShutIT. Simple. COMPATIBILITY

ShutIT is compatible with any Android device running version 4.0 and higher. To check your Android version, please go to Settings > About phone on your device. Your version will be displayed under Android Version.

ShutIT fits perfectly in your device's headphone jack. We carefully analysed the hardware profile of the most common Android devices today and translated everything we learnt into the design of ShutIT.
The Result: ShutIT gradually becomes a core feature of your device.
ShutIT was born out of necessity. To perform a simple task like turning on Silent mode, you currently need to:
This entire process takes around 7 seconds.
Imagine carrying out these steps while rushing into a meeting with your laptop, coffee, and a bunch of papers. It's just too tedious.
Enter ShutIT. Perform tasks in just 1 second.
ShutIT helps increase Battery Life. It provides such an effortless way to turn OFF many battery draining functions

How can I download the Android App?
The ShutIT app will be available for Free on the Google Play Store as soon as we start shipping ShutIT. We'll notify all backers when it is available.
Will ShutIT work on iOS and Windows Mobile devices?
Nope. ShutIT only works on Android devices running version 4.0 and higher.
Don't worry, Worldwide Shipping is already included!

We aim to deliver by May 2014.ShutIT is our dream. Though we cannot guarantee delivery of all perks, we'll make the utmost effort to bring the ShutIT solution exactly as shown here.
